name: Bulbasaur
pokedex: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
pokedex_full.Gold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
pokedex_full.Silver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
pokedex_full.Crystal: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
pokedex_full.FireRed: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this POKéMON is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.

pokedex_full.Emerald: Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A METAPOD does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.

name: Rattata

pokedex_full.Silver: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_full.Crystal: To protect its territory, it flies around ceaselessly, making high-pitched cries.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: SPEAROW has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It flaps its short wings to flush out insects from tall grass. It then plucks them with its stubby beak.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
pokedex_full.X: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_full.Y: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its short wings make it inept at flying. It moves about hurriedly and pecks at Bug-type Pokémon in the tall grass.
pokedex_full.Moon: Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokémon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous appetite and look after it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Due to its short wings, it can’t fly long distances. It wanders about restlessly and pecks at bug Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

name: Fearow
pokedex: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokedex_full.Gold: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
pokedex_full.Silver: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: FEAROW is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a whole day without landing.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Platinum: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It has the stamina to keep flying all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_full.X: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_full.Y: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_full.Sun: It’s tough and has excellent stamina. It has no problem flying continuously for a whole day carrying a heavy load.
pokedex_full.Moon: Drawings of a Pokémon resembling Fearow can be seen in murals from deep in ancient history.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Carrying food through Fearow’s territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: In Alola, fish Pokémon are its prey. It can be seen circling above the ocean searching for food.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
pokedex: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_full.Gold: It can freely detach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can become too heavy to move, however.
pokedex_full.Silver: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
pokedex_full.FireRed: A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
pokedex_full.Emerald: An EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It can freely detach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can become too heavy to move, however.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
pokedex_full.X: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_full.Y: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The eggs of bird Pokémon are its favorite food. It swallows eggs whole, so sometimes an egg gets stuck, and Ekans faints.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

name: Arbok
pokedex: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokedex_full.Gold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
pokedex_full.Silver: With a very vengeful nature, it won’t give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
pokedex_full.Crystal: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: This POKéMON is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once ARBOK wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
pokedex_full.Emerald: This POKéMON has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: With a very vengeful nature, it won’t give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
pokedex_full.X: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
pokedex_full.Y: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

name: Pikachu
pokedex: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.
pokedex_full.Gold: This intelligent POKéMON roasts hard BERRIES with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
pokedex_full.Silver: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
pokedex_full.Ruby: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this POKéMON mistook the intensity of its charge.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: This POKéMON has electricity-storing pouches on its cheeks. These appear to become electrically charged during the night while PIKACHU sleeps. It occasionally discharges electricity when it is dozy after waking up.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
pokedex_full.Pearl: If it looses crackling power from the electric pouches on its cheeks, it is being wary.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow PIKACHU that is in a weakened state.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: This intelligent Pokémon roasts hard berries with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
pokedex_full.X: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
pokedex_full.Y: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this Pokémon mistook the intensity of its charge.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon has electricity-storing pouches on its cheeks. These appear to become electrically charged during the night while Pikachu sleeps. It occasionally discharges electricity when it is dozy after waking up.
pokedex_full.Sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it’s unable to fully discharge the electricity.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: While sleeping, it generates electricity in the sacs in its cheeks. If it’s not getting enough sleep, it will be able to use only weak electricity.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: This forest-dwelling Pokémon stores electricity in its cheeks, so you’ll feel a tingly shock if you touch it.
pokedex_full.Sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
pokedex_full.Shield: When Pikachu meet, they’ll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: If it looses crackling power from the electric sacs on its cheeks, it is being wary.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before consuming them.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
pokedex_full.Violet: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
pokedex: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
pokedex_full.Yellow: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
pokedex_full.Gold: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
pokedex_full.Silver: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.
pokedex_full.Crystal: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
pokedex_full.Ruby: If the electrical sacks become excessively charged, RAICHU plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this POKéMON’s nest.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: This POKéMON exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. RAICHU searches for electricity by planting its tail in the ground.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
pokedex_full.Emerald: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
pokedex_full.X: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
pokedex_full.Y: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: If the electrical sacs become excessively charged, Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this Pokémon’s nest.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. Raichu plants its tail in the ground to discharge electricity.
pokedex_full.Sun: It unleashes electric shocks that can reach 100,000 volts. When agitated, it can knock out even an Indian elephant.
pokedex_full.Moon: It becomes aggressive when it has electricity stored up. At such times, even its Trainer has to take care to avoid being attacked.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: As electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes more aggressive. One theory is that the electricity buildup is actually causing stress.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Because so many Trainers like the way Pikachu looks, you don’t see this Pokémon very often.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
pokedex_full.Shield: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts— a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one of the Copperajah of my homeland.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
pokedex_full.Violet: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.

name: Sandshrew
pokedex: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.
pokedex_full.Gold: If it fell from a great height, this POKéMON could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
pokedex_full.Silver: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.
pokedex_full.Ruby: SANDSHREW’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This POKéMON curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: SANDSHREW has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The POKéMON can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.
pokedex_full.Emerald: When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If it fell from a great height, this Pokémon could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
pokedex_full.Black/White: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It digs deep burrows to live in. When in danger, it rolls up its body to withstand attacks.
pokedex_full.X: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
pokedex_full.Y: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Sandshrew’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This Pokémon curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Sandshrew has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The Pokémon can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.
pokedex_full.Sun: It can roll its body into a ball. It moves through the desert by rolling at high speeds.
pokedex_full.Moon: It usually makes its home in deserts and arid zones, where rain does not fall. It digs holes to catch Bug-type Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It lives in areas of limited rainfall. When danger approaches, it curls up into a ball to protect its soft stomach.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When its skin gets wrinkled from moisture, it heads for a volcano. It lies flat on a spot with a lot of geothermal heat and dries itself out.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.
pokedex_full.Sword: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.
pokedex_full.Shield: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

name: Sandslash
pokedex: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.
pokedex_full.Gold: In an attempt to hide itself, it will run around at top speed to kick up a blinding dust storm.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.
pokedex_full.Ruby: SANDSLASH’s body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: SANDSLASH can roll up its body as if it were a ball covered with large spikes. In battle, this POKéMON will try to make the foe flinch by jabbing it with its spines. It then leaps at the stunned foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is adept at attacking with the spines on its back and its sharp claws while quickly scurrying about.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: In an attempt to hide itself, it will run around at top speed to kick up a blinding dust storm.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The spikes on its body are made up of its hardened hide. It rolls up and attacks foes with its spikes.
pokedex_full.X: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
pokedex_full.Y: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Sandslash’s body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Sandslash can roll up its body as if it were a ball covered with large spikes. In battle, this Pokémon will try to make the foe flinch by jabbing it with its spines. It then leaps at the stunned foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.
pokedex_full.Sun: Although they are sharp, its claws and spikes often break off. They grow back the next day, so it is not bothered by the temporary loss.
pokedex_full.Moon: It uses its claws to climb trees and then curls its body into a spiny ball, ready to drop onto any prey that appears.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its claws and horns often break off. The broken claws and horns can be used to carve plows for tilling farm fields.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Thanks to its thick claws, it’s good at climbing trees. There are plenty of Sandslash that park themselves in trees and go right to sleep.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.
pokedex_full.Sword: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.
pokedex_full.Shield: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

name: Nidoran♀
pokedex: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.
pokedex_full.Gold: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely potent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.
pokedex_full.Silver: Although not very combative, it will torment its foes with poison spikes if it is threatened in any way.

pokedex_full.Silver: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
pokedex_full.Ruby: NINETALES casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This POKéMON is said to live for a thousand years.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: Legend has it that NINETALES came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This POKéMON is highly intelligent - it can understand human speech.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It has nine long tails and fur that  gleams gold. It is said to live for  1,000 years.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived NINETALES will have fur that shines like gold.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Some legends claim that each of its nine tails has its own unique type of special mystical power.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Each of its nine tails is imbued with supernatural power, and it can live for a thousand years.
pokedex_full.X: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
pokedex_full.Y: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Ninetales casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This Pokémon is said to live for a thousand years.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Legend has it that Ninetales came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This Pokémon is highly intelligent—it can understand human speech.
pokedex_full.Sun: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
pokedex_full.Moon: Said to live for a thousand years, this Pokémon uses its supernatural abilities to manipulate fire. It can burn its prey to a crisp as it pleases.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It is vindictive and relentless by nature. Those who cross it even once will be cursed for a thousand years, along with their descendants.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The flickering flames it spews from its mouth leave its opponents hypnotized. Then, this extremely intelligent Pokémon attacks.

pokedex_full.Shield: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. The Pokémon is said to live for 1,000 years.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent. This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails and to live for a millennium.

name: Jigglypuff
pokedex: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.
pokedex_full.Gold: If it inflates to SING a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_full.Silver: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.
pokedex_full.Ruby: JIGGLYPUFF’s vocal chords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This POKéMON uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: When this POKéMON sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, JIGGLYPUFF cannot breathe, endangering its life.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a JIGGLYPUFF’s song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_full.Black/White: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Looking into its cute, round eyes makes it start singing a song so pleasant listeners can’t help but fall asleep.
pokedex_full.X: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
pokedex_full.Y: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Jigglypuff’s vocal cords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This Pokémon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: When this Pokémon sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, Jigglypuff cannot breathe, endangering its life.
pokedex_full.Sun: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you’ll become sleepy right away.
pokedex_full.Moon: Jigglypuff possess a vocal range that exceeds 12 octaves, but each individual’s singing skill depends on its own effort.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Recordings of Jigglypuff’s strange lullabies can be purchased from department stores. These CDs can be found near the bedding area.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The songs they sing are totally different depending on the region they live in. Some even sound like they’re shouting!
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Uses its cute round eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.
pokedex_full.Sword: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.
pokedex_full.Shield: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_full.Violet: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.

name: Wigglytuff
pokedex: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
pokedex_full.Gold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_full.Silver: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a BODY SLAM.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can’t stop touching it.
pokedex_full.Ruby: WIGGLYTUFF has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this POKéMON’s eyes, it is quickly washed away.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: WIGGLYTUFF’s body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this POKéMON can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, WIGGLYTUFF bounces along lightly like a balloon.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a WIGGLYTUFF is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its fine fur feels so pleasant, those who accidentally touch it cannot take their hands away.
pokedex_full.X: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_full.Y: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Wigglytuff has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pokémon’s eyes, it is quickly washed away.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Wigglytuff’s body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this Pokémon can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, Wigglytuff bounces along lightly like a balloon.
pokedex_full.Sun: It sheds its fine fur when the seasons change. The fur is gathered and spun into a luxurious yarn.
pokedex_full.Moon: As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Thanks to its bouncy body and fine fur, this Pokémon is sought after. Holding one in your arms while you sleep feels great.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When it gets angry, it inhales with all its might, and its body gradually inflates. Sometimes they can grow 20 times larger!
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
pokedex_full.Sword: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
pokedex_full.Violet: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can’t stop touching it.

name: Zubat
pokedex: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
pokedex_full.Gold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Silver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
pokedex_full.Crystal: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
pokedex_full.Ruby: ZUBAT remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It forms colonies in perpetually dark  places and uses ultrasonic waves to   identify and approach targets.
pokedex_full.Emerald: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
pokedex_full.Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.
pokedex_full.X: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Y: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
pokedex_full.Sun: It sleeps in caves during the day. It has no eyes, so to check its surroundings while flying, it emits ultrasonic waves.
pokedex_full.Moon: When exposed to sunlight, they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It has no eyeballs, so it can’t see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Their skin is so thin that they’ll be burned if sunlight hits them. When it gets cold out, they gather together to warm one another’s bodies.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
pokedex_full.Sword: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
pokedex_full.Shield: Zubat live in caves, down where the sun’s light won’t reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.

name: Golbat
pokedex: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.
pokedex_full.Gold: However hard its victim’s hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
pokedex_full.Silver: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it plunges its fangs into its prey, it instantly draws and gulps down more than ten ounces of blood.
pokedex_full.Ruby: GOLBAT loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This POKéMON flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: GOLBAT bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim’s blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and POKéMON.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It clamps down on its prey with needle-sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of blood in one gulp.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and POKéMON. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It loves the blood of humans and Pokémon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: However hard its victim’s hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Flitting around in the dead of night, it sinks its fangs into its prey and drains a nearly fatal amount of blood.
pokedex_full.X: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_full.Y: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokémon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Golbat bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim’s blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its thick fangs are hollow like straws, making them unexpectedly fragile. These fangs are specialized for sucking blood.
pokedex_full.Moon: Sometimes they drink so much blood, they can’t fly anymore. Then they fall to the ground and become food for other Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Every once in a while, you’ll see a Golbat that’s missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They can suck down over 10 ounces of blood in one go. They have been known to drink so much blood that they can no longer fly.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and to suck blood.
pokedex_full.Sword: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokémon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It loves the blood of humans and Pokémon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow and akin to straws.

name: Oddish
pokedex: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.
pokedex_full.Gold: Awakened by moonlight, it roams  actively at night. In the day, it stays quietly underground.
pokedex_full.Silver: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
pokedex_full.Crystal: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
pokedex_full.Ruby: During the daytime, ODDISH buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from  the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: ODDISH searches for fertile, nutrient-rich soil, then plants itself. During the daytime, while it is planted, this POKéMON’s feet are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots of trees.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its scientific name is “Oddium Wanderus.” At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Awakened by moonlight, it roams actively at night. In the day, it stays quietly underground.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: Gloom
pokedex: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

pokedex_full.Yellow: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

pokedex_full.Silver: It secretes a sticky, drool-like honey. Although sweet, it smells too repulsive to get very close.

pokedex_full.FireRed: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: The nectar it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious that it can make noses curl from more than a mile away.

name: Vileplume
pokedex: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Flaps its broad flower petals to scatter its poisonous pollen. The flapping sound is very loud.
pokedex_full.Gold: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedex_full.Silver: The bud bursts into bloom with a bang. It then starts scattering allergenic, poisonous pollen.
pokedex_full.Crystal: By shaking its big petals, it scatters toxic pollen into the air, turning the air yellow.
pokedex_full.Ruby: VILEPLUME’s toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That’s why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: VILEPLUME has the world’s largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this POKéMON catches and devours them.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its petals are the largest in the world. It fiendishly scatters allergy-causing pollen from its petals.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokedex_full.Emerald: In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a VILEPLUME turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The bud bursts into bloom with a bang. It then starts scattering allergenic, poisonous pollen.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.
pokedex_full.X: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokedex_full.Y: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Vileplume’s toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That’s why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Vileplume has the world’s largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this Pokémon catches and devours them.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Flaps its broad flower petals to scatter its poisonous pollen. The flapping sound is very loud.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedex_full.Shield: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

name: Paras
pokedex: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
pokedex_full.Gold: It is doused with mushroom spores when it is born. As its body grows, mushrooms sprout from its back.
pokedex_full.Silver: As its body grows large, oriental mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The tochukaso growing on this POKéMON’s back orders it to extract juice from tree trunks.
pokedex_full.Ruby: PARAS has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from the BUG POKéMON host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: PARAS has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this BUG POKéMON host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Growing out of the bug’s back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A PARAS has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host PARAS.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It is doused with mushroom spores when it is born. As its body grows, mushrooms sprout from its back.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: As its body grows, large mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.
pokedex_full.X: Growing out of the bug’s back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
pokedex_full.Y: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Paras has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this Bug Pokémon host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
pokedex_full.Sun: No matter how much it eats, the mushrooms growing on its back steal away most of the nutrients it consumes.
pokedex_full.Moon: Mushrooms called tochukaso sprout from its back. They can be dried and powdered to make a medicine used to extend life.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Whether it’s due to a lack of moisture or a lack of nutrients, in Alola the mushrooms on Paras don’t grow up quite right.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are controlling the bug. Even if the bug bugs the mushrooms, they tell it to bug off.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Sometimes seen at the foot of trees in humid forests. The mushrooms on its back—called tochukaso—are not present on infant specimens and instead emerge as Paras matures.

name: Parasect
pokedex: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.
pokedex_full.Gold: It stays mostly in dark, damp places, the preference not of the bug, but of the big mushrooms on its back.
pokedex_full.Silver: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When nothing’s left to extract from the bug, the mushrooms on its back leave spores on the bug’s egg.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: PARASECT is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It scatters toxic spores from the mushroom cap. In China, the spores are used as herbal medicine.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
pokedex_full.Emerald: PARASECT are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Platinum: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls PARASECT. It scatters poisonous spores.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It is controlled by a mushroom grown larger than the bug body. It is said to prefer damp places.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It stays mostly in dark, damp places, the preference not of the bug, but of the big mushroom on its back.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
pokedex_full.X: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
pokedex_full.Y: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Parasect is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
pokedex_full.Sun: The large mushroom on its back controls it. It often fights over territory with Shiinotic.
pokedex_full.Moon: It scatters toxic spores from its mushroom cap. Once harvested, these spores can be steeped and boiled down to prepare herbal medicines.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its poisonous spores are also used in traditional medicine. Apparently, spores produced in Alola are not of very good quality.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Parasect is controlled by a mushroom that has grown larger than its host’s body. The Pokémon scatters poisonous spores.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It is controlled by the mushroom, which has grown larger than the bug body. It is said to prefer damp places.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large mushroom is in control of Parasect’s actions.

name: Venonat
pokedex: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its large eyes act as radars. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its eyes also function as radar units. It catches and eats small bugs that hide in darkness.
pokedex_full.Silver: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches and eats small bugs at night that are attracted by light.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The small bugs it eats appear only at night, so it sleeps in a hole in a tree until night falls.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: VENONAT is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be active in darkness. The eyes can also shoot powerful beams.

name: Venomoth
pokedex: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: Diglett
pokedex: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It prefers dark places. It spends most of its time underground, though it may pop up in caves.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.
pokedex_full.Silver: If a DIGLETT DIGS through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It digs underground and chews on tree roots, sticking its head out only when the sun isn’t bright.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: DIGLETT are raised in most farms. The reason is simple - wherever this POKéMON burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
pokedex_full.Emerald: DIGLETT are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.

pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If a DIGLETT digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

name: Dugtrio
pokedex: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it’s an earthquake.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
pokedex_full.Silver: Extremely powerful, they can DIG through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.
pokedex_full.Crystal: These DIGLETT triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: DUGTRIO are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
pokedex_full.FireRed: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Extremely powerful, they can dig through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.

pokedex_full.Moon: Despite the closeness between this Pokémon and farmers and other people, no one has ever seen the parts of it concealed underground.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: While the three of them normally get along splendidly, on rare occasions a huge fight will break out over which head gets to eat first.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Dugtrio’s heads are sleek and smooth and incredibly hard. It can dig through any soil with its headbutts.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: A team of triplets that can burrow to a depth of 60 miles. It’s reported that this triggers an earthquake.
pokedex_full.Sword: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokedex_full.Shield: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

pokedex_full.Violet: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

name: Meowth
pokedex: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can’t stop from picking them up.
pokedex_full.Gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can’t stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
pokedex_full.Silver: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and secretly hoards.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines too.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
pokedex_full.FireRed: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
pokedex_full.Emerald: MEOWTH withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can’t stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and secretly hoards.

pokedex_full.X: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

pokedex_full.Sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
pokedex_full.Moon: It loves shiny things. It often fights with Murkrow over prey they’re both trying to catch.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When visiting a junkyard, you may catch sight of it having an intense fight with Murkrow over shiny objects.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It loves coins, so if you give it one, you can make friends with Meowth easily. But it’s fickle, so you can’t count on that friendship lasting.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can’t stop itself from picking them up.
pokedex_full.Sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
pokedex_full.Shield: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It is nocturnal by nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter as brightly as the shiny object.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
pokedex_full.Violet: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines, too.

name: Persian
pokedex: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.
pokedex_full.Gold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: PERSIAN has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers   sense air movements to determine what is in the POKéMON’s surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. It is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A PERSIAN’s six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

pokedex_full.Sun: It has a violent temperament. It will attack anything that looks it in the eye. Its sharp claws inflict deep wounds.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although the jewel on its forehead appears to be a different color than those of Alolan Persian, it’s mostly made of the same material.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is popular with rich people. It’s also targeted by hunters who are after the jewel in its forehead.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.
pokedex_full.Sword: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
