pokedex_full.Scarlet: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
pokedex_full.Violet: It has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. This is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite.

name: Psyduck
pokedex: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.
pokedex_full.Gold: It has mystical powers but doesn’t recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
pokedex_full.Silver: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The only time it can use its psychic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.
pokedex_full.Ruby: PSYDUCK uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this POKéMON  generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: If it uses its mysterious power, PSYDUCK can’t remember having done so. It apparently can’t form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
pokedex_full.Emerald: When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.
pokedex_full.Diamond: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can’t remember doing so, however.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It never remembers using its odd powers, so it always tilts its head in puzzlement.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It has mystical powers but doesn’t recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When headaches stimulate its brain cells, which are usually inactive, it can use a mysterious power.
pokedex_full.X: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
pokedex_full.Y: It has mystical powers but doesn’t recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Psyduck uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this Pokémon generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: If it uses its mysterious power, Psyduck can’t remember having done so. It apparently can’t form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.
pokedex_full.Sun: As a result of headaches so fierce they cause it to cry, it sometimes uses psychokinesis without meaning to.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon is troubled by constant headaches. The more pain it’s in, the more powerful its psychokinesis becomes.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It has been found that its brain cells are 10 times more active when Psyduck is experiencing a headache.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but whether it intends to do so is not known.
pokedex_full.Sword: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.
pokedex_full.Shield: As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can’t remember doing so, however.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It never remembers using its odd powers, so it always tilts its head in puzzlement.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Suffers perpetual headaches. If the agony grows too great, Psyduck’s latent power erupts, contrary to Psyduck’s intent. Ergo, I am exploring ways to ease the pain.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
pokedex_full.Violet: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.

name: Golduck
pokedex: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swimming gracefully in lakes.
pokedex_full.Gold: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.
pokedex_full.Silver: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.
pokedex_full.Ruby: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of GOLDUCK give it frightening speed. This POKéMON is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: GOLDUCK is the fastest swimmer among all POKéMON. It swims effortlessly, even in a rough, stormy sea. It sometimes rescues people from wrecked ships floundering in high seas.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster Kappa.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A GOLDUCK is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.
pokedex_full.Diamond: A Pokémon that lives in lakes. It swims faster than any human swimming champion.
pokedex_full.Pearl: The flippers of its well-developed limbs give it shocking speed. It is the best swimmer among Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When its forehead shines mysteriously, Golduck can use the full extent of its power.
pokedex_full.X: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
pokedex_full.Y: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of Golduck give it frightening speed. This Pokémon is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.

pokedex_full.Sun: It is said that the red part of its forehead grants supernatural powers to those who possess one, so it was over-hunted in the past.
pokedex_full.Moon: It swims along the banks of lakes and catches fish Pokémon. It takes them to the shore and quietly eats them up.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Even fast-swimming fish Pokémon can be disabled by Golduck. It brings them to a standstill and seizes them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A professional swimmer, it can continue swimming for two days straight by waving its long tail skillfully.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Its long, slim limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swimming gracefully in lakes.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.
pokedex_full.Shield: Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: This Pokémon lives in lakes. It swims faster than any world-class swimmer.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: The flippers of its well-developed limbs give it shocking speed. It is the best swimmer among Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet. Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way through the high waves.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.
pokedex_full.Violet: It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.

name: Mankey
pokedex: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
pokedex_full.Yellow: An agile POKéMON that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.
pokedex_full.Gold: It is extremely ill-tempered. Groups of them will attack any handy target for no reason.
pokedex_full.Silver: It’s unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can’t distinguish friends from foes.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: When MANKEY starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it’s a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Light and agile on its feet, and ferocious in temperament. When angered, it flies into an uncontrollable frenzy.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away  the next instant.
pokedex_full.Emerald: When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it’s a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It is extremely ill-tempered. Groups of them will attack any handy target for no reason.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It’s unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can’t distinguish friends from foes.

pokedex_full.X: It’s unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can’t distinguish friends from foes.
pokedex_full.Y: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

pokedex_full.Sun: It can spontaneously become enraged. Everyone near it clears out as it rampages, and the resulting loneliness makes it angrier still.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its raging tires it out and causes it to fall asleep, but the anger resonating in its dreams causes it to wake up—which infuriates it all over again.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The smallest of things could cause it to lose its temper. Because it doesn’t hold in its stress, this Pokémon can live a long time.

pokedex_full.Violet: It is extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
pokedex: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
pokedex_full.Gold: If approached while asleep, it may awaken and angrily give chase in a groggy state of semi-sleep.
pokedex_full.Silver: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It will beat up anyone who makes it mad, even if it has to chase them until the end of the world.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: When PRIMEAPE becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.
pokedex_full.Emerald: When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If approached while asleep, it may awaken and angrily give chase in a groggy state of semi-sleep.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

pokedex_full.Sun: It has been known to become so angry that it dies as a result. Its face looks peaceful in death, however.
pokedex_full.Moon: Some researchers theorize that Primeape remains angry even when inside a Poké Ball.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It will never forgive opponents who have angered it. Even after it has beaten them down until they can’t move, it never ever forgives.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The blood vessels in its brain are sturdier than those of other Pokémon, so it can stay healthy despite its constant raging.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It becomes angry if it sees an opponent’s eyes and gets angrier if the opponent runs. Even after it beats the opponent, it is still angry.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.
pokedex_full.Violet: Some researchers theorize that Primeape remains angry even when inside a Poké Ball.

pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pokedex_full.Violet: It’s very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

name: Poliwag
pokedex: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.
pokedex_full.X: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
pokedex_full.Y: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: The surface of Poliwhirl’s body is always wet and slick with a slimy fluid. Because of this slippery covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
pokedex_full.Sun: Although it can live on land, it prefers to stay in the water, where it has fewer natural enemies.
pokedex_full.Moon: It marches over the land in search of bug Pokémon to eat. Then it takes them underwater so it can dine on them where it’s safe.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it has become capable of living on land, it spends its time in the water, where its prey, fish Pokémon, are plentiful.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its health suffers when its skin dries out, so be sure to moisturize it diligently.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Under attack, it uses its belly spiral to put the foe to sleep. It then makes its escape.
pokedex_full.Sword: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

name: Poliwrath
pokedex: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.
pokedex_full.Gold: This strong and skilled swimmer is even capable of crossing the Pacific Ocean just by kicking.
pokedex_full.Silver: Although an energetic, skilled swimmer that uses all of its muscles, it lives on dry land.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It can use its well-developed arms and legs to run on the surface of the water for a split second.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: POLIWRATH’s highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this POKéMON can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.
pokedex_full.FireRed: An adept swimmer, it knows the front crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster than the best human swimmers.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its highly developed muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. This POKéMON can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: This strong and skilled swimmer is even capable of crossing the Pacific Ocean just by kicking.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Although an energetic, skilled swimmer that uses all of its muscles, it lives on dry land.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
pokedex_full.X: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
pokedex_full.Y: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Poliwrath’s highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this Pokémon can swim back and forth across the ocean without effort.
pokedex_full.Sun: Poliwrath in the Alola region are strong swimmers that use the breaststroke. Many children learn to swim by imitating Poliwrath.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its percentage of body fat is nearly zero. Its body is entirely muscle, which makes it heavy and forces its swimming prowess to develop.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It’s quite a gifted swimmer, even among Water-type Pokémon, but it normally spends its time on land.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The muscles it has developed through swimming are thick and powerful. When it lands a square punch, it can turn huge boulders to dust.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake world-class swimmers.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
pokedex_full.Shield: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: With its extremely tough muscles, it could keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.

name: Abra
pokedex: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.
pokedex_full.Gold: It senses impending attacks and TELEPORTS away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it decides to TELEPORT randomly, it creates the illusion that it has created copies of itself.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.
pokedex_full.Ruby: ABRA sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this POKéMON immediately teleports to safety.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: ABRA needs to sleep for eighteen hours a day. If it doesn’t, this POKéMON loses its ability to use telekinetic powers. If it is attacked, ABRA escapes using TELEPORT while it is still sleeping.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Using its ability to read minds, it will sense impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A POKéMON that sleeps 18 hours a day. Observation revealed that it uses TELEPORT to change its location once every hour.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Even while asleep, it maintains a telepathic radar. It teleports when it is threatened.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It senses impending attacks and teleports away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it decides to teleport randomly, it evokes the illusion that it has created copies of itself.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.
pokedex_full.X: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.
pokedex_full.Y: It senses impending attacks and teleports away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Abra sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this Pokémon immediately teleports to safety.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Abra needs to sleep for eighteen hours a day. If it doesn’t, this Pokémon loses its ability to use telekinetic powers. If it is attacked, Abra escapes using Teleport while it is still sleeping.
pokedex_full.Sun: It sleeps 18 hours a day. Even while sleeping, it will teleport itself to treetops and pick and eat berries there.
pokedex_full.Moon: It can teleport itself to safety while it’s asleep, but when it wakes, it doesn’t know where it is, so it panics.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It uses various psychic powers even while it’s sleeping, so you can’t tell whether or not it’s awake.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It can read others’ minds and will teleport away when danger approaches. You must clear your mind if you want to catch it.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.
pokedex_full.Shield: Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Even while asleep, it maintains a telepathic radar. It teleports when it is threatened.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra can control its psychic powers—should danger approach, the Pokémon will simply teleport away.

name: Kadabra
pokedex: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Many odd things happen if this POKéMON is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backwards.
pokedex_full.Gold: It possesses strong spiritual power. The more danger it faces, the stronger its psychic power.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it closes its eyes, twice as many alpha particles come out of the surface of its body.
pokedex_full.Ruby: KADABRA emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a TRAINER of this POKéMON.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: KADABRA holds a silver spoon in its hand. The spoon is used to amplify the alpha waves in its brain. Without the spoon, the POKéMON is said to be limited to half the usual amount of its telekinetic powers.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into KADABRA while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.
pokedex_full.Diamond: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.
pokedex_full.Pearl: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong ha waves that can ruin precision devices.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It possesses strong spiritual power. The more danger it faces, the stronger its psychic power.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.
pokedex_full.X: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.
pokedex_full.Y: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Kadabra emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a Trainer of this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Kadabra holds a silver spoon in its hand. The spoon is used to amplify the alpha waves in its brain. Without the spoon, the Pokémon is said to be limited to half the usual amount of its telekinetic powers.
pokedex_full.Sun: A theory exists that this Pokémon was a young boy who couldn’t control his psychic powers and ended up transformed into this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Moon: Kadabra’s presence infests televisions and monitors with creepy shadows that bring bad luck.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stares at a silver spoon to amplify its psychic powers before it lets loose. Apparently, gold spoons are no good.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It possesses strong mental capabilities, but its psychic powers are halved when it’s not holding a silver spoon.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Many odd things happen if this Pokémon is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backward.
pokedex_full.Sword: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon’s telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision instruments.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: There are rumors that a child with mystical powers became a Kadabra; however, this remains unverified. I suspect that the spoon Kadabra holds enhances its brain waves.

name: Alakazam
pokedex: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A POKéMON that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns--that’s why this POKéMON is smart.
pokedex_full.Gold: Closing both its eyes heightens all its other senses. This enables it to use its abilities to their extremes.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It has an IQ of 5000. It calculates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.
pokedex_full.Ruby: ALAKAZAM’s brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This POKéMON holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: ALAKAZAM’s brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this POKéMON an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It has a thorough memory of everything that has occurred in the world.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It does not like physical attacks very  much. Instead, it freely uses extrasensory powers to defeat foes.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.
pokedex_full.Emerald: While it has strong psychic abilities and high intelligence, an ALAKAZAM’s muscles are very weak. It uses psychic power to move its body.
pokedex_full.Diamond: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Its highly developed brain is on par with a supercomputer. It can use all forms of psychic abilities.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Closing both its eyes heightens all its other senses. This enables it to use its abilities to their extremes.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.
pokedex_full.X: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
pokedex_full.Y: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Alakazam’s brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This Pokémon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Alakazam’s brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this Pokémon an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It has a thorough memory of everything that has occurred in the world.
pokedex_full.Sun: It is said to have an IQ of approximately 5,000. Its overflowing psychokinetic powers cause headaches to anyone nearby.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its brain cells continue to increase in number until its death. The older the Alakazam, the larger its head.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Alakazam uses its psychic powers to make the spoons it carries. Each spoon is an original that there’s only one of in the whole world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If it trusts someone deeply, it will let them have one of its spoons. Anything you eat with that spoon is apparently delicious.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: A Pokémon that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns—that’s why this Pokémon is smart.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
pokedex_full.Shield: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. It’s said that this Pokémon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its highly developed brain is on par with a supercomputer. It can use all forms of psychic abilities.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.

name: Machop
pokedex: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.
pokedex_full.Gold: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
pokedex_full.Silver: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It trains by lifting rocks in the mountains. It can even pick up a GRAVELER with ease.
pokedex_full.Ruby: MACHOP’s muscles are special - they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This POKéMON has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: MACHOP exercises by hefting around a GRAVELER as if it were a barbell. There are some MACHOP that travel the world in a quest to master all kinds of martial arts.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It continually undertakes strenuous training to master all forms of martial arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It hefts a GRAVELER repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Its muscles never cramp however much it trains. It lives in the mountains away from humans.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of GEODUDE at once.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of Geodude at once.
pokedex_full.X: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
pokedex_full.Y: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Machop’s muscles are special—they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This Pokémon has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Machop exercises by hefting around a Graveler as if it were a barbell. There are some Machop that travel the world in a quest to master all kinds of martial arts.
pokedex_full.Sun: It loves working out. As it gazes at its muscles, which continue to swell day by day, it becomes more and more dedicated to its training.
pokedex_full.Moon: With its superhuman strength, it’s able to throw a hundred people all at the same time. Its strength comes from lifting Graveler every day.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Once this Pokémon has gained enough confidence and muscle from training with its friends, it challenges Makuhita to a battle.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It likes food that’s highly nutritious because its instincts drive it to build muscle efficiently.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedex_full.Shield: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its muscles never cramp however much it trains. It lives in the mountains away from humans.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Though as small as a child, it has strength enough to easily throw a well-built adult. Striving to become ever stronger, Machop trains by carrying a Graveler on its shoulders.

name: Machoke
pokedex: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.
pokedex_full.Gold: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable POKéMON never gets tired.
pokedex_full.Silver: The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.
pokedex_full.Crystal: This tough POKéMON always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.
pokedex_full.Ruby: MACHOKE’s thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This POKéMON has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: MACHOKE undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this POKéMON heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A belt is worn by a MACHOKE to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.
pokedex_full.Diamond: MACHOKE’s boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable Pokémon never gets tired.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
pokedex_full.X: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedex_full.Y: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Machoke’s thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This Pokémon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Machoke undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this Pokémon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.
pokedex_full.Sun: As a result of its continual workouts, it has developed tremendous power. It uses that power to help people with their work.
pokedex_full.Moon: It willingly assists with hard labor because it knows the work is good training for its muscles.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it encounters an enemy that’s truly mighty, this Pokémon removes the power-save belt from its waist and unleashes its full power.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A popular motif for sculptures, its incredibly well-developed muscles have captured the imagination of many an artist.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this Pokémon would be unstoppable.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Machoke’s boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that kind of strength, it helps people do heavy jobs.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with tasks such as construction and clearing land.

name: Machamp
pokedex: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Yellow: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.
pokedex_full.Gold: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
pokedex_full.Silver: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Crystal: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
pokedex_full.Ruby: MACHAMP has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This POKéMON tends to leap into action before it thinks.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: MACHAMP is known as the POKéMON that has mastered every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown far over the horizon.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its superpowerful punches are said to knock the victim flying clear over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It is impossible to defend against punches and chops doled out by its four arms. Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces a tough opponent.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It can knock a train flying with a punch. However, it is terrible at delicate work using its fingers.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
pokedex_full.X: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
pokedex_full.Y: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Machamp has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This Pokémon tends to leap into action before it thinks.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Machamp is known as the Pokémon that has mastered every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown far over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Sun: It unleashes megaton-level punches that send opponents flying clear over the horizon.
pokedex_full.Moon: It can lift heavy loads with the greatest of ease. It can even heft dump trucks. But its clumsy fingers prevent it from doing any precision work.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It grasps its opponents with its four arms and twists them up in an intricate hold. People call it “the Machamp special.”
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: With four arms, it can attack and defend simultaneously. It’s said to have mastered every martial art in the world.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this Pokémon fires off awesome punches.
pokedex_full.Sword: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
pokedex_full.Shield: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It can knock a train flying with a punch. However, it is terrible at delicate work using its fingers.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: In close combat, its four arms afford it offensive and defensive supremacy. In but a blink, this valiant Pokémon can overwhelm its foes with more than 1,000 blows from its fists.

name: Bellsprout
pokedex: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.
pokedex_full.Gold: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
pokedex_full.Silver: It plants its feet deep underground to replenish water. It can’t escape its enemy while it’s rooted.
pokedex_full.Crystal: If it notices anything that moves, it immediately flings its vine at the object.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this POKéMON spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It appears to use its root feet to replenish moisture.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, it leaks a fluid that melts even iron.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It plants its feet deep underground to replenish water. It can’t escape its enemy while it’s rooted.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.
