name: Haunter
pokedex: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
pokedex_full.Yellow: By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.
pokedex_full.Gold: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently stalking its next victim.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: HAUNTER is a dangerous POKéMON. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
pokedex_full.FireRed: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, HAUNTER is there.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
pokedex_full.Emerald: If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don’t approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim’s life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently stalking its next victim.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
pokedex_full.X: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
pokedex_full.Y: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim’s life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
pokedex_full.Sun: It strikes at humans from total darkness. Those licked by its cold tongue grow weaker with each passing day until they die.
pokedex_full.Moon: It fears the light and revels in the dark. It may be on the verge of extinction in cities that stay brightly lit at night.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: On moonless nights, Haunter searches for someone to curse, so it’s best not to go out walking around.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s dangerous to go outside alone on nights when you’re feeling sad. Haunter will catch you, and you won’t be able to go back home.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
pokedex_full.Shield: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal its victim’s life-force. It lurks in darkness, waiting for prey.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls, appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of a Haunter’s lick will wither to death day by day.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
pokedex_full.Violet: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, Haunter lurks, silently stalking its next victim.

name: Gengar
pokedex: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
pokedex_full.Gold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
pokedex_full.Silver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Hiding in people’s shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be GENGAR’s doing.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey’s life force.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a GENGAR delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
pokedex_full.X: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Y: Hiding in people’s shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedex_full.Sun: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.
pokedex_full.Moon: It apparently wishes for a traveling companion. Since it was once human itself, it tries to create one by taking the lives of other humans.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Even your home isn’t safe. Gengar will lurk in whatever dark corner of a room it can find and wait for its chance to catch its prey.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
pokedex_full.Sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
pokedex_full.Shield: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that in rooms where Gengar is hiding, the temperature drops by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey’s life-force.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Possesses potential victims’ shadows in an effort to steal away the victims’ lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!
pokedex_full.Scarlet: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
pokedex_full.Violet: Hiding in people’s shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

name: Onix
pokedex: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.
pokedex_full.Gold: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.
pokedex_full.Silver: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
pokedex_full.Crystal: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: ONIX has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this POKéMON does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.
pokedex_full.Emerald: There is a magnet in its brain that prevents an ONIX from losing direction while tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes steadily rounder and smoother.
pokedex_full.Diamond: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It squirms through the ground using its long and rugged body. It always eats while burrowing.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Opening its large mouth, it ingests massive amounts of soil and creates long tunnels.
pokedex_full.X: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
pokedex_full.Y: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
pokedex_full.Sword: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
pokedex_full.Shield: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It squirms through the ground using its long and rugged body. It always eats while burrowing.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground, feeding on boulders as it goes.

name: Drowzee
pokedex: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
pokedex_full.Yellow: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.
pokedex_full.Gold: If you think that you had a good dream, but you can’t remember it, a DROWZEE has probably eaten it.
pokedex_full.Silver: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that one of these POKéMON is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
pokedex_full.FireRed: A descendent of the legendary animal baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is skilled at hypnotism.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
pokedex_full.Emerald: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that a DROWZEE is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If you think that you had a good dream but you can’t remember it, a DROWZEE has probably eaten it.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
pokedex_full.X: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
pokedex_full.Y: If you think that you had a good dream but you can’t remember it, a Drowzee has probably eaten it.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that one of these Pokémon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
pokedex_full.Sun: A Pokémon that nourishes itself by eating dreams, it is thought to share common ancestry with Munna and Musharna.
pokedex_full.Moon: It finds really fun dreams tasty. When it makes friends with people, it may show them the most delicious dreams it’s ever eaten.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It can be spotted near recreational facilities, intending to eat the pleasant dreams of children who enjoyed themselves there that day.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It puts its prey to sleep and devours their dreams. It seems that bad dreams taste sour, so Drowzee doesn’t particularly like eating them.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.
pokedex_full.Violet: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.

name: Hypno
pokedex: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
pokedex_full.Gold: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
pokedex_full.Silver: Always holding a pendulum that it rocks at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: HYPNO holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this POKéMON searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took  away a child it hypnotized.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
pokedex_full.Emerald: The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum in a HYPNO’s hand lull the foe into deep hypnosis. While searching for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Always holding a pendulum that it swings at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
pokedex_full.X: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
pokedex_full.Y: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
pokedex_full.Sun: While it is an extremely dangerous Pokémon, people who are in need of a good, sound sleep call it their savior.
pokedex_full.Moon: As a matter of course, it makes anyone it meets fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams. Anyone having a good dream, it carries off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: In Alola, Komala is Hypno’s main target. It rarely harms people.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: There are some Hypno that assist doctors with patients who can’t sleep at night in hospitals.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
pokedex_full.Violet: Always holding a pendulum that it swings at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.

name: Krabby
pokedex: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.
pokedex_full.Gold: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
pokedex_full.Silver: The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walking sideways.
pokedex_full.Crystal: If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: KRABBY live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these POKéMON can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
pokedex_full.Emerald: KRABBY live in holes dug into beaches. On sandy shores with little in the way of food, they can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walking sideways.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are lost in battle.

name: Kingler
pokedex: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
pokedex_full.Yellow: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.
pokedex_full.Gold: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer’s size makes it difficult to aim properly.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its balance and staggers.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: KINGLER has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the POKéMON quickly tires.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: The large pincer has 10,000-horsepower crushing force. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It waves its huge, oversized claw in the air to communicate with others. But since the claw is so heavy, this POKéMON quickly tires.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

name: Voltorb
pokedex: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
pokedex_full.Yellow: It is said to camouflage itself as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.
pokedex_full.Gold: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
pokedex_full.Silver: It was discovered when POKé BALLS were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
pokedex_full.Crystal: During the study of this POKéMON, it was discovered that its components are not found in nature.
pokedex_full.Ruby: VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures POKé BALLS. The link between that sighting and the fact that this POKéMON looks very similar to a POKé BALL remains a mystery.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: VOLTORB is extremely sensitive - it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a POKé BALL was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.
pokedex_full.FireRed: A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, it has zapped many people.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It bears an uncanny and unexplained resemblance to a POKé BALL. Because it explodes at the slightest shock, even veteran TRAINERS treat it with caution.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on contact.
pokedex_full.X: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
pokedex_full.Y: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Voltorb was first sighted at a company that manufactures Poké Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this Pokémon looks very similar to a Poké Ball remains a mystery.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Voltorb is extremely sensitive—it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a Poké Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
pokedex_full.Violet: It’s usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

name: Electrode
pokedex: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
pokedex_full.Gold: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
pokedex_full.Silver: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.
pokedex_full.Ruby: ELECTRODE eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this POKéMON exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: One of ELECTRODE’s characteristics is its attraction to electricity. It is a problematical POKéMON that congregates mostly at electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just been generated.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
pokedex_full.Emerald: They appear in great numbers at electric power plants. Because they feed on electricity, they cause massive and chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
pokedex_full.X: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”
pokedex_full.Y: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: One of Electrode’s characteristics is its attraction to electricity. It is a problematical Pokémon that congregates mostly at electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just been generated.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.
pokedex_full.Violet: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of the Bomb Ball.

name: Exeggcute
pokedex: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
pokedex_full.Yellow: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.
pokedex_full.Gold: The shell is very durable. Even if it cracks, it can survive without spilling the contents.
pokedex_full.Silver: Using telepathy only they can receive, they always form a cluster of six EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Crystal: If even one is separated from the group, the energy bond between the six will make them rejoin instantly.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: This POKéMON consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, EXEGGCUTE is close to evolution.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It consists of six eggs that care for each other. The eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear, it is close to evolution.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Their shells are very durable. Even if they crack, they can survive without spilling their contents.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Using telepathy only they can employ, they always form a cluster of six EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
pokedex_full.X: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
pokedex_full.Y: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its six eggs use telepathy to communicate among themselves. It is believed to carry plant genes and the genes of other species.
pokedex_full.Moon: Six of them together form a full-fledged Pokémon. It’s often hunted by Crabrawler, but uses psychokinesis to drive it off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Six of them form a single Pokémon. Should one of the six be lost, the next morning there will once more be six.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although they are the same size as other Exeggcute, the ones produced in Alola are quite heavy. Their shells are packed full.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be six heads for it to maintain balance.
pokedex_full.Sword: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
pokedex_full.Shield: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.

name: Exeggutor
pokedex: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
pokedex_full.Silver: If a head drops off, it emits a telepathic call in search of others to form an EXEGGCUTE cluster.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: EXEGGUTOR originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is called “The Walking Tropical Rainforest.” Each of the nuts has a face and a will of its own.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is said that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Originally from the tropics, EXEGGUTOR’s heads grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall, they group to form an EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If a head drops off, it emits a telepathic call in search of others to form an EXEGGCUTE cluster.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
pokedex_full.X: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
pokedex_full.Y: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.
pokedex_full.Sun: Each of its heads has its own will. They use telepathy to discuss their plans before coming to a joint decision.
pokedex_full.Moon: When the time comes, one of its three heads falls off. Before long, the fallen head grows into an Exeggcute.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It engages its enemies using psychic powers. Each of its three heads fires off psychokinetic energy, tripling its power.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Each of its three heads has its own thoughts. When they want to go in different directions, Exeggutor becomes unable to move.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the three heads thinks about whatever it likes.
pokedex_full.Sword: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.
pokedex_full.Shield: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It is called the Walking Jungle. If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
pokedex: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.
pokedex_full.Gold: If it is sad or lonely, the skull it wears shakes, and emits a plaintive and mournful sound.
pokedex_full.Silver: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It lost its mother after its birth. It wears its mother’s skull, never revealing its true face.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: CUBONE pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the POKéMON wears are made by the tears it sheds.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull it wears are from its tears.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: If it is sad or lonely, the skull it wears shakes and emits a plaintive and mournful sound.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.
pokedex_full.X: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
pokedex_full.Y: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the Pokémon wears are made by the tears it sheds.
pokedex_full.Sun: When it thinks of its deceased mother, it weeps loudly. Mandibuzz that hear its cries will attack it from the air.
pokedex_full.Moon: The skull it wears on its head is that of its dead mother. According to some, it will evolve when it comes to terms with the pain of her death.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: At night, it weeps loudly for its dead mother, but those cries only attract its natural enemy—Mandibuzz.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It wears its mother’s skull on its head, so no one knows what its bare face looks like. However, it’s clear that it’s always crying.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.
pokedex_full.Sword: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.

name: Marowak
pokedex: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Small and weak, this POKéMON is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.
pokedex_full.Gold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out messages to others.
pokedex_full.Silver: It collects bones from an unknown place. A MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world, rumors say.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for MAROWAK. It gets its bones from those graves.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has grown tough by overcoming the grief of losing its mother. Its tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out messages to others.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It collects bones from an unknown place. Some whisper that a MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
pokedex_full.X: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
pokedex_full.Y: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This Pokémon’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
pokedex_full.Sun: Originally, it was weak and timid. After evolution, its temperament becomes violent, and it begins to wield bones as weapons.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon is out for vengeance on its natural enemy, Mandibuzz. It throws bones like boomerangs to try to take it down.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It throws bones at Mandibuzz to knock it down. It’s thought that Marowak is trying to avenge its parent.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They thump their bones rhythmically to communicate among themselves. There are nearly 50 different rhythmic patterns.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Small and weak, this Pokémon is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.
pokedex_full.Shield: When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: The bones it uses have been in its possession since it was born. It has a ferocious nature.

name: Hitmonlee
pokedex: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
pokedex_full.Yellow: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.
pokedex_full.Gold: This amazing POKéMON has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It is also called the Kick Master. It uses its elastic legs to execute every known kick.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: HITMONLEE’s legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra-long, loping strides.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Its legs freely stretch and contract. Using these springlike limbs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its tired legs.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

pokedex_full.Sword: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
pokedex_full.Shield: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its legs can stretch to double their length. First-time foes are startled by Hitmonlee’s extensible reach.

name: Hitmonchan
pokedex: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall in the same way as a drill.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
pokedex_full.Crystal: To increase the strength of all its punch moves, it spins its arms just before making contact.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: HITMONCHAN is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working towards a world championship. This POKéMON has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this POKéMON. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A HITMONCHAN is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the world champion. Having an indomitable spirit means that it will never give up.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

pokedex_full.X: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
pokedex_full.Y: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this Pokémon. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.

pokedex_full.Sword: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: When Hitmonchan twists its arm while throwing a punch, the blow will pulverize even concrete. The Pokémon rests after three minutes of fighting.

name: Lickitung
pokedex: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
pokedex_full.Yellow: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.
pokedex_full.Gold: Its tongue has well-developed nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deftly manipulated.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It has a tongue that is over 6’6’’ long. It uses this long tongue to lick its body clean.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: Whenever LICKITUNG comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Whenever it sees something unfamiliar, it always licks the object because it memorizes things by texture and taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When it extends its over-six-foot-long tongue, its tail quivers. There is a possibility they are connected.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its tongue has well-developed nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deftly manipulated.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
pokedex_full.Black/White: When it extends its over-six-foot-long tongue, its tail quivers. There is a possibility they are connected.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Being licked by its long, saliva-covered tongue leaves a tingling sensation. Extending its tongue retracts its tail.
pokedex_full.X: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
pokedex_full.Y: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It checks out whatever’s around it by licking everything. If you don’t clean off a spot where it’s licked you, you’ll break out in a rash!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It licks filth clean with its tongue. Whatever it licks always stinks afterward, so whether it’s really clean is...questionable.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Its tongue spans almost seven feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.
pokedex_full.Sword: If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.
pokedex_full.Shield: Bug Pokémon are Lickitung’s main food source. This Pokémon paralyzes its prey with a lick from its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Instead of its hands, it uses its tongue, which can stretch to twice this Pokémon’s height. Lickitung’s sticky saliva grips anything.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Wields its long tongue deftly, as though it were an arm. The Pokémon’s viscous saliva, once it has been collected and boiled down, yields a strong and highly useful adhesive.

name: Koffing
pokedex: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
pokedex_full.Yellow: In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!
pokedex_full.Gold: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
pokedex_full.Silver: The poisonous gases it contains are a little bit lighter than air, keeping it slightly airborne.
pokedex_full.Crystal: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.
pokedex_full.Ruby: If KOFFING becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This POKéMON may also overinflate its round body, then explode.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: KOFFING embodies toxic substances. It mixes the toxins with raw garbage to set off a chemical reaction that results in a terribly powerful poison gas. The higher the temperature, the more gas is concocted by this POKéMON.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Getting up close to a KOFFING will give you a chance to observe, through its thin skin, the toxic gases swirling inside. It blows up at the slightest stimulation.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The poisonous gases it contains are a little bit lighter than air, keeping it slightly airborne.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Toxic gas is held within its thin, balloon-shaped body, so it can cause massive explosions.
pokedex_full.X: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.
pokedex_full.Y: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: If Koffing becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This Pokémon may also overinflate its round body, then explode.
