pokedex_full.Sun: A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados. Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
pokedex_full.Moon: There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the surrounding area to ash. There are some regions where it’s called “the deity of destruction.”
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The energy from evolution stimulated its brain cells strongly, causing it to become very ferocious.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
pokedex_full.Shield: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Once Gyarados appears, its rage never settles until the Pokémon has razed the fields and mountains around it.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire village with white-hot beams from its maw.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
pokedex_full.Violet: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

name: Lapras
pokedex: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
pokedex_full.Yellow: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.
pokedex_full.Gold: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
pokedex_full.Silver: It ferries people across the sea on its back. It may sing an enchanting cry if it is in a good mood.
pokedex_full.Crystal: This gentle POKéMON loves to give people rides and provides a very comfortable way to get around.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this POKéMON is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people on its back.
pokedex_full.Emerald: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It ferries people across the sea on its back. It may sing an enchanting cry if it is in a good mood.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Able to understand human speech and very intelligent, it loves to swim in the sea with people on its back.
pokedex_full.X: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
pokedex_full.Y: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this Pokémon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its high intelligence enables it to comprehend human speech. When it’s in a good mood, it sings in its beautiful voice.
pokedex_full.Moon: These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It likes swimming around with people on its back. In the Alola region, it’s an important means of transportation over water.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They’ve been so cherished that there’s now an overabundance. The fish Pokémon population has declined in waters with too many Lapras.
pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: A gentle soul that can understand human speech. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.
pokedex_full.Sword: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
pokedex_full.Shield: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.

name: Ditto
pokedex: Capable of copying an enemy’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Capable of copying an enemy’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
pokedex_full.Yellow: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its opponent.
pokedex_full.Gold: It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it encounters another DITTO, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: DITTO rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this POKéMON manages to get details wrong.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Capable of copying an opponent’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

pokedex_full.HeartGold: It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

pokedex_full.Y: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.
pokedex_full.Violet: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

name: Eevee
pokedex: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

pokedex_full.Yellow: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.
pokedex_full.Gold: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its irregularly configured DNA is affected by its surroundings. It evolves if its environment changes.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: EEVEE has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various STONES causes this POKéMON to evolve.
pokedex_full.FireRed: An extremely rare POKéMON that may evolve in a number of different ways depending on stimuli.

pokedex_full.Moon: It can convert its body into digital data, which enables it to enter cyberspace.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon was created using the cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so many parts of it have since become obsolete.

pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.

name: Snorlax
pokedex: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

pokedex_full.Red/Blue: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

pokedex_full.Silver: Its stomach’s digestive juices can dissolve any kind of poison. It can even eat things off the ground.

name: Hoothoot
pokedex: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

pokedex_full.Pearl: It switches its standing foot so quickly, it can’t be seen. It cries at the same time every day.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It marks time precisely. Some countries consider it to be a wise friend, versed in the world’s ways.

name: Noctowl
pokedex: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

pokedex_full.Gold: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
pokedex_full.Silver: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Its extremely soft feathers make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: NOCTOWL never fails at catching prey in darkness. This POKéMON owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft,  supple wings that make no sound in flight.
pokedex_full.FireRed: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.
pokedex_full.Pearl: If it flips its head upside down, it’s a sign that it is engaged in very complex thinking.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

name: Ledyba
pokedex: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.

pokedex_full.Crystal: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: LEDYBA secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This POKéMON conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid’s scent.
pokedex_full.FireRed: When the weather turns cold, numerous LEDYBA gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
pokedex_full.Emerald: LEDYBA communicate using a fluid that they secrete from where the legs join the body. They are said to convey feelings to others by altering the fluid’s scent.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is so timid, it can’t move if it isn’t with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: When the weather turns cold, lots of LEDYBA gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.

pokedex_full.Y: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

pokedex_full.Moon: They communicate with one another using bodily fluids that give off odors. When they’re angry, their odor smells sour.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon is very sensitive to cold. In the warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: These very cowardly Pokémon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It’s so timid that it can’t move unless it’s with a swarm. It conveys its feelings through scent.

name: Ledian
pokedex: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

pokedex_full.Gold: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
pokedex_full.Silver: The star patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.
pokedex_full.Crystal: In the daytime when it gets warm, it curls up inside a big leaf and drifts off into a deep slumber.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live LEDIAN in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this - the POKéMON uses the light of the stars as its energy.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The star patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.
pokedex_full.X: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
pokedex_full.Y: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

name: Spinarak
pokedex: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

pokedex_full.Gold: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_full.Silver: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: The web spun by SPINARAK can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this POKéMON can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web’s strands.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong thread. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.

name: Ariados
pokedex: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

pokedex_full.SoulSilver: A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest.

name: Crobat
pokedex: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

pokedex_full.Gold: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
pokedex_full.Silver: The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest.

pokedex_full.Ruby: If this POKéMON is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it’s proof that CROBAT has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: CROBAT sneaks up on its intended prey using wings that barely make a sound. This POKéMON rests by hanging on a tree branch with its rear legs that serve as wings.
pokedex_full.FireRed: The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.
pokedex_full.Diamond: Having four wings enables it to fly faster and more quietly. It turns active when the night comes.
pokedex_full.Pearl: A Pokémon that gained vastly enhanced flying performance by having its legs turn into wings.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest.
pokedex_full.Black/White: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
pokedex_full.X: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
pokedex_full.Y: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: If this Pokémon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it’s proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Crobat sneaks up on its intended prey using wings that barely make a sound. This Pokémon rests by hanging on a tree branch with its rear legs that serve as wings.
pokedex_full.Sun: Both its legs became wings, and as a result, it can’t move well on the ground. All it can do is crawl around.
pokedex_full.Moon: Silent and swift in its four-winged flight, it bites down on its prey before they realize what’s happening. In a heartbeat, it drains their blood.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you won’t notice any pain or realize you’ve been bitten.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It feeds on the blood of living people and Pokémon. If it can’t drink any blood for even a short while, it becomes weak and unable to fly.
pokedex_full.Sword: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon flaps its four wings skillfully. Crobat can fly through cramped caves without needing to slow down.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Having four wings enables it to fly faster and more quietly. It turns active when the night comes.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: This Pokémon gained vastly enhanced flying capabilities after its legs became wings.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its hind limbs have become another set of wings. Crobat expertly maneuvers its four wings to dart in exquisite fashion through even the most confined caves without losing any speed.

name: Pichu
pokedex: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

pokedex_full.Gold: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedex_full.Silver: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.

pokedex_full.Sapphire: When PICHU plays with others, it may short out electricity with another PICHU, creating a shower of sparks. In that event, this POKéMON will begin crying, startled by the flash of sparks.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

pokedex_full.Pearl: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.

pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
pokedex_full.Sun: It will use any means necessary to frighten people and absorb their life energy. It practices constantly to hone its skill in causing fear.
pokedex_full.Moon: If you hear a sobbing sound emanating from a vacant room, it’s undoubtedly a bit of mischief from Misdreavus.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: What gives meaning to its life is surprising others. If you set your ear against the red orbs around its neck, you can hear shrieking.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: What makes it happy is imitating the voices of weeping people and scaring everyone. It doesn’t deal well with folks who aren’t easily frightened.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It loves to sneak up on people late at night and startle them with its shrieking cry.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. During the daytime, it sleeps in the shadows.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers’ spines with its childlike weeping. As it observes the frightened travelers with glee, the red orbs upon its chest let off an eerie light.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
pokedex_full.Violet: It loves to bite and yank people’s hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.

name: Unown
pokedex: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

pokedex_full.Gold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Because different types of UNOWN exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedex_full.Emerald: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN.
pokedex_full.Diamond: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.
pokedex_full.Pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedex_full.X: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_full.Y: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Because the Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether written language or Unown came first.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I’ve pointed out that the species’ many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.

name: Wobbuffet
pokedex: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.

pokedex_full.Gold: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
pokedex_full.Silver: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokedex_full.Crystal: In order to conceal its black tail, it lives in a dark cave and only moves about at night.
pokedex_full.Ruby: If two or more WOBBUFFET meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other’s endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. TRAINERS need to beware of this habit.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: WOBBUFFET does nothing but endure attacks - it won’t attack on its own. However, it won’t endure an attack on its tail. When that happens, the POKéMON will try to take the foe with it using DESTINY BOND.
pokedex_full.FireRed: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Usually docile, a WOBBUFFET strikes back ferociously if its black tail is attacked. It makes its lair in caves where it waits for nightfall.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: Girafarig
pokedex: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.

pokedex_full.Gold: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
pokedex_full.Silver: Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell.
pokedex_full.Crystal: When it is in danger, its tail uses some sort of mysterious powers to drive away the enemy.
pokedex_full.Ruby: GIRAFARIG’s rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this POKéMON from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: GIRAFARIG’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A GIRAFARIG is an herbivore--it eats grass and tree shoots. While it is eating, its tail makes chewing and swallowing motions as if it were also eating.
pokedex_full.Diamond: Its tail also has a small brain. It bites to repel any foe trying to sneak up on it from behind.
pokedex_full.Pearl: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent by biting.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.
pokedex_full.X: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.
pokedex_full.Y: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent by biting.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Girafarig’s rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this Pokémon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its tail has a separate small brain. The tail bites to repel any foe trying to sneak up on the Pokémon from behind.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Though very small, the brain in its tail is still considered an important organ because it emits powerful psychic energy.
pokedex_full.Violet: Girafarig’s tail has a small head. It instinctively bites at any foe that approaches the Pokémon from behind.

name: Pineco
pokedex: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

pokedex_full.Silver: It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: PINECO hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the POKéMON is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It hangs and waits for flying-insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The extra weight doesn’t bother it.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.

name: Forretress
pokedex: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

pokedex_full.Gold: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
pokedex_full.Silver: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: FORRETRESS conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the POKéMON is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell’s inside cannot be seen.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It keeps itself inside its steel shell. The shell is opened when it is catching prey, but it is so quick that the shell’s inside cannot be seen.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
pokedex_full.X: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
pokedex_full.Y: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When something approaches it, it fires off fragments of its steel shell in attack. This is not a conscious action but a conditioned reflex.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It is encased in a steel shell. Forretress’s eyes peer out, but what lies within this Pokémon’s shell is unknown.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It’s usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.
pokedex_full.Violet: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.

name: Dunsparce
pokedex: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.

pokedex_full.Gold: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
pokedex_full.Silver: If spotted, it escapes by burrowing with its tail. It can float just slightly using its wings.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It hides deep inside caves where no light ever reaches it and remains virtually motionless there.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: DUNSPARCE has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backwards. This POKéMON is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When spotted, this Pokémon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If spotted, it escapes by burrowing with its tail. It can float just slightly using its wings.

pokedex_full.Shield: The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels. They never get lost in their own nests—they can tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.

name: Gligar
pokedex: It flies straight at its target’s face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

pokedex_full.Gold: It flies straight at its target’s face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
pokedex_full.Silver: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It builds its nest on a steep cliff. When it is done gliding, it hops along the ground back to its nest.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: GLIGAR glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This POKéMON hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It glides without making a single sound. It grasps the face of its foe using its hind and large front claws, then stabs with its poison barb.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It sails on the winds with its limbs extended to strike from the sky. It aims for the prey’s face.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It glides as if sliding. It startles foes by clamping on to their faces, then jabs with its poison stinger.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

name: Steelix
pokedex: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.

pokedex_full.Gold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
pokedex_full.Silver: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The many small metal particles that cover this POKéMON’s body reflect bright light well.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: STEELIX lives even further underground than ONIX. This POKéMON is known to dig towards the earth’s core. There are records of this POKéMON reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

pokedex_full.Pearl: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.

name: Snubbull
pokedex: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

pokedex_full.Gold: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
pokedex_full.Silver: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
pokedex_full.Crystal: In truth, it is a cowardly POKéMON. It growls eagerly in order to hide its fear from its opponent.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, SNUBBULL sends smaller POKéMON scurrying away in terror. However, this POKéMON seems a little sad at making its foes flee.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.

pokedex_full.Emerald: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, it sends smaller POKéMON scurrying in terror. The SNUBBULL does seem a little sad at making its foes flee.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.

name: Granbull
pokedex: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If attacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its bite is powerful.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

pokedex_full.Y: It can make most any Pokémon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the Pokémon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its well-developed lower jaw and heavy fangs are its weapons. As long as it’s not provoked, it rarely bites.
pokedex_full.Moon: More timid than Snubbull, this Pokémon is doted on by young people amused at the contrast between its looks and its attitude.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it’s popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally incompetent as a watchdog.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

name: Qwilfish

name: Scizor

name: Heracross
pokedex: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.

pokedex_full.Gold: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.
pokedex_full.Silver: Usually docile, but if disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.
pokedex_full.Crystal: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.
pokedex_full.Ruby: HERACROSS charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe’s grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This POKéMON even has enough power to topple a massive tree.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: HERACROSS has sharp claws on its feet. These are planted firmly into the ground or the bark of a tree, giving the POKéMON a secure and solid footing to forcefully fling away foes with its proud horn.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Usually docile, but if disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It gathers in forests to search for tree sap, its favorite food. It’s strong enough to hurl foes.
pokedex_full.Pearl: With powerful legs and claws, it generates enough power to hurl foes over great distances.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It loves sweet honey. To keep all the honey to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.

pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It roams through forests searching for sweet nectar. Although it boasts fantastic physical strength, it’s not that good at flying.

pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This Pokémon has an unparalleled horn. Heracross itself demonstrates tremendous power—it’s capable of throwing several people trained in the traditional arts of war at once.

pokedex_full.Violet: With its herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.

pokedex_full.Violet: This is a smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.

name: Swinub
pokedex: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

pokedex_full.Gold: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it smells something enticing, it dashes headlong off to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: SWINUB roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This POKéMON occasionally roots out hot springs.
pokedex_full.FireRed: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under dried grass. It occasionally roots out hot springs.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Rooting the tip of its snout into the ground, it searches for food. Sometimes it even digs up a hot spring.
pokedex_full.X: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_full.Y: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.
pokedex_full.Sword: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_full.Shield: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Swinub excels at sniffing out mushrooms buried beneath grass or snow. Since ancient times, the people of Hisui have often relied upon this skill.

name: Piloswine
pokedex: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

pokedex_full.Gold: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_full.Silver: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This POKéMON uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedex_full.FireRed: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair for enduring freezing cold. It uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: With its excellent sense of smell, it’s even able to find mushrooms that are buried under frozen ground.
pokedex_full.X: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_full.Y: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedex_full.Sword: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_full.Shield: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The long fur of this Pokémon covers its eyes, ears, and even limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions. The Pokémon’s white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.

name: Corsola
pokedex: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

pokedex_full.Gold: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
pokedex_full.Silver: In a south sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these POKéMON.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The points on its head absorb nutrients from clean water. They cannot survive in polluted water.
pokedex_full.Ruby: CORSOLA’s branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this POKéMON grows it back in just one night.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: Clusters of CORSOLA congregate in warm seas where they serve as ideal hiding places for smaller POKéMON. When the water temperature falls, this POKéMON migrates to the southern seas.
pokedex_full.FireRed: In a south sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these POKéMON.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
pokedex_full.Emerald: CORSOLA live in warm southern seas. If the sea becomes polluted, the beautiful coral stalks become discolored and crumble away in tatters.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: In a south-sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They prefer unpolluted southern seas. Their coral branches lose their color and deteriorate in dirty water.
pokedex_full.X: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
pokedex_full.Y: They prefer unpolluted southern seas. Their coral branches lose their color and deteriorate in dirty water.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Corsola’s branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokémon grows it back in just one night.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Clusters of Corsola congregate in warm seas where they serve as ideal hiding places for smaller Pokémon. When the water temperature falls, this Pokémon migrates to the southern seas.
pokedex_full.Sun: Coral branches grow from its head. They break off quite easily, but they grow back in about three days.
pokedex_full.Moon: Pursued by Mareanie for the branches on its head, this Pokémon will sometimes snap its own branches off as a diversion while it escapes.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The pink of Corsola that live in Alola is deep and vibrant, thanks to seas filled with nutrition.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: In Alola, where their natural enemies Mareanie are plentiful, many Corsola have stubby branches on their heads.
pokedex_full.Sword: It will regrow any branches that break off its head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.
pokedex_full.Shield: These Pokémon live in warm seas. In prehistoric times, many lived in the oceans around the Galar region as well.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.

name: Remoraid
pokedex: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.

pokedex_full.Gold: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.
pokedex_full.Silver: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_full.Crystal: To escape from an attacker, it may shoot water out of its mouth, then use that force to swim backward.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: REMORAID sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this POKéMON travels downstream from rivers.
pokedex_full.FireRed: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 100 yards.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A REMORAID uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.
pokedex_full.Diamond: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It clings to MANTINE to feed on the big Pokémon’s scraps. This is an adaptation to avoid foes.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the REMORAID is deep in the sea.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the Remoraid is deep in the sea.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedex_full.X: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedex_full.Y: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire: Remoraid sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this Pokémon travels downstream from rivers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon clings to Mantine and shares in its prosperity. When its Mantine is attacked, Remoraid will fight alongside it!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Also known as the “sniper of the seas,” its water gun can hit prey without fail from over 300 feet away.
pokedex_full.Sword: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedex_full.Shield: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It clings to Mantine to feed on the big Pokémon’s scraps. This is an adaptation to avoid foes.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Spits water from its mouth with incredible accuracy. It captures Burmy by shooting them down off the branches from which they dangle.

name: Octillery
pokedex: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

pokedex_full.Gold: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_full.Silver: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_full.Crystal: Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: OCTILLERY grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This POKéMON tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, OCTILLERY spews ink to escape.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of murky ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.

pokedex_full.Y: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The ink it spits when escaping is special. It contains a substance that dulls the sense of smell, so Pokémon with keen noses get lost.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It usually sleeps in caves. The pitch-black ink that Octillery spits is also used for cooking.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_full.Shield: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of black ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.

name: Delibird

pokedex_full.Violet: It always carries its food with it, wherever it goes. If attacked, it throws its food at the opponent.

name: Skarmory
pokedex: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

pokedex_full.Gold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_full.Silver: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_full.Crystal: The feathers that it sheds are very sharp. It is said that people once used the feathers as swords.

pokedex_full.Sapphire: SKARMORY’s steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.

name: Phanpy
pokedex: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.

pokedex_full.Gold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.

pokedex_full.Ruby: For its nest, PHANPY digs a vertical pit  in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: PHANPY uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These POKéMON can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.

pokedex_full.Emerald: PHANPY’s big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.

name: Donphan

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekid’s mood improves. It can be useful to record that sound and play it when Elekid’s feeling down.

pokedex_full.Sword: When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder, it gets full-on rowdy.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s not good at storing electricity yet. This Pokémon sneaks into people’s homes, looking for electrical outlets to eat electricity from.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.

name: Magby
pokedex: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

pokedex_full.Gold: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
pokedex_full.Silver: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temp. is over 1100 degrees, so don’t underestimate it.
pokedex_full.Crystal: It naturally spits an 1100-degree flame. It is said when many appear, it heralds a volcanic eruption.
pokedex_full.Ruby/Sapphire: MAGBY’s state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the POKéMON is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedex_full.FireRed: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body heat exceeds 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don’t underestimate it.
pokedex_full.LeafGreen: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
pokedex_full.Emerald: If a MAGBY is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees F. It is healthy if it is breathing yellow flames.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees F.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble from its mouth and nostrils.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don’t underestimate it.

pokedex_full.Y: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_full.Sun: Many of these Pokémon can be seen in areas with volcanic activity. Feeding can get them so excited, they exhale flames of 1,100 degrees F.
pokedex_full.Moon: A famous potter lives with a Magby. Apparently its soft flames produce fine works.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When flames drip from its nose, that means it has a cold. Have it lie down for a nice rest in some magma.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its body temperature is always around 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. If Magby falls into a small- enough pond, the whole thing will dry up.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is still small and timid. Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised, flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon makes its home near volcanoes. At the end of the day, Magby soaks in magma, resting and recovering from the day’s fatigue.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. It is healthy if it is exhaling yellow flames.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This Pokémon lives in volcanic areas. With each breath, sparks spurt from its mouth and nose. When Magby is in good health, its flames gain a yellow tint.

pokedex_full.Shield: Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost something, this Pokémon can likely find it.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

name: Linoone
pokedex: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.

pokedex_full.Ruby: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: When hunting, LINOONE will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this POKéMON is capable of topping 60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond-dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedex_full.X: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.

pokedex_full.Shield: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

name: Wurmple
pokedex: Using the spikes on its rear end,   WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.

pokedex_full.Ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end,   WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.

pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It spits a white silk that turns sticky when it contacts air. It is used to immobilize foes.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by  raising up the spikes on its rear.

pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It spits a white silk thread that turns sticky when coming into contact with air. The silk is used to immobilize foes.

name: Silcoon
pokedex: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There,  this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.

name: Beautifly
pokedex: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.

name: Cascoon
pokedex: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.

name: Dustox
pokedex: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

name: Lotad

name: Numel
pokedex: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.

name: Torkoal
pokedex: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.

pokedex_full.Violet: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

name: Swablu
pokedex: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A POKéMON that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, SWABLU flocks move closer to towns in the spring.

name: Altaria
pokedex: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
pokedex_full.Platinum: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

name: Zangoose
pokedex: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.

pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a SEVIPER nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.

name: Lunatone
pokedex: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.

name: Barboach
pokedex: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.

pokedex_full.Sapphire: BARBOACH’s body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this POKéMON just slips out of the enemy’s grip. This POKéMON grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.

name: Whiscash
pokedex: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.

pokedex_full.Ruby: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: If WHISCASH goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This POKéMON has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It makes its nest at the bottom of  swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, WHISCASH will eat it.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
pokedex_full.Pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

name: Crawdaunt
pokedex: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.

pokedex_full.Ruby: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: CRAWDAUNT molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this POKéMON hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

pokedex: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

name: Duskull
pokedex: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.

name: Dusclops
pokedex: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.

pokedex_full.Platinum: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.

name: Tropius
pokedex: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.

pokedex_full.Platinum: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.

name: Absol
pokedex: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.

pokedex_full.Ruby: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: ABSOL has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This POKéMON very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
pokedex_full.Emerald: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that has a life-span of 100 years.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It has the ability to foretell natural disasters. Its life span is over a hundred years.

pokedex_full.Moon: Although it’s said to bring disaster, in actuality, this Pokémon possesses a calm disposition and warns people of any crises that loom.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The only thing unlucky about Absol is its appearance. It protects fields and warns people of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The elderly call it the disaster Pokémon and detest it, but interest in its power to predict disasters is on the rise.
pokedex_full.Sword: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.

name: Wynaut
pokedex: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.

name: Snorunt
pokedex: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.

pokedex_full.Ruby: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.

pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It is said that a home visited by a SNORUNT will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Emerald: They tend to move about in groups of around five SNORUNT. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.

pokedex_full.Platinum: It is said that several SNORUNT gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

name: Glalie
pokedex: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
