pokedex_full.X: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
pokedex_full.Y: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
pokedex_full.Shield: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.

name: Sealeo
pokedex: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.

pokedex_full.Ruby: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: SEALEO often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the POKéMON is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_full.Emerald: SEALEO live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_full.X: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_full.Y: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_full.Sword: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure the Spheal is healthy.

name: Walrein
pokedex: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.

pokedex_full.Ruby: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: WALREIN swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
pokedex_full.Emerald: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.
pokedex_full.X: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_full.Y: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.

pokedex_full.Sword: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.
pokedex_full.Shield: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.

name: Clamperl
pokedex: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

pokedex_full.Ruby: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: CLAMPERL grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this POKéMON is getting close to evolution.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A CLAMPERL slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_full.X: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

name: Huntail
pokedex: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.

pokedex_full.Ruby: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: HUNTAIL’s tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This POKéMON swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedex_full.Emerald: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

name: Gorebyss
pokedex: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.

pokedex_full.Emerald: A GOREBYSS siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its pink body becomes more vivid with the rise of water temperatures in the springtime.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

name: Relicanth
pokedex: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.

pokedex_full.Ruby: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: RELICANTH is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This POKéMON’s body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedex_full.Emerald: A POKéMON that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_full.X: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its form has remained the same for one hundred million years. Its body is filled with fat, so it can withstand the water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_full.Moon: It was fortuitously discovered during a deep sea expedition. Its teeth have atrophied, so it now survives on microscopic organisms it sucks up.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was given a name that is a variation of the name of the person who discovered it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The reason it hasn’t changed at all in a hundred million years is that it’s apparently already a perfect life-form.
pokedex_full.Sword: Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: This rare Pokémon was discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

name: Luvdisc
pokedex: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.

pokedex_full.Ruby: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: LUVDISC’s heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this POKéMON is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: During the spawning season, countless LUVDISC congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
pokedex_full.Emerald: LUVDISC make the branches of CORSOLA their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a LUVDISC as a gift to express one’s feelings of love.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a LUVDISC to someone you love.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: There was an era when it was overfished due to the rumor that having one of its heart-shaped scales would enable you to find a sweetheart.

pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.
pokedex_full.Violet: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

name: Bagon
pokedex: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has  grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.

pokedex_full.Ruby: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has  grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
pokedex_full.Sapphire: BAGON harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this POKéMON slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.
pokedex_full.FireRed/LeafGreen: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
pokedex_full.Emerald: Although it is small, this POKéMON is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches head-butts with its ironlike skull.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its well-developed neck muscles and ironlike head can smash boulders into pieces.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_full.X: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.
pokedex_full.Moon: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

pokedex_full.Sword: Bagon jumps off cliffs every day, trying to grow stronger so that someday it will be able to fly.

pokedex_full.Violet: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.

name: Shelgon
pokedex: Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.

pokedex_full.Emerald: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It surrounds its body in an iron-hard shell to accumulate enough power to evolve.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

pokedex_full.Y: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Shelgon lives deep within caves. It stays shut up in its hard shell, dreaming of the day it will be able to fly.

pokedex_full.Shield: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.

pokedex_full.Violet: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

name: Salamence
pokedex: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

pokedex_full.Emerald: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.
pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl/Platinum: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It’s uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
pokedex_full.X: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
pokedex_full.Y: It’s uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

pokedex_full.Scarlet: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.

pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey—even those taking shelter behind a wall.
pokedex_full.Sword: Luxray can see through solid objects. It will instantly spot prey trying to hide behind walls, even if the walls are thick.
pokedex_full.Shield: Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of Luxray’s electricity, so the Pokémon sleeps for long periods of time to store up energy.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey—even those taking shelter behind a wall.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: They form packs, each having one male as leader. Legends say that when Luxray’s two eyes shimmer with gold, the Pokémon can see through anything.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
pokedex_full.Violet: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.

name: Budew
pokedex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It lives alongside clear ponds. It scatters pollen that induces harsh sneezing and runny noses.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun’s warm touch.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun’s warm touch.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Sensitive to changing temperatures, the bud blooms when it’s warm, releasing toxic pollen.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
pokedex_full.Sword: The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It lives alongside clear ponds. It scatters pollen that induces harsh sneezing and runny noses.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: When the sun’s light strengthens, the bud atop this Pokémon’s head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is over, and the season of budding has begun.

name: Roserade
pokedex: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
pokedex_full.Pearl: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
pokedex_full.Sword: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
pokedex_full.Shield: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Hidden within the bouquet on each hand are thorned whips loaded with virulent poison. Roserade moves gracefully as it corners its prey and mercilessly lashes them with its whips.

name: Cranidos
pokedex: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its head butts.
pokedex_full.Platinum: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with head butts.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: CRANIDOS toughen up their already rock-hard heads by headbutting one another.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with head butts.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
pokedex_full.Sun: It lived in jungles around a hundred million years ago. It used its skillful headbutts to combat Aerodactyl.
pokedex_full.Moon: In rock layers where Cranidos fossils are found, the fossilized trunks of trees snapped in two are also often found.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It was resurrected from an iron-ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: An incredibly rare sight. They duel each other by ramming their heads together, and the resulting sound echoes throughout the area like the pealing of a bell.

name: Rampardos
pokedex: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
pokedex_full.Platinum: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
pokedex_full.Sun: The result of repeated headbutts is a skull grown thick and hard. However, its brain has shrunk in size compared with Cranidos’s.
pokedex_full.Moon: Records exist of a revived fossil that evolved into Rampardos. It proceeded to escape and then destroy a skyscraper with a headbutt.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its powerful headbutt has enough force to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Very little is known about its biology. Can knock down massive trees by smashing its beautiful, pearl-like crown against them.

name: Shieldon
pokedex: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

pokedex_full.Diamond: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.
pokedex_full.Sun: Many fossils of this Pokémon have been found, but almost none have shown signs of damage to the face.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon lived in primeval jungles. Few enemies would have been willing to square off against its heavily armored face, so it’s thought.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although its fossils can be found in layers of primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever been discovered.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Much remains unknown about this Pokémon, as few have ever seen it. However, we know that it is calm and dislikes conflict, and it enjoys polishing its face against trees and rocks.

name: Bastiodon
pokedex: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
pokedex_full.Pearl: When attacked, they form a wall with their shieldlike faces to protect their young.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When attacked, they form a wall. Their rock-hard faces serve to protect them from the attacks.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
pokedex_full.Sun: While it can guard against any sort of attack from the front, it is left without recourse when attacked from behind.
pokedex_full.Moon: It lived in the same environments as Rampardos. Their fossils have been found together— seemingly from after they’d fought to the finish.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: When attacked, they form a wall with their shield-like faces to protect their young.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its face is sturdy—as strong as diamond—and this hardness offers a very stable defense. Much about this species is still unknown, such as its natural habitat.

name: Burmy
pokedex: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

pokedex_full.Diamond: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pokedex_full.Pearl: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it’s hot, its cloak is thinner.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: If its cloak is even slightly damaged, Burmy will immediately repair it with whatever is close at hand. The Pokémon within the cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.

name: Wormadam
pokedex: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

pokedex_full.Diamond: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When evolving, its body takes in surrounding materials. As a result, there are many body variations.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It is said that a WORMADAM that evolves on a cold day will have a thicker cloak.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: When evolving, its body takes in surrounding materials. As a result, there are many body variations.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: When Burmy evolves, its cloak becomes a part of its body. Wormadam’s cloak is never shed.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The cloak—fashioned from plant matter—has merged with the Pokémon and is now part of the body, like fur or skin. I suspect this fusion is an effect of the energy involved in evolution.

name: Mothim
pokedex: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of floral honey.
pokedex_full.Platinum: While it loves floral honey, it won’t gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from COMBEE.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the COMBEE hive.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: While it loves floral honey, it won’t gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It loves the nectar of flowers and steals nectar collected by Combee.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of its much-beloved nectar.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers, Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.

name: Combee
pokedex: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.

pokedex_full.Diamond: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please VESPIQUEN.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: At night, COMBEE sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
pokedex_full.Black/White: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedex_full.Sword: The members of the trio spend all their time together. Each one has a slightly different taste in nectar.
pokedex_full.Shield: It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and the swarm.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Three Pokémon joined to become one. It busily carries sweet nectar to Vespiquen.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: They collect and deliver honey to their colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.
pokedex_full.Violet: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers nectar from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
pokedex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by COMBEE.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by COMBEE.
pokedex_full.Pearl: When endangered, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control COMBEE.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.
pokedex_full.Sword: It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives to defend Vespiquen.
pokedex_full.Shield: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on nectar collected by Combee.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: When it is in danger, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Commands its subjects to build its hive. It will dispatch any interlopers who dare sneak into its nest and use them as nourishment for itself.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
pokedex_full.Violet: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee.

name: Pachirisu
pokedex: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It makes electricity with pouches in its cheeks and shoots charges from its tail. It lives atop trees.
pokedex_full.Platinum: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon  with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It stores its own fur balls that crackle with static electricity together with its favorite berries in tree hollows.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It makes electricity with pouches in its cheeks and shoots charges from its tail. It lives atop trees.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A species related to the Pikachu line. Though Pachirisu is a calm Pokémon, it still presents a danger should one touch its electrified tail or cheeks.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
pokedex_full.Violet: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: Buizel
pokedex: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat is coincidental.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
pokedex_full.Violet: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Floatzel

pokedex_full.Pearl: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. Floatzel carries people as if it were a rubber raft.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Has a long, rather splendid flotation sac, which prevents Floatzel from drowning even in stormy seas. One might glimpse this species around fishing hamlets from time to time.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
pokedex_full.Violet: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and help fishers carry what they caught.

name: Cherubi
pokedex: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

pokedex_full.Diamond: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. STARLY try to peck it off.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
pokedex_full.Sword: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
pokedex_full.Shield: The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients and shriveled, evolution is near.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.

name: Cherrim
