pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. The Pokémon tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It is docile as a bud and turns cheerful when it blooms. It folds back into a bud if sunlight wanes.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the scent exuded from Cherrim’s folded petals.

name: Shellos
pokedex: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It lives along bodies of water. Its body shape has changed to suit its habitat.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It lives along bodies of water. Its body shape changed to suit its habitat.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Found in abundance on seashores bordering warm waters. Shellos are unexpectedly friendly and will crawl toward any person they see. Take care not to get coated in mucus!

name: Gastrodon
pokedex: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.

name: Ambipom
pokedex: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

pokedex_full.Diamond: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
pokedex_full.Pearl: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, AMBIPOM rarely uses its hands.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: They live on large trees. They are said to communicate by connecting their tails to those of others.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It is very difficult to dodge the consecutive strikes of its two tails.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, Ambipom rarely uses its hands.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: In their search for comfortable trees, they get into territorial disputes with groups of Passimian. They win about half the time.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: To affirm their kinship, members of this species will form a ring by linking their newly doubled tails together. On rare occasions, humans have been accepted into such rings.

name: Drifloon
pokedex: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

pokedex_full.Diamond: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It tugs on the hands of children to steal them away. However, it gets pulled around instead.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.”
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It is whispered that any child who mistakes DRIFLOON for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.”
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.
pokedex_full.Sun: Stories go that it grabs the hands of small children and drags them away to the afterlife. It dislikes heavy children.
pokedex_full.Moon: If for some reason its body bursts, its soul spills out with a screaming sound.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its round body is stuffed with souls and expands each time it leads someone away.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Wandering souls gathered together to form this Pokémon. When trying to make friends with children, Drifloon grabs them by the hand.
pokedex_full.Sword: Perhaps seeking company, it approaches children. However, it often quickly runs away again when the children play too roughly with it.
pokedex_full.Shield: The gathering of many souls gave rise to this Pokémon. During humid seasons, they seem to appear in abundance.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It is a Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It tugs on the hands of children to spirit them away. However, it gets pulled around instead.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
pokedex_full.Violet: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “signpost for wandering spirits.”

name: Drifblim
pokedex: It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
pokedex_full.Platinum: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It can generate and release gas within its body. That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.
pokedex_full.Black/White: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They carry people and Pokémon, but the wind can catch them, so there can’t be a fixed destination.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It’s drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
pokedex_full.Sun: There was once an incident in which a man took a trip riding a Drifblim, only to go missing.
pokedex_full.Moon: Even while under careful observation, large flocks of Drifblim flying at dusk will inexplicably disappear from view.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: There’s a rumor that if you catch a Drifblim floating on the wind at dusk, you’ll be carried away to the afterlife.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The raw material for the gas inside its body is souls. When its body starts to deflate, it’s thought to carry away people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sword: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.
pokedex_full.Shield: It grabs people and Pokémon and carries them off somewhere. Where do they go? Nobody knows.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: They’re drowsy in daytime but fly off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy aspect touches some people deeply—every so often, one will come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It can generate and release gas within its body. That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.
pokedex_full.Violet: They carry people and Pokémon, but the wind can catch them, so there can’t be a fixed destination.

name: Buneary
pokedex: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.
pokedex_full.Pearl: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: You can tell how it feels by the way it rolls its ears. When it’s scared, both ears are rolled up.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By extending its rolled-up ears and striking the ground, it can bound so high it surprises itself.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its arms and legs are weak, but when it rolls its ears up tight and then unleashes them with its full force, it can smash boulders to dust.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The reason it keeps one ear rolled up is so it can launch a swift counterattack if it’s attacked by an enemy.
pokedex_full.Sword: If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.
pokedex_full.Shield: Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack becomes stronger with training.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: My hypothesis as to why Buneary rolls up its ears is that its hearing is far too keen. I surmise that the Pokémon protects its hearing by limiting the sound that may enter its ears.

name: Lopunny
pokedex: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

pokedex_full.Diamond: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It is very conscious of its looks and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
pokedex_full.Platinum: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It sheds its fur twice a year. Its winter fur is soft and fluffy.
pokedex_full.Black/White: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Lopunny regrows its coat twice a year. Mufflers and hats made from its fur are really warm.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s notably wary and has a dislike of fighting, but at the same time, it can deliver powerful kicks with its lithe legs.
pokedex_full.Sword: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.
pokedex_full.Shield: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny’s coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: An extremely cautious Pokémon that cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It likes to keep itself clean and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its fur is warm and yet remarkably light. This Pokémon kicks as though it were a master of karate, driving back its opponents with ease.

name: Mismagius
pokedex: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
pokedex_full.Sun: It appears as if from nowhere—muttering incantations, placing curses, and giving people terrifying visions.
pokedex_full.Moon: Mismagius have been known to cast spells to make people fall in love, so some people search for this Pokémon as if their life depended on it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches or terrifying visions that torment others.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Its cries sound like incantations. Those who hear it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It chants incantations. While these incantations can torment targets, some bring happiness.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The incantations Mismagius chants can ward against misfortune, so a custom exists of inviting it into one’s home. Incur the Pokémon’s displeasure, however, and disaster will surely ensue.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
pokedex_full.Violet: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

name: Honchkrow
pokedex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It makes its MURKROW cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.
pokedex_full.Platinum: If one utters a deep cry, many MURKROW gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its MURKROW followers.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
pokedex_full.Sun: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than a hundred of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.
pokedex_full.Moon: If its Murkrow cronies fail to catch food for it, or if it feels they have betrayed it, it will hunt them down wherever they are and punish them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It will absolutely not forgive failure from or betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it. The only time it dirties its own hands is in delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Becoming active at night, it is known to form flocks with numerous Murkrow in tow.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It makes its Murkrow cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: One cry from this Pokémon, and a murder of Murkrow come flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
pokedex_full.Violet: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than 100 of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.

name: Glameow
pokedex: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pokedex_full.Pearl: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn’t fed.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When it’s happy, GLAMEOW demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn’t fed.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze. Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pokémon an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.

name: Purugly
pokedex: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.
pokedex_full.Pearl: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its split tail.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Though impudent and difficult to tame, Purugly enjoys great popularity due to its fur, the beauty of which surpasses even velveteen.

name: Chingling
pokedex: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
pokedex_full.Platinum: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It emits high-frequency cries that  people can’t hear. Once it starts, it can cry for an awfully long time.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This Pokémon gave me an excruciating headache when it seemingly cried out without making a sound. Perhaps there are some sounds that the human ear is simply incapable of hearing.

name: Stunky
pokedex: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It sprays a nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear to repel attackers.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
pokedex_full.Sword: From its rear, it sprays a foul-smelling liquid at opponents. It aims for their faces, and it can hit them from over 16 feet away.
pokedex_full.Shield: If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware. It’s about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough to make you faint.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It sprays a nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear to repel attackers.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The poison that gushes from its aft end is accompanied by an utterly evil-smelling odor with such potency that one whiff can induce memory loss.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
pokedex_full.Violet: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.

name: Skuntank
pokedex: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
pokedex_full.Sword: In its belly, it reserves stinky fluid that it shoots from its tail during battle. As this Pokémon’s diet varies, so does the stench of its fluid.
pokedex_full.Shield: It digs holes in the ground to make its nest. The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip of its tail is extremely potent.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. It can fire this spray more than 160 feet.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester in its belly.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Sprays a poisonous fluid to take down prey. Sometimes, unable to stomach the stench of its own fluid, it leaves the bested prey uneaten.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.
pokedex_full.Violet: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.

name: Bronzor
pokedex: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

pokedex_full.Diamond: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
pokedex_full.Pearl: X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared, however.
pokedex_full.Platinum: There are researchers who believe this Pokémon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Ancient people believed that the pattern on BRONZOR’s back contained a mysterious power.
pokedex_full.Black/White: There are researchers who believe this Pokémon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They are found in ancient tombs. The patterns on their backs are said to be imbued with mysterious power.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
pokedex_full.Sword: It appears in ancient ruins. The pattern on its body doesn’t come from any culture in the Galar region, so it remains shrouded in mystery.
pokedex_full.Shield: Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface reflect the truth, according to common lore. Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: Implements shaped like Bronzor were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown whether they are related.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure, but nothing was seen.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Floats using a mysterious energy. The pattern engraved upon its back is held as sacred and can sometimes be found in imagery from ancient cemeteries and other such timeworn places.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.
pokedex_full.Violet: They are found in ancient tombs. The patterns on their backs are said to be imbued with mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
pokedex: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

pokedex_full.Diamond: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It can summon rain clouds. People long ago revered it as the bringer of plentiful harvests.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Ancient people believed that petitioning BRONZONG for rain was the way to make crops grow.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
pokedex_full.Sword: Some believe it to be a deity that summons rain clouds. When angered, it lets out a warning cry that rings out like the tolling of a bell.
pokedex_full.Shield: Many scientists suspect that this Pokémon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: One caused a media storm when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It can summon rain clouds. People long ago revered it as the bringer of plentiful harvests.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Some believe that its bell-like cry opens holes to another world. It has been revered as a deity since ancient times.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
pokedex_full.Violet: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bonsly
pokedex: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
pokedex_full.Sun: It does not deal well with water, so it lives in dry locales. Since its surroundings tend to lack greenery, it stands out noticeably.
pokedex_full.Moon: From its eyes, it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It discharges moisture from its eyes, making it look like it’s crying—apparently an effective way of getting enemies to let down their guard.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If its body gets too damp, it will die. So, in a process reminiscent of sweating, its eyes expel moisture.
pokedex_full.Sword: It expels both sweat and tears from its eyes. The sweat is a little salty, while the tears have a slight bitterness.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon lives in dry, rocky areas. As its green spheres dry out, their dull luster increases.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its tears elicit sympathy from those who see them, but do not be deceived! This expulsion of body water is merely a physiological mechanism for keeping itself in good health.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.
pokedex_full.Violet: From its eyes, it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.

name: Mime Jr.
pokedex: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It does its absolute best to mimic the movements and expressions of its opponents, but it’s still not very good at it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When this gifted mimic surprises an opponent, Mime Jr. feels so happy that it ends up forgetting it was imitating something.
pokedex_full.Sword: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
pokedex_full.Shield: It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps like an apprentice.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It habitually mimics foes. The mimicked foe is said to be unable to look away from Mime Jr.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Known to turn up in bustling marketplaces now and again. It mimics people much as a child would, then watches how they react, eyes sparkling.

name: Happiny
pokedex: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others’ feet and cause them to stumble.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others’ feet and cause them to stumble.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
pokedex_full.Sun: It carries a round white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s too small to lay eggs yet. As a surrogate, it searches out round white stones.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Usually it’s a well-behaved Pokémon, but if you take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss and throw a big old tantrum.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When it sees something round and white, Happiny puts it into the pouch on its stomach. It sometimes becomes overloaded and can’t move.
pokedex_full.Sword: Mimicking Chansey, Happiny will place an egg- shaped stone in its belly pouch. Happiny will treasure this stone.
pokedex_full.Shield: Happiny’s willing to lend its precious round stone to those it’s friendly with, but if the stone isn’t returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It loves round, white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of Chansey.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It carries a round, white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.
pokedex_full.Violet: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.

name: Chatot
pokedex: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It imitates human speech.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its tongue is just like a human’s. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its tongue is just like a human’s. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: They can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It also imitates human speech.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech. It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even understand the meaning of the words they mimic.

name: Spiritomb
pokedex: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

pokedex_full.Diamond: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
pokedex_full.Sword: Exactly 108 spirits gathered to become this Pokémon. Apparently there are some ill-natured spirits in the mix.
pokedex_full.Shield: All Spiritomb’s mischief and misdeeds compelled a traveler to use a mysterious spell to bind Spiritomb to an odd keystone.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It is a Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It lays curses by thinking wicked thoughts. Writings tell that this Pokémon was born out of the assembly of five score and eight malevolent spirits.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
pokedex_full.Violet: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.

name: Gible
pokedex: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It once lived in the tropics. To avoid the cold, it lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
pokedex_full.Sun: It lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat. Even so, when the weather gets cold, it will huddle close with others of its kind.
pokedex_full.Moon: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It reacts to anything that moves—flies right at it and bites it. Sometimes it injures itself, but it doesn’t care too much.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its original home is an area much hotter than Alola. If you’re planning to live with one, your heating bill will soar.
pokedex_full.Sword: Gible prefers to stay in narrow holes in the sides of caves heated by geothermal energy. This way, Gible can stay warm even during a blizzard.
pokedex_full.Shield: Gible attacks anything that moves, and it drags whatever it catches into the crevice that is its lair. Despite the big mouth, Gible’s stomach is small.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It once lived in the tropics. To avoid the cold, it lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It nests in caves untouched by sunlight. Its sharp teeth may fall out when worn away or after an impact, but they regrow within a few days.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.
pokedex_full.Violet: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gabite
pokedex: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

pokedex_full.Diamond: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It habitually digs up and hoards gems in its nest. Its loot is constantly targeted by thieves.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
pokedex_full.Sun: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.
pokedex_full.Moon: Shiny objects are its passion. It can be found in its cave, scarcely moving, its gaze fixed on the jewels it’s amassed or Carbink it has caught.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It loves shiny things. When it finds a Sableye trying to catch a Carbink, Gabite becomes furiously angry and attacks the Sableye.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It sheds its skin and gradually grows larger. Its scales can be ground into a powder and used as raw materials for traditional medicine.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon emits ultrasonic waves from a protrusion on either side of its head to probe pitch-dark caves.
pokedex_full.Shield: Jewels are buried in the caves these Pokémon nest in, but you’ll be torn apart by claws and fangs the moment you enter one of these caves.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal incurable illnesses.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It habitually digs up and hoards gems in its nest. Its loot is constantly targeted by thieves.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Though Gabite are usually of a violent disposition, when I gave one a glass bead it had been eyeing covetously, it suddenly became quite docile.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.
pokedex_full.Violet: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
pokedex: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

pokedex_full.Diamond: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
pokedex_full.Sun: It can fly at speeds rivaling jet planes. It dives into flocks of bird Pokémon and gulps the entire flock down whole.
pokedex_full.Moon: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It flies at the speed of sound while searching for prey, and it has midair battles with Salamence as the two compete for food.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its fine scales don’t just reduce wind resistance—their sharp edges also cause injury to any opponent who attacks it.
pokedex_full.Sword: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.
pokedex_full.Shield: Garchomp is fast both underground and above. It can bring down prey and return to its den before its body has chilled from being outside.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Soars across the heavens at blinding speed—a magnificent sight! It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
pokedex_full.Violet: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.

name: Munchlax
pokedex: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.
pokedex_full.Pearl: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
pokedex_full.Platinum: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
pokedex_full.Sun: It needs to consume its own weight in food every day. As far as flavor is concerned, it’s indifferent.
pokedex_full.Moon: When it finds something that looks like it might be edible, it goes right ahead and swallows it whole. That’s why it gets fatter day by day.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It hides food under its long fur, but it sometimes forgets about it and causes a stinky disturbance.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Anything that looks edible, Munchlax will go on and swallow whole. Its stomach is tough enough to handle it even if the food has gone rotten.
pokedex_full.Sword: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.
pokedex_full.Shield: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing it whole with almost no chewing.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its robust stomach allows it to nonchalantly devour even rotted matter. It pays frequent visits to villages, seeking out food scraps intended for compost.

name: Riolu
pokedex: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

pokedex_full.Diamond: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
pokedex_full.Pearl: Its body is lithe yet powerful. It can crest three mountains and cross two canyons in one night.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
pokedex_full.Sun: It can discern the physical and emotional states of people, Pokémon, and other natural things from the shape of their aura waves.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s tough enough to run right through the night, and it’s also a hard worker, but it’s still just a youngster.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It knows how people and Pokémon feel by looking at their auras. It doesn’t approach dangerous opponents.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It uses waves called auras to communicate with others of its kind. It doesn’t make any noise during this time, so its enemies can’t detect it.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s exceedingly energetic, with enough stamina to keep running all through the night. Taking it for walks can be a challenging experience.
pokedex_full.Shield: It can use waves called auras to gauge how others are feeling. These same waves can also tell this Pokémon about the state of the environment.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: Its body is lithe yet powerful. It can crest three mountains and cross two canyons in one night.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Though infantile in appearance, it has the mysterious ability to read the minds of humans. The pure of heart are met with Riolu’s approval, while those of ill nature earn only its loathing.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.
pokedex_full.Violet: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions, such as joy and rage, in the form of waves.

name: Lucario
pokedex: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
pokedex_full.Pearl: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
pokedex_full.Platinum: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to LUCARIO, since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.
pokedex_full.Black/White: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
pokedex_full.Sun: Not only does it perceive auras, but it has also gained the power to control them. It employs them in battle.
pokedex_full.Moon: They can detect the species of a living being— and its emotions—from over half a mile away. They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It concentrates its mental energy and fires off mysterious waves called auras, which can crush boulders of large size to dust.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Lucario reads its opponent’s feelings with its aura waves. It finds out things it would rather not know, so it gets stressed out easily.
pokedex_full.Sword: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.
pokedex_full.Shield: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokémon’s trust.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
pokedex_full.Shining Pearl: By sensing the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway beings. I have given the name “aura” to this power.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.
pokedex_full.Violet: A well-trained one can use its aura to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Hippopotas
pokedex: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

pokedex_full.Diamond: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
