pokedex_full.Platinum: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: Its saliva can decompose anything. It wraps its long tongue around things to coat them with its sticky saliva.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It has space in its throat to store saliva. It can also roll up its tongue and store it in the same spot.
pokedex_full.Black/White: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A contest is under way to determine which one can stick its tongue out the farthest. The current record is...more than 82 feet.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It uses its tongue much more skillfully than its hands or its feet. It can deftly pick up a single small bean with its tongue.
pokedex_full.Sword: Lickilicky’s strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky’s tongue can stretch so far.
pokedex_full.Shield: Lickilicky can do just about anything with its tongue, which is as dexterous as the human hand. In contrast, Lickilicky’s use of its fingers is clumsy.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its tongue can extend and contract freely, and it is capable of reaching lengths over 10 times Lickilicky’s height. Beware of the saliva, as it contains corrosive elements.

name: Rhyperior
pokedex: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: From holes in its palms, it fires out GEODUDE. Its carapace  can withstand volcanic eruptions.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.
pokedex_full.Sword: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.
pokedex_full.Shield: It relies on its carapace to deflect incoming attacks and throw its enemy off balance. As soon as that happens, it drives its drill into the foe.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. On rare occasions, the Pokémon even shoots out Geodude.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This Pokémon evolved through use of a curious item. Its rocklike hide is composed of a mysterious substance and can withstand a blow from a masterwork sword with nary a scratch.

name: Tangrowth
pokedex: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its arms are made of plants that bind themselves to things. They grow back right away if cut.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: When it remains still, it appears to be a large shrub. Unsuspecting prey that wander near get ensnared by its vines.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can’t even see its eyes.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its arms are made of plants that bind themselves to things. They grow back right away if cut.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Even if one of its arms is eaten, it’s fine. The Pokémon regenerates quickly and will go right back to normal.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can’t even see its eyes.
pokedex_full.Sword: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.
pokedex_full.Shield: Vine growth is accelerated for Tangrowth living in warm climates. If the vines grow long, Tangrowth shortens them by tearing parts of them off.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Draped with long vines, it resembles a shrub in appearance. It swings bundles of vines as though they were arms, wrapping them around prey to ensnare them.

name: Electivire
pokedex: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Heedless of enemy attacks, it closes in, shoves its tails onto the foe, then looses high voltage.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Heedless of enemy attacks, it closes in, shoves its tails onto the foe, then looses high voltage.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The instant it presses the tips of its tails onto an opponent, it sends over 20,000 volts of electricity into the foe.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
pokedex_full.Sun: It pushes the tips of its tails against its foes and then lets loose a high-voltage current. Its foes are burned to a crisp in an instant.
pokedex_full.Moon: When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars and electric sparks shower all around.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It grips its tail, which spews electricity, and then beats down opponents with the power of its electrified fist.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A single Electivire can provide enough electricity for all the buildings in a big city for a year.
pokedex_full.Sword: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.
pokedex_full.Shield: In terms of electrical-energy output, Electivire is one of the best among all Electric Pokémon. It discharges high-voltage currents from its tails.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of electricity.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its evolution was induced by an unusual item, and its electrical output rises along with its heart rate. From its tails, it can unleash an electric current measuring 20,000 volts.

name: Magmortar
pokedex: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
pokedex_full.Black/White: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When shooting 3,600 degree F fireballs from its arms, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
pokedex_full.Sun: They dwell in volcanic craters. According to what is known, a single pair of male and female Magmortar lives in one volcano.
pokedex_full.Moon: From its arm, it launches fireballs hotter than 3,500 degrees Fahrenheit. Its arm starts to melt when it fires a whole barrage.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: There are still quite a few factories that rely on the flames provided by Magmortar to process metals.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Magmortar takes down its enemies by shooting fireballs, which burn them to a blackened crisp. It avoids this method when hunting prey.
pokedex_full.Sword: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Shield: Living in the crater of a volcano has caused this Pokémon’s body to resemble its environment—it has an organ similar to a magma chamber.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Use of a strange item caused this Pokémon to evolve. Fireballs launched from the ends of its tubelike arms are hot enough to melt an iron pot in an instant.

name: Togekiss
pokedex: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.
pokedex_full.Sword: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly been seen at all.
pokedex_full.Shield: Known as a bringer of blessings, it’s been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It will never appear where there is strife. Sightings of this Pokémon have recently become rare.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Scant few have ever sighted this Pokémon. After studying what literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when peace reigns in the land.

name: Yanmega
pokedex: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its jaw power is incredible. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: The beat of its wings is so powerful that it accidentally dislodges full-grown trees when it takes off in flight.
pokedex_full.Black/White: Its jaw power is incredible. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Extremely violent. When hunting, it wastes none of its energy, aiming only for prey’s most vulnerable spots. Any who manage to tame this Pokémon must be of incredible bravery.

name: Leafeon
pokedex: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: When you see LEAFEON asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
pokedex_full.Black/White: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: With cells similar to those of plants, it performs photosynthesis inside its body and creates pure air.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its cellular composition is closer to that of a plant than an animal. It uses photosynthesis to produce its energy supply without eating food.
pokedex_full.Moon: The younger they are, the more they smell like fresh grass. With age, their fragrance takes on the odor of fallen leaves.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it doesn’t like disputes, it will sharpen the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has to protect its friends.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It gets its nutrition from photosynthesis. It lives a quiet life deep in forests where clean rivers flow.
pokedex_full.Sword: Galarians favor the distinctive aroma that drifts from this Pokémon’s leaves. There’s a popular perfume made using that scent.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon’s tail is blade sharp, with a fantastic cutting edge that can slice right though large trees.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Cells similar to those of plants have been found in its fur. Its hard tail can fell a large tree with one stroke, and the tail’s sharpness exceeds even that of a sword crafted by a master.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
pokedex_full.Violet: The younger they are, the more they smell like fresh grass. With age, their fragrance takes on the odor of fallen leaves.

name: Glaceon
pokedex: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.
pokedex_full.Platinum: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It causes small ice crystals to form by lowering the temperature of the surrounding atmosphere.
pokedex_full.Black/White: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
pokedex_full.Sun: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
pokedex_full.Moon: It freezes its fur into icicles, spiky and sharp, and tackles its prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below –75 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It can instantaneously freeze any moisture that’s around it, creating ice pellets to shoot at its prey.
pokedex_full.Sword: Any who become captivated by the beauty of the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen before they know it.
pokedex_full.Shield: The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular Pokémon at ski resorts.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: As a defense mechanism, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand out like needles.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly. It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters like gems while it flutters and dances around.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
pokedex_full.Violet: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

name: Gliscor
pokedex: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
pokedex_full.Platinum: If it succeeds in catching even a faint breeze properly, it can circle the globe without flapping once.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
pokedex_full.Black/White: If it succeeds in catching even a faint breeze properly, it can circle the globe without flapping once.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It dances silently through the sky. When it approaches prey, it can land a critical hit in an instant.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, Gliscor swoops!
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It glides soundlessly on pitch-black wings and sinks sharp fangs into the throat of its prey. It takes on a look of satisfaction once it has entirely drained its prey of blood.

name: Mamoswine
pokedex: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
pokedex_full.Platinum: A frozen one was dug up from soil dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement.
pokedex_full.HeartGold: A frozen MAMOSWINE was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
pokedex_full.SoulSilver: It flourished worldwide during the ice age but its population declined when the masses of ice began to dwindle.
pokedex_full.Black/White: A frozen one was dug up from soil dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When the temperature rose at the end of the ice age, most Mamoswine disappeared.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.
pokedex_full.Shield: It looks strong, and that’s exactly what it is. As the weather grows colder, its ice tusks grow longer, thicker, and more impressive.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The ice age is over and the climate has warmed, so this Pokémon’s population has thinned.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This species reached its zenith during the period known as the ice age. I suspect that Hisui’s frigid climate is in harmony with Mamoswine’s constitution, thus awakening hidden potential.

name: Porygon-Z
pokedex: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
pokedex_full.Platinum: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...
pokedex_full.Sun: In order to create a more advanced Pokémon, an additional program was installed, but apparently it contained a defect that makes it move oddly.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its program was modified to facilitate extra-dimensional activities, but that led to noticeably strange behavior.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its behavior is noticeably unstable, which is apparently due to the incompetence of the engineer who updated its programming.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A faulty update was added to its programming. Its behavior is noticeably strange, so the experiment may have been a failure.
pokedex_full.Sword: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z’s behavior.
pokedex_full.Shield: Some say an additional program made this Pokémon evolve, but even academics can’t agree on whether Porygon-Z is really an evolution.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Additional software was installed to make it an even better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A curious item induced this evolution. The Pokémon’s offensive capabilities have greatly increased, but the strangeness of its behavior has magnified in equal measure. This worries me.

name: Gallade
pokedex: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
pokedex_full.Platinum: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
pokedex_full.Sword: True to its honorable-warrior image, it uses the blades on its elbows only in defense of something or someone.
pokedex_full.Shield: Sharply attuned to others’ wishes for help, this Pokémon seeks out those in need and aids them in battle.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using the extending swords on its elbows.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The blades extending from its elbows are sharper than the finest swords. Its swordsmanship, albeit self-taught, is astonishingly impressive.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
pokedex_full.Violet: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

name: Probopass
pokedex: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: It controls three units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force. With them, it can attack the foe from three directions.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

pokedex_full.Moon: The main body controls three mobile units called Mini-Noses, which it maneuvers to catch prey.

pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It uses three small units to catch prey and battle enemies. The main body mostly just gives orders.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its entire body exudes strong magnetism. Probopass controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It is able to emit powerful magnetism, allowing it control over the iron sand that forms its luscious mustache. Using this iron sand, Probopass forms hard stones with which it smites its prey.

name: Dusknoir
pokedex: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

pokedex_full.Diamond/Pearl: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
pokedex_full.Platinum: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
pokedex_full.HeartGold/SoulSilver: This feared Pokémon is said to travel to worlds unknown. Some even believe that it takes lost spirits along with it.
pokedex_full.Black/White/Black 2/White 2: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
pokedex_full.Sword: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.
pokedex_full.Shield: With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten— Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.

pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.

name: Froslass

pokedex_full.SoulSilver: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as FROSLASS

pokedex_full.Moon: The soul of a woman lost on a snowy mountain possessed an icicle, becoming this Pokémon. The food it most relishes is the souls of men.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It freezes hikers who have come to climb snowy mountains and carries them back to its home. It only goes after men it thinks are handsome.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s said that on nights of terrible blizzards, it comes down to human settlements. If you hear it knocking at your door, do not open it!
pokedex_full.Sword: After a woman met her end on a snowy mountain, her regrets lingered on. From them, this Pokémon was born. Its favorite food is frozen souls.
pokedex_full.Shield: It spits out cold air of nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit to freeze its quarry. It brings frozen prey back to its lair and neatly lines them up.
pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: It freezes foes with an icy breath that is nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: A Pokémon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.
pokedex_full.Violet: It freezes prey by blowing its −58 degree Fahrenheit breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

name: Rotom

pokedex_full.Platinum: Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

pokedex_full.Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This bizarre Pokémon appears to be a will-o’-the-wisp powered by electricity. Be wary, as Rotom is both smart and mischievous.

pokedex_full.Black: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing in defeat.

name: Samurott
pokedex: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

pokedex_full.Black: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
pokedex_full.White: Part of the armor on its anterior legs becomes a giant sword. Its cry alone is enough to intimidate most enemies.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

name: Patrat
pokedex: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

pokedex_full.Black: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
pokedex_full.White: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. They feel insecure without a lookout.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.

name: Watchog
pokedex: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

pokedex_full.Black: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
pokedex_full.White: They make the patterns on their bodies shine in order to threaten predators. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

name: Lillipup
pokedex: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.

pokedex_full.Black: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.
pokedex_full.White: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.
pokedex_full.Sun: Because it doesn’t yelp, it’s extremely popular with Trainers who live in apartment buildings.
pokedex_full.Moon: The long fur surrounding its face functions as radar, enabling it to probe the condition of its battle opponents.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon has excellent judgment. If it decides it can’t defeat an opponent, it immediately turns tail and vamooses.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is popular with beginners because it’s intelligent, obedient to its Trainer’s commands, and easy to raise.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious. It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect information about its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon is far brighter than the average child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it receives or any abuse it suffers.

name: Herdier
pokedex: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

pokedex_full.Black: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
pokedex_full.White: It loyally follows its Trainer’s orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its dense black fur grows continuously. The high cost of keeping its hard fur properly groomed makes this a troublesome Pokémon to train.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon obeys its master’s orders faithfully. However, it refuses to listen to anything said by a person it doesn’t respect.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The longer its black fur grows, the harder and more impervious it gets. Claws and fangs can’t easily penetrate it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It has been living with people for so long that portrayals of it can be found on the walls of caves from long, long ago.
pokedex_full.Sword: Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon. So much so that there’s a theory that Herdier was the first Pokémon to partner with people.
pokedex_full.Shield: The black fur that covers this Pokémon’s body is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce right off.

name: Stoutland
pokedex: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

pokedex_full.Black: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
pokedex_full.White: This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
pokedex_full.Sun: Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant, it’s a trustworthy partner on rescue teams.
pokedex_full.Moon: With this wise Pokémon, there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a little uncomfortable.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its fur is long and thick. A long time ago in cold regions, every household kept a Stoutland.
pokedex_full.Sword: These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans. Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up to people in about three days.
pokedex_full.Shield: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.

name: Purrloin
pokedex: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

pokedex_full.Black: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
pokedex_full.White: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
pokedex_full.Sword: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.
pokedex_full.Shield: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

name: Liepard
pokedex: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.

pokedex_full.Black: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.
pokedex_full.White: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
pokedex_full.Sword: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.

name: Pansage
pokedex: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.
pokedex_full.White: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.

name: Simisage
pokedex: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

pokedex_full.Black: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
pokedex_full.White: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It strikes its enemies with a thorn-covered tail. The leaf on its head is bitter.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

name: Pansear
pokedex: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

pokedex_full.Black: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.
pokedex_full.White: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Simisear
pokedex: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

pokedex_full.Black: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
pokedex_full.White: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

name: Panpour
pokedex: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

pokedex_full.Black: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
pokedex_full.White: It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
pokedex: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.

pokedex_full.Black: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
pokedex_full.White: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

name: Munna
pokedex: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.

pokedex_full.Black: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.
pokedex_full.White: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
pokedex_full.Sword: Late at night, it appears beside people’s pillows. As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body give off a faint glow.
pokedex_full.Shield: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.

name: Musharna
pokedex: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

pokedex_full.Black: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.White: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
pokedex_full.Sword: When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.
pokedex_full.Shield: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.

name: Pidove
pokedex: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

pokedex_full.Black: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
pokedex_full.Sword: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. If you’re scattering food for them, be careful— several hundred of them can gather at once.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.

name: Tranquill
pokedex: It can return to its Trainer’s location regardless of the distance separating them.

pokedex_full.Black: It can return to its Trainer’s location regardless of the distance separating them.
pokedex_full.White: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
pokedex_full.Sword: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.
pokedex_full.Shield: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.

name: Unfezant
pokedex: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.

pokedex_full.Black: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
pokedex_full.White: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

name: Blitzle
pokedex: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.

pokedex_full.Black: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.
pokedex_full.White: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

name: Zebstrika
pokedex: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

pokedex_full.Black: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
pokedex_full.White: This ill-tempered Pokémon is dangerous because when it’s angry, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: Roggenrola
pokedex: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

pokedex_full.Black: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedex_full.White: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The hexagonal-shaped hole is its ear. It has a tendency to walk in the direction the sound is coming from.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
pokedex_full.Sun: Born deep within the ground, it compares itself with similar species, such as Geodude and Carbink, to settle which has the hardest body.
pokedex_full.Moon: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics and topples over.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The hexagonal hole is its ear. Deep in that ear is an energy core, so if you stick your hand in there, Roggenrola will be very angry!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It was found in a fissure in a layer of exposed rock. The material that makes up its body is dirt from several hundred years ago.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s as hard as steel, but apparently a long soak in water will cause it to soften a bit.
pokedex_full.Shield: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.

name: Boldore
pokedex: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.

pokedex_full.Black: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.
pokedex_full.White: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its orange crystal is a mass of energy. Just one crystal fragment would provide enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks.
pokedex_full.Moon: It explores caves in search of underground water. It’s not comfortable around water, so this Pokémon takes great care in lapping it up.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The energy overflowing from its body has turned into orange crystals that are hard enough to smash diamonds.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its orange crystals are lumps of powerful energy. They’re valuable, so Boldore is sometimes targeted for them.
pokedex_full.Sword: If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.
pokedex_full.Shield: It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.

name: Gigalith
pokedex: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

pokedex_full.Black: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
pokedex_full.White: The solar energy absorbed by its body’s orange crystals is magnified internally and fired from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
pokedex_full.Sun: The blasts of energy it makes from sunbeams have terrifying power. However, it’s not able to fire its blasts at night or on rainy days.
pokedex_full.Moon: Known for its hefty horsepower, this Pokémon is a popular partner for construction workers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it fires off energy with all its might, the power creates countless fissures on its body.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It absorbs rays of sunlight and shoots out energy. It’s usually lurking deep beneath the surface.
pokedex_full.Sword: This hardy Pokémon can often be found on construction sites and in mines, working alongside people and Copperajah.
pokedex_full.Shield: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.

name: Woobat
pokedex: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

pokedex_full.Black: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
pokedex_full.White: Suction from its nostrils enables it to stick to cave walls during sleep. It leaves a heart-shaped mark behind.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
pokedex_full.Sword: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.
pokedex_full.Shield: It emits ultrasonic waves as it flutters about, searching for its prey—bug Pokémon.

name: Swoobat
pokedex: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.

pokedex_full.Black: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.
pokedex_full.White: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
pokedex_full.Sword: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.
pokedex_full.Shield: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.

name: Drilbur
pokedex: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.

pokedex_full.Black: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.
pokedex_full.White: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
pokedex_full.Sword: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.

name: Excadrill
pokedex: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

pokedex_full.Black: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
pokedex_full.White: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Forming a drill with its steel claws and head, it can bore through a steel plate, no matter how thick it is.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill’s rampant digging.
pokedex_full.Shield: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.

name: Audino
pokedex: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

pokedex_full.Black: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
pokedex_full.White: Its auditory sense is astounding. It has a radarlike ability to understand its surroundings through slight sounds.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
pokedex_full.Sword: Audino’s sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino’s ears.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.

name: Timburr
pokedex: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.

pokedex_full.Black: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
pokedex_full.Sword: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
pokedex_full.Shield: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.

name: Gurdurr
pokedex: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
pokedex_full.White: They strengthen their bodies by carrying steel beams. They show off their big muscles to their friends.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
pokedex_full.Sword: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.
pokedex_full.Shield: Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this Pokémon wields its metal beam.

name: Conkeldurr
pokedex: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

pokedex_full.Black: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
pokedex_full.White: They use concrete pillars as walking canes. They know moves that enable them to swing the pillars freely in battle.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
pokedex_full.Sword: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
pokedex_full.Shield: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.

name: Tympole
pokedex: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

pokedex_full.Black: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.
pokedex_full.White: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
pokedex_full.Sword: Graceful ripples running across the water’s surface are a sure sign that Tympole are singing in high-pitched voices below.
pokedex_full.Shield: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.

name: Palpitoad
pokedex: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

pokedex_full.Black: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedex_full.White: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to capture prey.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
pokedex_full.Sword: It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.
pokedex_full.Shield: On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.

name: Seismitoad
pokedex: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

pokedex_full.Black: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
pokedex_full.White: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By putting power into its bumps, it creates vibrations and increases the power of its punches.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
pokedex_full.Sword: The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.

name: Throh
pokedex: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

pokedex_full.Black: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
pokedex_full.White: When they encounter foes bigger than themselves, they try to throw them. They always travel in packs of five.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
pokedex_full.Sword: It performs throwing moves with first-rate skill. Over the course of many battles, Throh’s belt grows darker as it absorbs its wearer’s sweat.
pokedex_full.Shield: They train in groups of five. Any member that can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave the group.

name: Sawk
pokedex: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.

pokedex_full.Black: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.
pokedex_full.White: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
pokedex_full.Sword: If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its single-minded pursuit of strength, it’s best to quietly pass by.
pokedex_full.Shield: The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

name: Sewaddle
pokedex: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.

pokedex_full.Black: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.
pokedex_full.White: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: Swadloon
pokedex: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

pokedex_full.Black: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedex_full.White: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

name: Leavanny
pokedex: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

pokedex_full.Black: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.
pokedex_full.White: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

name: Venipede
pokedex: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

pokedex_full.Black: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
pokedex_full.White: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its prey’s location and state.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
pokedex_full.Sword: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.

name: Whirlipede
pokedex: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

pokedex_full.Black: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
pokedex_full.White: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But, when predators approach, it moves to stab them with poison spikes.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.
pokedex_full.Shield: Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll need for evolution.

name: Scolipede
pokedex: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

pokedex_full.Black: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
pokedex_full.White: Highly aggressive, it uses the claws near its neck to dig into its opponents and poison them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
pokedex_full.Sword: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws’ toxic spikes.
pokedex_full.Shield: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.

name: Cottonee
pokedex: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

pokedex_full.Black: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
pokedex_full.White: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
pokedex_full.Sun: When it finds others of its kind, they all stick together. When enough of them have collected, the mass resembles a cumulonimbus cloud.
pokedex_full.Moon: Pillows and beds stuffed with cotton exhaled by Cottonee are soft and puffy, light and airy— altogether top quality.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: To protect itself, it shoots cotton from its body. When it gets wet in the rain, its cotton grows moist and heavy, and it can’t move as well.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When attacked, it expels cotton from its body to create a diversion. The cotton it loses grows back in quickly.
pokedex_full.Sword: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.
pokedex_full.Shield: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s highly prized by many luxury brands.

name: Whimsicott
pokedex: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

pokedex_full.Black: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
pokedex_full.White: Riding whirlwinds, they appear. These Pokémon sneak through gaps into houses and cause all sorts of mischief.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
pokedex_full.Sun: It rides on the wind and slips into people’s homes. After it has turned a room into a cotton-filled mess, it giggles to itself and takes off.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon appears, riding upon the wind. But if the wind gusts up, it’ll blow the cotton on this Pokémon’s head clean off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This nuisance sneaks into people’s homes, where it hides important things and scatters cotton all over the place.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Whimsicott doesn’t live in a fixed location. It floats around on whirling winds, appearing all over the place to perform its mischief.
pokedex_full.Sword: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.
pokedex_full.Shield: As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.

name: Petilil
pokedex: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

pokedex_full.Black: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedex_full.White: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
pokedex_full.Sun: Although the leaves on its head are bitter enough to cause dizziness, they provide relief from weariness—even more so when boiled.
pokedex_full.Moon: By pruning the leaves on its head with regularity, this Pokémon can be grown into a fine plump shape.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Some say if you dry the leaves on its head, boil them down, and drink the infusion, your vigor will return, so Petilil is popular with the elderly.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They prefer clean water and soil. When the environment they live in turns bad, the whole bunch will up and move to a new area.
