pokedex_full.Sword: Petilil appears around sources of clean water. Boiling leaves from this Pokémon’s head results in a liquid that’s sometimes used as a bug repellent.
pokedex_full.Shield: The deeper the color of a Petilil’s leaves, the healthier the Pokémon is. Petilil sometimes makes its home in a well-tended field or flowerbed.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
pokedex_full.Violet: If the leaves on its head are pruned with regularity, this Pokémon can be grown into a fine plump shape.

name: Lilligant
pokedex: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

pokedex_full.Black: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
pokedex_full.White: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
pokedex_full.Sun: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.
pokedex_full.Moon: As soon as it finds a male to be its partner, the beautiful flower on its head darkens, droops, and withers away.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The fragrance of its flower differs slightly depending on the soil where it grew up. Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s well liked by other Pokémon because of its beauty. The flower on its head needs constant care, or it will soon wither and rot.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head to bloom.
pokedex_full.Shield: Essential oils made from Lilligant flowers have a sublime scent, but they’re also staggeringly expensive.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
pokedex_full.Violet: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.

name: Basculin
pokedex: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.

pokedex_full.Black: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
pokedex_full.White: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other’s school.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other’s school.

name: Sandile
pokedex: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

pokedex_full.Black: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_full.White: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_full.Sun: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
pokedex_full.Moon: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Alola, where it’s warm all year round, is a comfortable environment for this Pokémon. Sometimes you’ll even see it outside of deserts.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Sandile’s still not good at hunting, so it mostly eats things that have collapsed in the desert. It’s called “the cleaner of the desert.”
pokedex_full.Sword: The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand and sleeps until sunrise.
pokedex_full.Shield: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
pokedex_full.Violet: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.

name: Krokorok
pokedex: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

pokedex_full.Black: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
pokedex_full.White: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Protected by thin membranes, their eyes can see even in the dead of night. They live in groups of a few individuals.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
pokedex_full.Sun: They move in groups of a few individuals. A female is often the leader of the group, and the males will gather food.
pokedex_full.Moon: Thanks to the special membrane covering its eyes, it can see its surroundings clearly, even in the middle of the night.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Krokorok really hates it when its body gets cold. On nights when the temperature drops, it digs deep into the desert sands.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It buries some of its prey in the sand to use as emergency meals when its hunts are unsuccessful.
pokedex_full.Sword: Krokorok has specialized eyes that enable it to see in the dark. This ability lets Krokorok hunt in the dead of night without getting lost.
pokedex_full.Shield: Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Protected by thin membranes, their eyes can see even in the dead of night. They live in groups of a few individuals.
pokedex_full.Violet: Thanks to the special membrane covering its eyes, it can see its surroundings clearly, even in the middle of the night.

name: Krookodile
pokedex: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

pokedex_full.Black: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
pokedex_full.White: It can expand the focus of its eyes, enabling it to see objects in the far distance as if it were using binoculars.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of a sandstorm.
pokedex_full.Moon: After clamping down with its powerful jaws, it twists its body around to rip its prey in half.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it spots prey, even at a distance of over 30 miles, it swims through the desert as if it were water, then jumps out and chomps them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It conceals itself in sandstorms that Flygon whip up and waits patiently for prey to appear.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands. Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy plates of iron with almost no effort at all.
pokedex_full.Shield: While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has the patience to stay hidden under sand for days, lying in wait for prey.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: After clamping down with its powerful jaws, it twists its body around to rip its prey in half.
pokedex_full.Violet: Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of a sandstorm.

name: Darumaka
pokedex: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.

pokedex_full.Black: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
pokedex_full.White: Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100° F.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Sword: It derives its power from fire burning inside its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will immediately fall asleep.
pokedex_full.Shield: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.

name: Darmanitan
pokedex: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

pokedex_full.Black: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
pokedex_full.White: When weakened in battle, it transforms into a stone statue. Then it sharpens its mind and fights on mentally.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Maractus
pokedex: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

pokedex_full.Black: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
pokedex_full.White: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokémon flee.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
pokedex_full.Sword: With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.
pokedex_full.Shield: Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds. They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them a precious food source out in the desert.

name: Dwebble
pokedex: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.
pokedex_full.White: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
pokedex_full.Sword: When it finds a stone appealing, it creates a hole inside it and uses it as its home. This Pokémon is the natural enemy of Roggenrola and Rolycoly.
pokedex_full.Shield: It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.

name: Crustle
pokedex: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

pokedex_full.Black: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
pokedex_full.White: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When its boulder is broken in battles for territory, it feels unsure and begins to weaken.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
pokedex_full.Sword: This highly territorial Pokémon prefers dry climates. It won’t come out of its boulder on rainy days.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.

name: Scraggy
pokedex: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

pokedex_full.Black: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedex_full.White: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They move in small groups, walking around lazily. Anyone who makes eye contact gets smacked with a headbutt.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It stretches its saggy skin up to its neck to protect itself. The saggier their skin, the more respect they garner.
pokedex_full.Sword: If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this troublesome Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.

name: Scrafty
pokedex: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.

pokedex_full.Black: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.
pokedex_full.White: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon may be rude, but it takes very good care of its family, its friends, and its turf.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It taunts its opponents by spitting. It has a certain territory that it never leaves its whole life long.
pokedex_full.Sword: As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem, they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.
pokedex_full.Shield: While mostly known for having the temperament of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very good care of its family, friends, and territory.

name: Sigilyph
pokedex: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.

pokedex_full.Black: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.
pokedex_full.White: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
pokedex_full.Sword: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.
pokedex_full.Shield: A discovery was made in the desert where Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been an ancient city were found beneath the sands.

name: Yamask
pokedex: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

pokedex_full.Black: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each retains memories of its former life.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
pokedex_full.Sword: It wanders through ruins by night, carrying a mask that’s said to have been the face it had when it was still human.
pokedex_full.Shield: The spirit of a person from a bygone age became this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching for someone who knows its face.

name: Cofagrigus
pokedex: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

pokedex_full.Black: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
pokedex_full.White: They pretend to be elaborate coffins to teach lessons to grave robbers. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold. People say it no longer remembers that it was once human.
pokedex_full.Shield: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.

name: Tirtouga
pokedex: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

pokedex_full.Black: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_full.White: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. It swam skillfully and dove to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_full.Sun: Based on studies of its skeletal structure, it can apparently dive to ocean depths of over half a mile.
pokedex_full.Moon: Reputed to be the ancestor of most turtle Pokémon, it lived in warm seas approximately a hundred million years ago.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It was restored from an ancient fossil. Tirtouga lived in the sea but came up onto the land to search for prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its hunting grounds encompassed a broad area, from the land to more than half a mile deep in the ocean.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon inhabited ancient seas. Although it can only crawl, it still comes up onto land in search of prey.
pokedex_full.Shield: Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life from a fossil.

name: Carracosta
pokedex: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

pokedex_full.Black: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
pokedex_full.White: Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
pokedex_full.Sun: It constructed its sturdy shell by crunching and swallowing the hard shells or bones of its prey.
pokedex_full.Moon: Active both on land and in the sea, this Pokémon drags its land-based prey into the water to finish it off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its jaws are terrifyingly powerful. It could eat Omastar and Omanyte whole and not be bothered in the slightest by their shells.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Carracosta eats every last bit of the prey it catches, even the shells and bones, to further strengthen its sturdy shell.
pokedex_full.Sword: Carracosta completely devours its prey—bones, shells, and all. Because of this, Carracosta’s own shell grows thick and sturdy.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon emerges from the water in search of prey despite the fact that it moves more slowly on land.

name: Archen
pokedex: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

pokedex_full.Black: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
pokedex_full.White: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It was revived from an ancient fossil. Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and hopped from one branch to another.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
pokedex_full.Sun: It is the ancestor of all bird Pokémon. Archen itself could not actually fly but moved by hopping from treetop to treetop.
pokedex_full.Moon: To all appearances flightless, it was able to glide down from tall treetops to snag its prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Once thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon, some of the latest research suggests that may not be the case.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Restored from a fossil, this ancient bird Pokémon has wings but can’t yet fly.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. As research suggested, Archen is unable to fly. But it’s very good at jumping.
pokedex_full.Shield: Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries and bug Pokémon.

name: Archeops
pokedex: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

pokedex_full.Black: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
pokedex_full.White: It runs better than it flies. It catches prey by running at speeds comparable to those of an automobile.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
pokedex_full.Sun: Although apparently able to fly, they tended to run along the ground, averaging speeds of roughly 25 mph.
pokedex_full.Moon: They hunted in flocks. When one Archeops had the prey cornered, another would swoop on it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This ancient Pokémon’s plumage is delicate, so if anyone other than an experienced professional tries to restore it, they will fail.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, the muscles it uses to flap its wings are still weak, so it needs a long runway in order to take off.
pokedex_full.Sword: It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.
pokedex_full.Shield: Though capable of flight, Archeops was apparently better at hunting on the ground.

name: Trubbish
pokedex: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

pokedex_full.Black: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
pokedex_full.White: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
pokedex_full.Sun: Unsanitary places are what they like best. They can be spotted in Alola, often with Grimer in hot pursuit.
pokedex_full.Moon: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of gas will put a person in the hospital.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes. Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will come drooling.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If a young Pokémon or child breathes in the toxic gas that Trubbish belches out, it could be a life-threatening situation.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.

name: Garbodor
pokedex: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

pokedex_full.Black: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
pokedex_full.White: They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot a poisonous liquid from their right-hand fingertips.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
pokedex_full.Sun: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you’ll experience the effects of the unidentified toxin.
pokedex_full.Moon: For a time, their numbers increased explosively in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer, their population has decreased dramatically.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It locks opponents in place with its left hand, immobilizing them by entirely dousing their bodies with poisonous liquid.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Some say the reason Garbodor in Alola are a little stronger than their counterparts elsewhere is the presence of Muk, their natural enemy.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
pokedex_full.Shield: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.

name: Zorua
pokedex: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

pokedex_full.Black: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
pokedex_full.White: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon has a cowardly disposition, so when it’s not around friends, it basically always stays transformed as something else.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If a normally talkative child suddenly stops talking, it may have been replaced by Zorua.
pokedex_full.Sword: Zorua is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of Zorua’s ability to take on the forms of other creatures.
pokedex_full.Shield: Zorua sometimes transforms into a person and goes into cities to search for food. When Zorua does this, it usually takes on the form of a child.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
pokedex_full.Violet: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

name: Zoroark
pokedex: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

pokedex_full.Black: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
pokedex_full.White: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It doesn’t just transform itself—it also has the power to make hundreds of people see its illusions.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If it thinks humans are going to discover its den, Zoroark shows them visions that make them wander around in the woods.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.
pokedex_full.Shield: Seeking to ease the burden of their solitude, lonely Trainers tell Zoroark to show illusions to them.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.
pokedex_full.Violet: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Minccino
pokedex: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

pokedex_full.Black: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A clean freak that will not allow even the slightest mess, it uses its tail like a mop to thoroughly clean any and all filth.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When its tail has gotten dirty from self-cleaning or from cleaning its nest, Minccino spends a whole day washing its tail in clean spring water.
pokedex_full.Sword: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
pokedex_full.Shield: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.

name: Cinccino
pokedex: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.

pokedex_full.Black: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.
pokedex_full.White: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Cinccino’s body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Cinccino’s body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The white parts of its coat are covered in an oil secreted from its body, so this Pokémon can slide right away from its enemies’ attacks.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The oil that seeps from its body is really smooth. For people troubled by bad skin, this oil is an effective treatment.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
pokedex_full.Shield: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.

name: Gothita
pokedex: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

pokedex_full.Black: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
pokedex_full.White: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It stares intently at everything. It can become so obsessed with watching that it doesn’t notice attacks.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
pokedex_full.Sword: Though they’re still only babies, there’s psychic power stored in their ribbonlike feelers, and sometimes they use that power to fight.
pokedex_full.Shield: Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it’s speaking to something only it can see.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is normally very innocent. When it is staring at something invisible, it is unblinking and utterly silent.
pokedex_full.Violet: Beware of touching the ribbon-shaped feelers that control its psychic power. Gothita will begin bawling if you do.

name: Gothorita
pokedex: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.

pokedex_full.Black: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.
pokedex_full.White: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s said that when stars shine in the night sky, this Pokémon will spirit away sleeping children. Some call it the Witch of Punishment.
pokedex_full.Shield: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon will hypnotize children to put them to sleep before carrying them away. Be wary of nights when the starlight is bright.
pokedex_full.Violet: Using its psychic power, it arranges pebbles to form the shapes of constellations. Some people believe this Pokémon came from outer space.

name: Gothitelle
pokedex: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

pokedex_full.Black: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
pokedex_full.White: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers’ life spans.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainer’s life span, it cries in sadness.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers’ life spans.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes conflict. It’s also able to predict the future based on the movement of the stars.
pokedex_full.Shield: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Gothitelle unleashes psychic energy and shows opponents dreams of the universe’s end. These dreams are apparently ethereal and beautiful.
pokedex_full.Violet: It gazes at the stars to predict the future. It acts somewhat detached because it has seen the end of all existence.

name: Solosis
pokedex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

pokedex_full.Black: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
pokedex_full.White: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they can survive in any environment.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
pokedex_full.Sword: It communicates with others telepathically. Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.
pokedex_full.Shield: Many say that the special liquid covering this Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in the vacuum of space.

name: Duosion
pokedex: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

pokedex_full.Black: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
pokedex_full.White: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its psychic power can supposedly cover a range of more than half a mile—but only if its two brains can agree with each other.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its brain has split into two, and the two halves rarely think alike. Its actions are utterly unpredictable.

name: Reuniclus
pokedex: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

pokedex_full.Black: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
pokedex_full.White: These remarkably intelligent Pokémon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
pokedex_full.Sword: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.

name: Ducklett
pokedex: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.

pokedex_full.Black: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.
pokedex_full.White: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

name: Swanna
pokedex: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

pokedex_full.Black: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
pokedex_full.White: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
pokedex: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

pokedex_full.Black: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
pokedex_full.White: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58° F.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
pokedex_full.Sun: Born of an icicle, this Pokémon uses its frosty breath to make ice crystals, causing snow to fall.
pokedex_full.Moon: It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokémon is treasured by households in warm regions.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It exhales cold air that is at –58 degrees Fahrenheit. When it’s in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When the morning sun hit an icicle, it wished not to melt, and thus Vanillite was born. At night, it buries itself in snow to sleep.
pokedex_full.Sword: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
pokedex_full.Shield: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

name: Vanillish
pokedex: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

pokedex_full.Black: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
pokedex_full.White: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
pokedex_full.Sun: Hot days cause its body to melt. It can be restored by refreezing it, but the process leaves its body slightly warped.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This hearty Pokémon survived the Ice Age. It’s incredibly popular in very hot regions.
pokedex_full.Sword: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
pokedex_full.Shield: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

name: Vanilluxe
pokedex: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

pokedex_full.Black: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
pokedex_full.White: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
pokedex_full.Sun: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.
pokedex_full.Moon: Even if it loses one of its heads, it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love from skiers and snowboarders.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Vanilluxe is born when two Vanillish, half-melted by the day’s light, stick to each other and freeze together in the cold return of night.
pokedex_full.Sword: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
pokedex_full.Shield: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Deerling
pokedex: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

pokedex_full.Black: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.
pokedex_full.White: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

name: Sawsbuck
pokedex: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.

pokedex_full.Black: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
pokedex_full.White: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: Emolga
pokedex: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

pokedex_full.Black: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
pokedex_full.White: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It glides on its outstretched membrane while shocking foes with the electricity stored in the pouches on its cheeks.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
pokedex_full.Sun: It glides using its cape-like membrane. Electrical energy scatters from it, shocking its friends and foes alike.
pokedex_full.Moon: It grills berries and bug Pokémon with electric shocks and makes a meal of them. It usually nests in the holes gouged in trees by Pikipek.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They store up electricity to fly through the air. When thunder cracks at night, sometimes there are almost enough of them to blot out the sky.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: As it flies, it scatters electricity around, so bird Pokémon keep their distance. That’s why Emolga can keep all its food to itself.
pokedex_full.Sword: As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can cause a lot of trouble.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries. Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much food that it can’t fly properly.

name: Karrablast
pokedex: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

pokedex_full.Black: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
pokedex_full.White: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokémon targets Shelmet.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet will cause this Pokémon to evolve.
pokedex_full.Shield: It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell— it eats only the contents.

name: Escavalier
pokedex: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

pokedex_full.Black: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
pokedex_full.Sword: They use shells they’ve stolen from Shelmet to arm and protect themselves. They’re very popular Pokémon in the Galar region.
pokedex_full.Shield: It charges its enemies, lances at the ready. An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.

name: Foongus
pokedex: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

pokedex_full.Black: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
pokedex_full.White: For some reason, this Pokémon resembles a Poké Ball. They release poison spores to repel those who try to catch them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball then releases poison spores.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.
pokedex_full.Sword: No one knows what the Poké Ball–like pattern on Foongus means or why Foongus has it.
pokedex_full.Shield: The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried, the spores can be used as stomach medicine.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: There is a theory that the developer of the modern-day Poké Ball really liked Foongus, but this has not been confirmed.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon prefers damp places. It spurts out poison spores to repel approaching enemies.

name: Amoonguss
pokedex: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

pokedex_full.Black: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
pokedex_full.White: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon puffs poisonous spores at its foes. If the spores aren’t washed off quickly, they’ll grow into mushrooms wherever they land.
pokedex_full.Shield: Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have been dropped on the ground.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Be wary of the poisonous spores it releases. Mushrooms resembling Amoonguss’s caps will grow out of anywhere the spores touch.
pokedex_full.Violet: Amoonguss mimics Poké Balls. It is not yet clear whether this mimicry is effective against other Pokémon.

name: Frillish
pokedex: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

pokedex_full.Black: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.
pokedex_full.White: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It wraps its veillike arms and legs around prey swimming by and drags them down to the depths of the ocean.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Using the invisible poison spikes on its veillike arms and legs, it paralyzes its enemies and causes them to drown.

name: Jellicent
pokedex: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

pokedex_full.Black: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
pokedex_full.White: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Jellicent is always hanging around fancy cruise ships and tankers, hoping to drag away its prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Fishermen are terrified of Jellicent. It’s rumored to drag them into the sea and steal their lives away.

name: Alomomola
pokedex: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.

pokedex_full.Black: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
pokedex_full.White: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
pokedex_full.Sun: It uses its special mucus to close the wounds of injured Pokémon. The reason for this behavior remains unknown.
pokedex_full.Moon: They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokémon gather in the area around Alomomola.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Fishermen take them along on long voyages, because if you have an Alomomola with you, there’ll be no need for a doctor or medicine.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened condition is that any Pokémon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
pokedex_full.Violet: They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokémon gather in the area around Alomomola.

name: Joltik
pokedex: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.

pokedex_full.Black: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.
pokedex_full.White: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
pokedex_full.Sword: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t produce a charge on its own.
pokedex_full.Shield: Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out static electricity. They’re often found sticking to Yamper’s hindquarters.

name: Galvantula
pokedex: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

pokedex_full.Black: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
pokedex_full.White: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
pokedex_full.Sword: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
pokedex_full.Shield: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.

name: Ferroseed
pokedex: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

pokedex_full.Black: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
pokedex_full.White: They stick their spikes into cave walls and absorb the minerals they find in the rock.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
pokedex_full.Sword: It defends itself by launching spikes, but its aim isn’t very good at first. Only after a lot of practice will it improve.
pokedex_full.Shield: Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings. Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s spikes grow big and strong.

name: Ferrothorn
pokedex: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

pokedex_full.Black: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.
pokedex_full.White: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks, and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb the nutrients it finds within the stone.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.

name: Klink
pokedex: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

pokedex_full.Black: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
pokedex_full.White: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
pokedex_full.Sword: The two minigears that compose this Pokémon are closer than twins. They mesh well only with each other.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people’s invention of the first gears.

name: Klang
pokedex: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

pokedex_full.Black: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
pokedex_full.White: Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don’t return.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn’t return, it will die.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn’t return, it will die.
pokedex_full.Sword: When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and this Pokémon’s rotation speed increases sharply.
pokedex_full.Shield: Many companies in the Galar region choose Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered the symbol of industrial technology.

name: Klinklang
pokedex: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

pokedex_full.Black: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
pokedex_full.White: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
pokedex_full.Sword: From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of electricity. Its red core contains an enormous amount of energy.
pokedex_full.Shield: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t a living creature.

name: Tynamo
pokedex: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

pokedex_full.Black: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_full.Violet: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.

name: Eelektrik
pokedex: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

pokedex_full.Black: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
pokedex_full.Violet: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

name: Eelektross
pokedex: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

pokedex_full.Black: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
pokedex_full.White: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It latches on to prey with its sucker mouth, sinking in its fangs and shocking the prey with powerful electricity.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
pokedex_full.Violet: It latches on to prey with its sucker mouth, sinking in its fangs and shocking the prey with powerful electricity.

name: Elgyem
pokedex: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

pokedex_full.Black: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.
pokedex_full.White: This Pokémon had never been seen until it appeared from far in the desert 50 years ago.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It controls tremendous psychic power. Most reports of alien sightings are actually just people mistaking Elgyem for an alien.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is shrouded in mystery. It’s said to have appeared from a UFO that fell from the sky about 50 years ago.
pokedex_full.Sword: If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to exert its psychic powers.

name: Beheeyem
pokedex: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.

pokedex_full.Black: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
pokedex_full.White: It uses psychic power to control an opponent’s brain and tamper with its memories.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It uses psychic power to control an opponent’s brain and tamper with its memories.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: With its psychic powers, it rewrites its opponents’ memories. You, too, may have already had your memories rewritten.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It has strong psychic powers. Using its fingers that flash three different colors, it controls its opponents and rewrites their memories.
pokedex_full.Sword: Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.
pokedex_full.Shield: Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields, this Pokémon can control the memories of its opponents.

name: Litwick
pokedex: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

pokedex_full.Black: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
pokedex_full.White: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokémon.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
pokedex_full.Sword: The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.
pokedex_full.Shield: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns.

name: Lampent
pokedex: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

pokedex_full.Black: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
pokedex_full.White: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.
pokedex_full.Shield: It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.

name: Chandelure
pokedex: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

pokedex_full.Black: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.
pokedex_full.White: Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.
pokedex_full.Shield: In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of lights, funerals were a constant occurrence— or so it’s said.

name: Axew
pokedex: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

pokedex_full.Black: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
pokedex_full.White: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its large tusks have a tendency to break, but each time they grow back, they grow in harder and sturdier.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
pokedex_full.Sword: These Pokémon nest in the ground and use their tusks to crush hard berries. Crushing berries is also how they test each other’s strength.
pokedex_full.Shield: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon lives in nests that are made in the ground. People in ancient times used its tusks as cooking knives.
pokedex_full.Violet: If you see peculiar teeth marks on boulders or trees, it means an Axew is likely living nearby.

name: Fraxure
pokedex: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.

pokedex_full.Black: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.
pokedex_full.White: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
