pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
pokedex_full.Sword: After battle, this Pokémon carefully sharpens its tusks on river rocks. It needs to take care of its tusks—if one breaks, it will never grow back.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents, stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Because its tusks don’t grow back once they break, this Pokémon apparently won’t use them unless truly necessary.
pokedex_full.Violet: Fraxure uses its thick tusks to neatly cut prey into two portions—one to eat now and one to save for later.

name: Haxorus
pokedex: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

pokedex_full.Black: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
pokedex_full.White: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its resilient tusks are its pride and joy. It licks up dirt to take in the minerals it needs to keep its tusks in top condition.
pokedex_full.Shield: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon nests in caves and abandoned mines. It is docile, but it will become incredibly angry if its tusks are touched, so beware.
pokedex_full.Violet: It overwhelms enemies with its prized tusks, which are sharp enough to cut through a metal transmission tower in one strike.

name: Cubchoo
pokedex: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.

pokedex_full.Black: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.
pokedex_full.White: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
pokedex_full.Sword: When this Pokémon is in good health, its snot becomes thicker and stickier. It will smear its snot on anyone it doesn’t like.
pokedex_full.Shield: It sniffles before performing a move, using its frosty snot to provide an icy element to any move that needs it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Many of this species can be found along the shorelines of cold regions. If a Cubchoo lacks dangling snot, there’s a chance it is sick.
pokedex_full.Violet: When Cubchoo starts sneezing, watch out! If it spatters you with its frosty snot, you’ll get frostbite.

name: Beartic
pokedex: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

pokedex_full.Black: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
pokedex_full.White: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
pokedex_full.Sword: It swims through frigid seas, searching for prey. From its frozen breath, it forms icy fangs that are harder than steel.
pokedex_full.Shield: It swims energetically through frigid seas. When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater with its breath so it can rest on the ice.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It is a ferocious, carnivorous Pokémon. Once it captures its prey, it will breathe cold air onto the prey to freeze and preserve it.
pokedex_full.Violet: Feared as the Snow-White Demon in northern lands, Beartic uses its frosty claws and fangs to attack prey.

name: Cryogonal
pokedex: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

pokedex_full.Black: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
pokedex_full.White: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148° F.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Sword: With its icy chains, Cryogonal freezes those it encounters. It then takes its victims away to somewhere unknown.
pokedex_full.Shield: When the weather gets hot, these Pokémon turn into water vapor. Cryogonal are almost never seen during summer.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It is said that people and Pokémon who die on snowy mountains are reborn into these Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Violet: Cryogonal uses its chains of ice to constrict its opponents and then flash-freezes them where they stand.

name: Shelmet
pokedex: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

pokedex_full.Black: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
pokedex_full.White: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
pokedex_full.Sword: When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell. This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast, however, because they can still get into the shell.
pokedex_full.Shield: It has a strange physiology that responds to electricity. When together with Karrablast, Shelmet evolves for some reason.

name: Accelgor
pokedex: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

pokedex_full.Black: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
pokedex_full.White: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When its body dries out, it weakens. So it wraps a membrane around itself for protection while it spits poison.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
pokedex_full.Sword: It moves with blinding speed and lobs poison at foes. Featuring Accelgor as a main character is a surefire way to make a movie or comic popular.
pokedex_full.Shield: Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in bands of membrane.

name: Stunfisk
pokedex: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

pokedex_full.Black: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedex_full.White: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When its opponent can’t be paralyzed, it contorts itself with unexpected speed and flops away.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
pokedex_full.Sword: Thanks to bacteria that lived in the mud flats with it, this Pokémon developed the organs it uses to generate electricity.
pokedex_full.Shield: For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly when it emits a strong electric current from the yellow markings on its body.

name: Mienfoo
pokedex: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

pokedex_full.Black: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
pokedex_full.White: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They can often be seen in packs in the morning, slowly moving their bodies through a series of poses.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They seclude themselves in the mountains and devote themselves to training. The form of their kicks and chops differs from pack to pack.
pokedex_full.Sword: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.
pokedex_full.Shield: Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce. Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.

name: Mienshao
pokedex: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

pokedex_full.Black: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
pokedex_full.White: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It overwhelms its opponents with continuous attacks and then slowly stores up power before delivering the finishing blow.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When Mienshao lets out a bizarre wail, you’re in danger. A flurry of kicks and chops too fast to see is about to be unleashed!
pokedex_full.Sword: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.
pokedex_full.Shield: Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into tiny pieces.

name: Druddigon
pokedex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

pokedex_full.Black: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
pokedex_full.White: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The red skin on its face is harder than rock. In narrow caves, it squares off against its enemies and charges face-first right into them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It infiltrates tunnels that Pokémon like Diglett and Dugtrio have dug and quietly waits for prey to pass through.
pokedex_full.Sword: Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips sunbathing—it won’t be able to move if its body gets too cold.
pokedex_full.Shield: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

name: Golett
pokedex: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

pokedex_full.Black: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
pokedex_full.White: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It’s been active for thousands of years.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It’s been active for thousands of years.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its movements are powered by a mysterious energy. It has continued to move since ancient times, so its power may soon run out.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although ancient people apparently built it by working with clay, the source of its energy is unclear.
pokedex_full.Sword: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.

name: Golurk
pokedex: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

pokedex_full.Black: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
pokedex_full.White: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon. They run on a mysterious energy.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Some say that ancient people invented Golurk to serve as a laborer. It follows its master’s orders faithfully.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When the seal on its chest is removed, it rages indiscriminately, turning the whole town around it into a mountain of rubble.
pokedex_full.Sword: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
pokedex_full.Shield: There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.

name: Pawniard
pokedex: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

pokedex_full.Black: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedex_full.White: They fight at Bisharp’s command. They cling to their prey and inflict damage by sinking their blades into it.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: After shredding its prey, it sharpens its blades on a stone by the river. Each Pawniard has its own favorite sharpening stone.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It follows Bisharp’s orders to a tee when it attacks enemies. After slashing an opponent, Pawniard clangs both of its blades together.
pokedex_full.Sword: It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges of the blades covering its body. These sharpened blades allow it to bring down opponents.
pokedex_full.Shield: A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently, dreaming of one day taking the lead.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.
pokedex_full.Violet: Any chips in its blades would prove fatal for it. After each battle, it diligently maintains its blades using its favorite sharpening stone.

name: Bisharp
pokedex: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

pokedex_full.Black: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.
pokedex_full.White: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: No matter how strong the Bisharp, it’s said that if the blade on its head is chipped, it will retire from its position as the boss.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It leads a group of Pawniard. Bisharp doesn’t even change its expression when it deals the finishing blow to an opponent.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s accompanied by a large retinue of Pawniard. Bisharp keeps a keen eye on its minions, ensuring none of them even think of double-crossing it.
pokedex_full.Shield: Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and Fraxure over places where sharpening stones can be found.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon commands a group of several Pawniard. Groups that are defeated in territorial disputes are absorbed by the winning side.
pokedex_full.Violet: Bisharp mercilessly cuts its opponents to pieces with the sharp blades covering its body. It will do anything to win.

name: Bouffalant
pokedex: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

pokedex_full.Black: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
pokedex_full.White: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They are known to charge so wildly that if a train were to enter their territory, they would send it flying.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
pokedex_full.Sword: These Pokémon can crush a car with no more than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on their heads hold higher positions within the herd.
pokedex_full.Shield: These Pokémon live in herds of about 20 individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will lose the hair on their heads for some reason.

name: Rufflet
pokedex: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

pokedex_full.Black: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedex_full.White: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
pokedex_full.Sun: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
pokedex_full.Moon: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it’s a carnivore at heart.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck out their insides.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in order to gain their acceptance.
pokedex_full.Sword: If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can’t resist challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses, it starts bawling.
pokedex_full.Shield: A combative Pokémon, it’s ready to pick a fight with anyone. It has talons that can crush hard berries.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
pokedex_full.Violet: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it’s a carnivore at heart.

name: Braviary
pokedex: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

pokedex_full.Black: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
pokedex_full.White: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky  get from their peers.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
pokedex_full.Sun: With its brave disposition, it fears nothing—not even death. Ancient Alolan people respected it, referring to it as “the hero of the sky.”
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s thought that people disturbed their habitats in the past, so Braviary banded together to fight back.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The more scars it has on its front, the more heroic it’s considered to be. Those with many scars on their back are mocked by the flock.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Known as “the hero of the skies,” this Pokémon is so proud and so brave that it will never retreat, even when it’s injured.
pokedex_full.Sword: Known for its bravery and pride, this majestic Pokémon is often seen as a motif for various kinds of emblems.
pokedex_full.Shield: Because this Pokémon is hotheaded and belligerent, it’s Corviknight that’s taken the role of transportation in Galar.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky get from their peers.
pokedex_full.Violet: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

name: Vullaby
pokedex: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

pokedex_full.Black: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedex_full.White: They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
pokedex_full.Sun: It protects its plump posterior with the bones of prey it has consumed. As it grows, it  replaces the bones.
pokedex_full.Moon: It can’t fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. Since it’s still at a playful age, it hops around friskily.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Mandibuzz gives it the bones it wears. Vullaby’s wings are short, so it can’t fly yet, but it jumps around, dreaming of wide open skies.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its healthy appetite leads to visible growth spurts. It often has to replace the bones it wears as its size increases.
pokedex_full.Sword: It wears a bone to protect its rear. It often squabbles with others of its kind over particularly comfy bones.
pokedex_full.Shield: Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed down to younger ones in the nest.

name: Mandibuzz
pokedex: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

pokedex_full.Black: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.
pokedex_full.White: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
pokedex_full.Sun: They adorn themselves beautifully with bones. This is supposedly an effort to attract males, but no male Mandibuzz have ever been found.
pokedex_full.Moon: It circles in the sky, keeping a keen eye out for Pokémon in a weakened state. Its choicest food is Cubone.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It skillfully arranges the bones of its prey to construct its nest. Most of the bones are Cubone.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s always searching for food for Vullaby. When it finds a weak Pokémon, Mandibuzz swoops it right off to its nest.
pokedex_full.Sword: Although it’s a bit of a ruffian, this Pokémon will take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them till they’re ready to leave the nest.
pokedex_full.Shield: They adorn themselves with bones. There seem to be fashion trends among them, as different bones come into and fall out of popularity.

name: Heatmor
pokedex: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

pokedex_full.Black: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.
pokedex_full.White: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and consume their insides.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and consume their insides.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
pokedex_full.Sword: There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
pokedex_full.Shield: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.

name: Durant
pokedex: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

pokedex_full.Black: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
pokedex_full.White: Durant dig nests in mountains. They build their complicated, interconnected tunnels into mazes.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
pokedex_full.Sword: They lay their eggs deep inside their nests. When attacked by Heatmor, they retaliate using their massive mandibles.
pokedex_full.Shield: With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.

name: Deino
pokedex: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

pokedex_full.Black: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.
pokedex_full.White: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
pokedex_full.Sword: When it encounters something, its first urge is usually to bite it. If it likes what it tastes, it will commit the associated scent to memory.
pokedex_full.Shield: Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It can’t see, so its first approach to examining things is to bite them. You will be covered in wounds until a Deino warms up to you.
pokedex_full.Violet: It nests deep inside a cave. Food there is scarce, so Deino will sink its teeth into anything that moves and attempt to eat it.

name: Zweilous
pokedex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

pokedex_full.Black: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
pokedex_full.White: Since their two heads do not get along and compete with each other for food, they always eat too much.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
pokedex_full.Sword: While hunting for prey, Zweilous wanders its territory, its two heads often bickering over which way to go.
pokedex_full.Shield: Their two heads will fight each other over a single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in scars even without battling others.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The two heads do not get along at all. If you don’t give each head the same amount of attention, they’ll begin fighting out of jealousy.
pokedex_full.Violet: The two heads have different likes and dislikes. Because the heads fight with each other, Zweilous gets stronger without needing to rely on others.

name: Hydreigon
pokedex: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

pokedex_full.Black: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.
pokedex_full.White: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
pokedex_full.Sword: There are a slew of stories about villages that were destroyed by Hydreigon. It bites anything that moves.
pokedex_full.Shield: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their target goes down.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Only the central head has a brain. It is very intelligent, but it thinks only of destruction.
pokedex_full.Violet: It’s said that Hydreigon grew ferocious because people in times long past loathed it, considering it to be evil incarnate and attacking it relentlessly.

name: Larvesta
pokedex: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
pokedex_full.White: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.
pokedex_full.Sword: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.
pokedex_full.Shield: Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.
pokedex_full.Violet: In ancient times, Larvesta was worshiped as the emissary of the sun. However, it was also viewed as a burden since it often caused forest fires.

name: Volcarona
pokedex: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

pokedex_full.Black: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.
pokedex_full.White: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as “the rage of the sun.”
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon that were suffering from the cold.
pokedex_full.Sword: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it’s trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon scatters burning scales. Most of the danger of these scales is not in their heat—it’s in the way they rob the surrounding air of oxygen.

name: Cobalion
pokedex: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

pokedex_full.Black: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.
pokedex_full.White: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon appears in a legend alongside Terrakion and Virizion, fighting against humans in defense of the Unova region’s Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will calm even vicious foes.

name: Terrakion
pokedex: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
pokedex_full.White: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sword: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against humans in an effort to protect other Pokémon.

name: Virizion
pokedex: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
pokedex_full.White: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
pokedex_full.Sword: A legend tells of this Pokémon working together with Cobalion and Terrakion to protect the Pokémon of the Unova region.
pokedex_full.Shield: It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick movements, slicing them up with its horns.

name: Tornadus
pokedex: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

pokedex_full.Black: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedex_full.White: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: This storm-stirring Pokémon is said to cause the seasons to turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be a false one.

name: Thundurus
pokedex: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

pokedex_full.Black: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
pokedex_full.White: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.

name: Reshiram
pokedex: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

pokedex_full.Black: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
pokedex_full.White: When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.
pokedex_full.Sword: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It’s said that this Pokémon will scorch the world.
pokedex_full.Shield: According to myth, if people ignore truth and let themselves become consumed by greed, Reshiram will arrive to burn their kingdoms down.

name: Zekrom
pokedex: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

pokedex_full.Black: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
pokedex_full.White: This Pokémon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
pokedex_full.Sword: When the interior part of its tail spins like a motor, Zekrom can generate many bolts of lightning to blast its surroundings.
pokedex_full.Shield: Mythology tells us that if people lose the righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms will be razed by Zekrom’s lightning.

name: Landorus
pokedex: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

pokedex_full.Black: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
pokedex_full.White: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.

name: Kyurem
pokedex: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

pokedex_full.Black: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
pokedex_full.White: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
pokedex_full.Sword: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.
pokedex_full.Shield: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.

name: Keldeo
pokedex: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

pokedex_full.Black: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.
pokedex_full.White: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Meloetta
pokedex: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

pokedex_full.Black: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
pokedex_full.White: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Genesect
pokedex: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.

pokedex_full.Black: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
pokedex_full.White: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
pokedex_full.Black 2/White 2: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Chespin
pokedex: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

name: Quilladin
pokedex: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won’t start fights.

name: Chesnaught
pokedex: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: Fennekin
pokedex: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: Braixen
pokedex: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Delphox
pokedex: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: Froakie
pokedex: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
pokedex: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

name: Greninja
pokedex: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: Bunnelby
pokedex: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
pokedex_full.Sword: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

name: Diggersby
pokedex: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it’s finished digging, it lounges lazily.
pokedex_full.Sword: With power equal to an excavator, it can dig through dense bedrock. It’s a huge help during tunnel construction.
pokedex_full.Shield: The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokémon.

name: Fletchling
pokedex: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it’s merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
pokedex_full.Sun: This amiable Pokémon is easy to train. But when battle is joined, it shows its ferocious side.
pokedex_full.Moon: When it’s excited, its temperature can double, spiking hormone production in its body.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: While it’s an amiable Pokémon, if you touch it unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an instant, and you’ll be burned.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its melodious cries are actually warnings. Fletchling will mercilessly peck at anything that enters its territory.
pokedex_full.Shield: When this Pokémon gets excited, its body temperature increases sharply. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is normally calm, but once it enters battle, its hormonal balance changes and it becomes aggressive.
pokedex_full.Violet: Fletchling can be found in both rural and urban areas. They once had a huge territorial dispute with Squawkabilly. Fights broke out all over town.

name: Fletchinder
pokedex: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
pokedex_full.Sun: From its beak, it fires embers at its prey. Once it has caught them, it grills them at high heat before feasting upon them.
pokedex_full.Moon: It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its territory, which has a radius of several miles.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug Pokémon, frightened by the flames, come flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in the top speed class of all bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sword: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder’s sharp talons finish it off.
pokedex_full.Shield: Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and aggressive. These Pokémon fight among themselves over feeding grounds.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Fletchinder scatters embers in tall grass where bug Pokémon might be hiding and then catches them as they come leaping out.
pokedex_full.Violet: Its territory has a radius of just over a mile. If any bird Pokémon should enter, it will show them no mercy.

name: Talonflame
pokedex: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its favorite foods are Wingull and Pikipek. It attacks with a powerful kick and grasps them firmly in its talons.
pokedex_full.Moon: It zooms directly at its prey at flight speeds of close to 310 mph, while fiery embers scatter from gaps in its feathers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its tough wings don’t allow fire to pass through them. A long time ago, firefighters’ outfits were made from Talonflame wings.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Bird Pokémon make up most of its diet. It approaches at high speeds and smacks them down to the ground with its powerful kick.
pokedex_full.Sword: Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird Pokémon. To intimidate opponents, it sends embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.
pokedex_full.Shield: Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to 310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks, giving the prey no chance to escape.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It has top-notch flying capabilities. It flies around easily, even while carrying prey that weighs more than 220 lbs.
pokedex_full.Violet: When it gets excited, it vents sparks from the gaps between its feathers. These unburnable feathers are used as a fireproof material.

name: Scatterbug
pokedex: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Any poison this Pokémon takes in is converted into a black powder and secreted. That’s why Scatterbug can eat poisonous leaves and roots.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon scatters poisonous powder to repel enemies. It will eat different plants depending on where it lives.

name: Spewpa
pokedex: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: If Rufflet attacks this Pokémon by pecking at it, it will retaliate with its sharp fur and poisonous black powder.
pokedex_full.Violet: Spewpa doesn’t live in a fixed location. It roams where it pleases across the fields and mountains, building up the energy it needs to evolve.

name: Vivillon
pokedex: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: Litleo
pokedex: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When they’re young, they live with a pride. Once they’re able to hunt prey on their own, they’re kicked out and have to make their own way.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This hot-blooded Pokémon is filled with curiosity. When it gets angry or starts fighting, its short mane gets hot.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: When Litleo are young, female Pyroar will teach them how to hunt. Once the Litleo mature, they will leave the pride and set out on their own.
pokedex_full.Violet: The more a Litleo trains its body and spirit by battling mighty enemies, the hotter its mane will grow.

name: Pyroar
pokedex: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The males are usually lazy, but when attacked by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends with no regard for its own safety.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The females of a pride work together to bring down prey. It’s thanks to them that their pride doesn’t starve.
pokedex_full.Violet: The mane of a male Pyroar heats up to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit during battle. Merely approaching it will cause severe burns.

name: Flabébé
pokedex: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind’s embrace with an untroubled heart.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It’s not safe without the power of a flower, but it will keep traveling around until it finds one with the color and shape it wants.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it’s collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.

name: Floette
pokedex: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It raises flowers and uses them as weapons. The more gorgeous the blossom, the more power it contains.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.

name: Florges
pokedex: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It controls the flowers it grows. The petal blizzards that Florges triggers are overwhelming in their beauty and power.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.

name: Skiddo
pokedex: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Until recently, people living in the mountains would ride on the backs of these Pokémon to traverse the mountain paths.
pokedex_full.Violet: As long as it has sunlight and water, Skiddo can make energy with the leaves on its body, allowing it to live on rocky mountains barren of food.

name: Gogoat
pokedex: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It can sense the feelings of others by touching them with its horns. This species has assisted people with their work since 5,000 years ago.
pokedex_full.Violet: These Pokémon live in herds in mountainous places. The victor in their contests of clashing horns will become the leader of the herd.

name: Pancham
pokedex: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can’t help grinning if anyone pats its head.
pokedex_full.Sun: It grows up imitating the behavior of Pangoro, which it looks up to as a leader.
pokedex_full.Moon: There’s no point to the leaf in its mouth, aside from an effort to look cool. It’s mischievous, so it’s not well suited to inexperienced Trainers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It follows Pangoro around like a henchman. When Pancham makes a big mistake, its leaf gets taken away.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s desperate to intimidate its opponents. Be nice and pretend to be scared if you catch it glaring at you intensely.
pokedex_full.Sword: It chooses a Pangoro as its master and then imitates its master’s actions. This is how it learns to battle and hunt for prey.
pokedex_full.Shield: Wanting to make sure it’s taken seriously, Pancham’s always giving others a glare. But if it’s not focusing, it ends up smiling.

name: Pangoro
pokedex: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.
pokedex_full.Sun: It boasts superb physical strength. Those who wish to become Pangoro’s Trainer have no choice but to converse with their fists.
pokedex_full.Moon: From the slight twitches of its bamboo leaf, it deduces its opponent’s movements. It’s eager to tussle but kindhearted toward its companions.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This rowdy Pokémon boasts great physical strength. Many Trainers are also smitten by its lively character.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Pangoro is the type to talk with its fists. It doesn’t say much as it pummels opponents with enough force to send a dump truck flying.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is quick to anger, and it has no problem using its prodigious strength to get its way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon.
pokedex_full.Shield: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

name: Furfrou
pokedex: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou’s fur into the most exquisite style.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.

name: Espurr
pokedex: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.
pokedex_full.Sword: Though Espurr’s expression never changes, behind that blank stare is an intense struggle to contain its devastating psychic power.
pokedex_full.Shield: There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.

name: Meowstic
pokedex: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

name: Honedge
pokedex: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person’s arm and drains that person’s life energy completely.
pokedex_full.Sword: Honedge’s soul once belonged to a person who was killed a long time ago by the sword that makes up Honedge’s body.
pokedex_full.Shield: The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people’s lives away.

name: Doublade
pokedex: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.
pokedex_full.Sword: Honedge evolves into twins. The two blades rub together to emit a metallic sound that unnerves opponents.
pokedex_full.Shield: The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between offense and defense to bring down their prey.

name: Aegislash
pokedex: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

name: Spritzee
pokedex: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.
pokedex_full.Sword: A scent pouch within this Pokémon’s body allows it to create various scents. A change in its diet will alter the fragrance it produces.
pokedex_full.Shield: The scent its body gives off enraptures those who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of love for Spritzee.

name: Aromatisse
pokedex: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
pokedex_full.Sword: The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so powerful that this Pokémon’s companions will eventually lose their sense of smell.
pokedex_full.Shield: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent’s will to fight.

name: Swirlix
pokedex: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
pokedex_full.Sword: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
pokedex_full.Shield: The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes Swirlix’s fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

name: Slurpuff
pokedex: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human’s, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It’s like it can see with its nose!
pokedex_full.Sword: By taking in a person’s scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It’s hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
pokedex_full.Shield: Slurpuff’s fur contains a lot of air, making it soft to the touch and lighter than it looks.

name: Inkay
pokedex: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent’s will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It draws prey near with its blinking lights and then wraps them up in its long tentacles and holds them in place.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When exchanging information with others of its kind, it flashes the light-emitting spots on its body in a complex rhythm.
pokedex_full.Sword: It spins while making its luminescent spots flash. These spots allow it to communicate with others by using different patterns of light.
pokedex_full.Shield: By exposing foes to the blinking of its luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them, and then it seizes the chance to flee.

name: Malamar
pokedex: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it comes to strong hypnosis, there’s an endless number of people who utilize Malamar for their nefarious deeds.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It flashes the pattern on its torso to control its prey and draw them in. The edges of its fins are supremely sharp.
pokedex_full.Sword: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar’s control.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s said that Malamar’s hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.

name: Binacle
pokedex: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
pokedex_full.Sword: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
pokedex_full.Shield: If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.

name: Barbaracle
pokedex: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head’s orders.
pokedex_full.Sword: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
