pokedex_full.Shield: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.

name: Skrelp
pokedex: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It vanishes into seaweed and remains perfectly still to avoid attacks from large Pokémon. Rotten seaweed is its main food source.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It’s not good at swimming, so it clings to the seaweed. In the Alola region, it’s often found near Dhelmise.
pokedex_full.Sword: It drifts in the ocean, blending in with floating seaweed. When other Pokémon come to feast on the seaweed, Skrelp feasts on them instead.
pokedex_full.Shield: Skrelp looks like a piece of rotten seaweed, so it can blend in with seaweed drifting on the ocean and avoid being detected by enemies.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid drifting seaweed. It eats rotten seaweed to create its poison.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon is a poor swimmer. If it’s caught in a fierce storm, it will sometimes get washed far away and become unable to return to its home.

name: Dragalge
pokedex: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This vicious Pokémon sprays a poisonous liquid on opponents that come near. For whatever reason, it gets along really well with Dhelmise.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It blends in with seaweed to ambush its prey and then takes them down with a poisonous liquid strong enough to melt metal.
pokedex_full.Sword: Dragalge uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.
pokedex_full.Shield: Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking the plume on its head out above the ocean’s surface and bathing it in sunlight.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Using a liquid poison, Dragalge indiscriminately attacks anything that wanders into its territory. This poison can corrode the undersides of boats.
pokedex_full.Violet: Since Finizen is the better swimmer, Dragalge will approach it under the cover of seaweed, then immobilize it with a poisonous attack.

name: Clauncher
pokedex: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its claws occasionally fall off, and it keeps a low profile until they grow back. The meat of its claws is so delicious!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It moves around by jetting water from its right pincer. It has a poor sense of balance, so it’s terrible at swimming straight.
pokedex_full.Sword: Clauncher’s claws can fall off during battle, but they’ll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is popular as a delicacy in Galar.
pokedex_full.Shield: By detonating gas that accumulates in its right claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet. This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon launches water by detonating gas inside its right claw. It snipes flying Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Violet: Clauncher’s claws will regrow if they fall off. The meat inside the claws is edible, but it has a distinct flavor that doesn’t appeal to all tastes.

name: Clawitzer
pokedex: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It compresses the water it has sucked up and then projects it with enough power to punch a hole right through a thick sheet of iron.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its right arm is packed with meat. When its pincer falls off, it’s exported to be used as a cooking ingredient.
pokedex_full.Sword: After using the feelers on its oversized claw to detect the location of prey, Clawitzer launches a cannonball of water at its target.
pokedex_full.Shield: Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Clawitzer can move through the water at a speed of 60 knots by using gas inside its body to expel water from the back of its claw.
pokedex_full.Violet: The cannonballs of seawater that Clawitzer launches from its claw are powerful enough to punch through tanker hulls.

name: Helioptile
pokedex: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
pokedex_full.Sword: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon’s electric moves.
pokedex_full.Shield: The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

name: Heliolisk
pokedex: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.
pokedex_full.Sword: A now-vanished desert culture treasured these Pokémon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to the Galar region, treasure came with them.
pokedex_full.Shield: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.

name: Tyrunt
pokedex: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its large jaw has incredible destructive power. Some theories suggest that its restored form is different from its form of long ago.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Tyrunt is spoiled and selfish. It may just be trying to frolic, but sometimes the ones it’s trying to frolic with are gravely injured.
pokedex_full.Sword: This is an ancient Pokémon, revived in modern times. It has a violent disposition, and it’ll tear apart anything it gets between its hefty jaws.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon is selfish and likes to be pampered. It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer just by playing around.

name: Tyrantrum
pokedex: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Complete restoration is impossible, allowing room for theories that its entire body was once covered in a feather-like coat.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The king of the ancient world, it can easily crunch a car with the devastating strength of its enormous jaws.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is from about 100,000,000 years ago. It has the presence of a king, vicious but magnificent.
pokedex_full.Shield: A single bite of Tyrantrum’s massive jaws will demolish a car. This Pokémon was the king of the ancient world.

name: Amaura
pokedex: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It lived in cold areas in ancient times. It’s said that when Amaura whinnies, auroras appear in the night sky.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Amaura was restored successfully, but it’s not expected to live long because of the heat of the current environment.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.
pokedex_full.Shield: Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes be found frozen in ice.

name: Aurorus
pokedex: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent’s attack.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: An Aurorus was found frozen solid within a glacier, just as it appeared long ago, which became quite a big event in the news.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This usually quiet and kindly Pokémon has a surface temperature of around –240 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Sword: Aurorus was restored from a fossil. It’s said that when this Pokémon howls, auroras appear in the night sky.
pokedex_full.Shield: When gripped by rage, Aurorus will emanate freezing air, covering everything around it in ice.

name: Sylveon
pokedex: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.
pokedex_full.Sun: Its ribbonlike feelers give off an aura that weakens hostility in its prey, causing them to let down their guard. Then it attacks.
pokedex_full.Moon: When this Pokémon sights its prey, it swirls its ribbonlike feelers as a distraction. A moment later, it pounces.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Once a fight breaks out, it will unflinchingly charge at dragon Pokémon that are many times larger than itself.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Sylveon wraps its ribbonlike feelers around its Trainer’s arm because this touch enables it to read its Trainer’s feelings.
pokedex_full.Sword: By releasing enmity-erasing waves from its ribbonlike feelers, Sylveon stops any conflict.
pokedex_full.Shield: There’s a Galarian fairy tale that describes a beautiful Sylveon vanquishing a dreadful dragon Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: It emits a soothing aura from its ribbon-shaped organs. It wraps these appendages around quarrelers to instantly restore calm to the situation.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon uses its ribbonlike feelers to send a soothing aura into its opponents, erasing their hostility.
pokedex_full.Violet: Sylveon cuts an elegant figure as it dances lightly around, feelers fluttering, but its piercing moves aim straight for its opponents’ weak spots.

name: Hawlucha
pokedex: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It overwhelms opponents with quick moves, but sometimes it showboats for too long when it’s using a special move and gets itself into a pinch.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: In combat, Hawlucha leaps nimbly about, taking advantage of its opponents’ blind spots. It’s also skilled at using superb submission holds.
pokedex_full.Sword: It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy finishing move.
pokedex_full.Shield: It always strikes a pose before going for its finishing move. Sometimes opponents take advantage of that time to counterattack.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its elegant finishing moves—performed by nimbly leaping around using its wings—are polished in the forest where it was born and raised.
pokedex_full.Violet: Hawlucha live quietly without flocking together. They fight constantly with their natural enemies: noisy groups of Primeape.

name: Dedenne
pokedex: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It sneaks into people’s homes and steals electricity from their outlets. When your electric bill seems off, it’s the handiwork of this rascal.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its upper whiskers are sensors that survey its surroundings. Its lower whiskers are organs that shoot electricity.
pokedex_full.Sword: A Dedenne’s whiskers pick up electrical waves other Dedenne send out. These Pokémon share locations of food or electricity with one another.
pokedex_full.Shield: Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other electric Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It’s small and its electricity-generating organ is not fully developed, so it uses its tail to absorb electricity from people’s homes and charge itself.
pokedex_full.Violet: Dedenne emit electrical waves from the whiskers on their cheeks to communicate with each other. When low on electricity, they curl up and sleep.

name: Carbink
pokedex: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It’s occasionally found during the excavation of caves.
pokedex_full.Sun: Born from the high temperatures and pressures deep underground, it defends itself by firing beams from the jewel part of its body.
pokedex_full.Moon: Although this Pokémon is not especially rare, its glittering, jewel-draped body draws attention from people.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Some say that deep beneath the surface of the world, a pack of Carbink live with their queen in a kingdom of jewels.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: To keep the jewels on their bodies free of tarnish, packs of Carbink use their soft manes to polish one another’s jewels.
pokedex_full.Sword: When beset by attackers, Carbink wipes them all out by firing high-energy beams from the gems embedded in its body.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.

name: Goomy
pokedex: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It’s covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
pokedex_full.Sun: The weakest of all Dragon-type Pokémon, it’s unable to breathe if its skin dries out, so it sticks to shady places.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its source of protection is its slimy, germ-laden mucous membrane. Anyone who touches it needs some thorough hand-washing.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It uses its horns to check out its surroundings. They’re very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its body is mostly water. If it dries out, it will die, so it’s always sitting with perfect stillness in the shade.
pokedex_full.Sword: Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if the weather becomes too arid. It’s considered the weakest dragon Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into hiding. This is how they’ve survived.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it’s nice and humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon instantly becomes lethargic.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Most of a Goomy’s body is water. A membrane covers the whole Pokémon to prevent it from shriveling up in dry weather.
pokedex_full.Violet: Goomy’s horns are excellent sensory organs that cover all five of Goomy’s senses. Goomy picks up on danger from the movement of the air.

name: Sliggoo
pokedex: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.
pokedex_full.Sun: It has trouble drawing a line between friends and food. It will calmly try to melt and eat even those it gets along well with.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon’s mucous can dissolve anything. Toothless, it sprays mucous on its prey. Once they’re nicely dissolved, it slurps them up.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It crawls along sluggishly. The swirly protrusion on its back is filled with its brain and other organs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its entire body is covered with gooey mucus that can dissolve anything. Be sure to put gloves on if you’re going to touch it.
pokedex_full.Sword: Although this Pokémon isn’t very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
pokedex_full.Shield: The lump on its back contains its tiny brain. It thinks only of food and escaping its enemies.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The swirly protrusion on its back is filled with all its vital organs, such as its brain and heart.
pokedex_full.Violet: When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus coating its entire body becomes more concentrated—it’ll dissolve anything.

name: Goodra
pokedex: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that’s the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.
pokedex_full.Sun: An amazingly friendly Pokémon, but if left to itself, loneliness overcomes it, and it oozes gooey tears.
pokedex_full.Moon: It gets picked on because it’s meek. But then, whoever teased it gets to feel the full force of its horns and a good swatting from its thick tail.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It’s very friendly toward people. If you grow close to it, Goodra will hug you with its sticky, slime-covered body. Don’t get mad.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Underneath its slimy skin is a thick layer of fat, and the combination of the two makes enemies’ attacks slide right off.
pokedex_full.Sword: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its form of offense is forcefully stretching out its horns. The strikes land 100 times harder than any blow from a heavyweight boxer.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It loves the rain. This mellow Pokémon can be seen walking around on the plains and in the mountains on rainy days.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon is uncontrollable when enraged. It rampages on and on, lashing its tail with enough power to send a dump truck flying.

name: Klefki
pokedex: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
pokedex_full.Sun: This even-tempered Pokémon has a habit of collecting keys. It will sneak into people’s homes to steal their keys.
pokedex_full.Moon: It inserts its horn into chinks in metal, absorbing metal ions. For some reason, it collects keys.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s unclear why it collects keys, giving it a key makes Klefki very happy. However, it apparently only likes master keys.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Long ago it lived in mines, but once the minerals that make up its diet became scarcer, Klefki began appearing in human settlements.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is constantly collecting keys. Entrust a Klefki with important keys, and the Pokémon will protect them no matter what.
pokedex_full.Shield: Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so much that its head needed to look like one, too.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Once it absorbs a key’s metal ions, it discards the key without a second thought. However, it will hang on to keys it favors for decades.
pokedex_full.Violet: In the past, noble families entrusted their vault keys to a Klefki. They passed the Klefki down through the generations, taking good care of it.

name: Phantump
pokedex: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.
pokedex_full.Sun: These Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died in the forest. Their cries sound like eerie screams.
pokedex_full.Moon: According to legend, medicine to cure any illness can be made by plucking the green leaves on its head, brewing them, and boiling down the liquid.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: By imitating the voice of a child, it causes people to get hopelessly lost deep in the forest. It’s trying to make friends with them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: An unknown spirit came to lodge in a tree stump, creating this Pokémon. A cure-all can be made from an infusion of its green leaves.
pokedex_full.Sword: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit’s rebirth as this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost among the trees.

name: Trevenant
pokedex: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It’s kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.
pokedex_full.Sun: This Pokémon is said to devour anyone daring to ravage the forest. To the creatures dwelling in the forest, it offers great kindness.
pokedex_full.Moon: Through its roots, it exerts control over other trees. A deadly curse falls upon anyone cutting down trees in forests where Trevenant dwell.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It’s feared as a ghost of the forest. Lumberjacks bring along Fire types, which Trevenant hates, when they enter the forest.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon controls trees via roots stretching from its feet, and it will attack anyone that dares to ravage the forest.
pokedex_full.Sword: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.
pokedex_full.Shield: Small roots that extend from the tips of this Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the forest and give Trevenant control over them.

name: Pumpkaboo
pokedex: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

name: Gourgeist
pokedex: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

name: Bergmite
pokedex: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.
pokedex_full.Sword: They chill the air around them to −150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon lives in areas of frigid cold. It secures itself to the back of an Avalugg by freezing its feet in place.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: They live in mountainous regions of frigid cold. On rare occasions, they ride on the back of an Avalugg to cross seas and move to new habitats.
pokedex_full.Violet: Bergmite protects itself by coating its body in ice formed by frigid air of −148 degrees Fahrenheit. It fights with Frigibax whenever they meet.

name: Avalugg
pokedex: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.
pokedex_full.Sword: At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims among the icebergs.
pokedex_full.Shield: As Avalugg moves about during the day, the cracks in its body deepen. The Pokémon’s body returns to a pristine state overnight.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: As Avalugg walks along with Bergmite on its back, it comes across pods of Cetitan. It lets them pass to avoid conflict.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon uses its massive icy body to flatten anything that gets in its way. When it’s floating out on the ocean, it looks exactly like drift ice.

name: Noibat
pokedex: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Fruits are its favorite foods. This gourmet carefully picks out just the ripe ones using its sonar.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It flies around in search of fruit to eat. It uses ultrasonic waves to detect which fruits are ripe.
pokedex_full.Sword: After nightfall, they emerge from the caves they nest in during the day. Using their ultrasonic waves, they go on the hunt for ripened fruit.
pokedex_full.Shield: No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon emits ultrasonic waves from its large ears to search for fruit to eat. It mistakes Applin for its food.
pokedex_full.Violet: Noibat can change the frequency of its sound waves at will, and it generates ultrasonic waves of up to 200,000 hertz.

name: Noivern
pokedex: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it has a violent disposition, if you give it a nice ripe fruit that it loves, Noivern will suddenly become tame.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This hot-blooded Pokémon attacks anything it sees with ultrasonic waves that can crush boulders.
pokedex_full.Sword: Aggressive and cruel, this Pokémon will ruthlessly torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.
pokedex_full.Shield: Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone. Its fangs finish the fight.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Ultrasonic waves emitted by a Noivern can pulverize a large boulder. This Pokémon has a cruel disposition.
pokedex_full.Violet: In the dark, even Hydreigon are terrified of this Pokémon. But in the light, Noivern is the one that avoids battle.

name: Xerneas
pokedex: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

name: Yveltal
pokedex: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

name: Zygarde
pokedex: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It’s hypothesized that it’s monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
pokedex_full.Sun: This is Zygarde’s form when it has gathered 50% of its cells. It wipes out all those who oppose it, showing not a shred of mercy.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s thought to be monitoring the ecosystem. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This is Zygarde’s form when about half of its pieces have been assembled. It plays the role of monitoring the ecosystem.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Some say it can change to an even more powerful form when battling those who threaten the ecosystem.

name: Diancie
pokedex: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

name: Hoopa
pokedex: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.

pokedex_full.X: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.
pokedex_full.Y: It gathers things it likes and passes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.
pokedex_full.Omega Ruby: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.
pokedex_full.Alpha Sapphire: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.

name: Volcanion
pokedex: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

pokedex_full.X/Omega Ruby: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.
pokedex_full.Y/Alpha Sapphire: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

name: Rowlet
pokedex: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

pokedex_full.Sun: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
pokedex_full.Moon: Silently it glides, drawing near its targets. Before they even notice it, it begins to pelt them with vicious kicks.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It feels relaxed in tight, dark places and has been known to use its Trainer’s pocket or bag as a nest.
pokedex_full.Sword: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.
pokedex_full.Shield: During the day, it builds up energy via photosynthesis. At night, it flies silently through the sky, on the prowl for prey.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.

name: Dartrix
pokedex: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

pokedex_full.Sun: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.
pokedex_full.Moon: It throws sharp feathers called blade quills at enemies or prey. It seldom misses.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don’t groom it diligently, it will stop listening to you.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Supremely sensitive to the presence of others, it can detect opponents standing behind it, flinging its sharp feathers to take them out.
pokedex_full.Sword: It throws one knifelike feather after another at its enemies, and each one precisely strikes a weak point. These feathers are known as blade quills.
pokedex_full.Shield: It never slacks when it comes to the task of cleaning its feathers. Thorough preening keeps it looking spiffy and its blade quills nice and sharp.
pokedex_full.Legends: Arceus: Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set into its wings are keen as ever.

name: Decidueye
pokedex: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.

pokedex_full.Sun: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
pokedex_full.Moon: Although basically cool and cautious, when it’s caught by surprise, it’s seized by panic.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at opponents. When it simply can’t afford to miss, it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Decidueye can nock and fire an arrow at an enemy in a tenth of a second, so its battles are decided in the blink of an eye.
pokedex_full.Sword: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueye’s shots never miss.
pokedex_full.Shield: In a tenth of a second, it can nock and fire an arrow quill, piercing an opponent’s weak point before they notice what’s happening.

name: Litten
pokedex: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

pokedex_full.Sun: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
pokedex_full.Moon: It doesn’t allow its emotions to be easily seen. Earning its trust takes time. It prefers solitude.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won’t open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its coat regrows twice a year. When the time comes, Litten sets its own body on fire and burns away the old fur.
pokedex_full.Sword: It spends even the smallest amount of downtime grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves.
pokedex_full.Shield: Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws. Be careful.

name: Torracat
pokedex: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.

pokedex_full.Sun: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.
pokedex_full.Moon: It boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It can act spoiled if it grows close to its Trainer. A powerful Pokémon, its sharp claws can leave its Trainer’s whole body covered in scratches.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When its mane is standing on end, you can tell it’s feeling good. When it isn’t feeling well, its fur will lie down flat.
pokedex_full.Sword: In the midst of battle, the fire pouch on Torracat’s neck rings like a bell and produces stronger flames than usual.
pokedex_full.Shield: When facing a powerful enemy, Torracat’s fighting spirit gets pumped up, and its fire bell blazes hotter.

name: Incineroar
pokedex: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.

pokedex_full.Sun: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.
pokedex_full.Moon: After hurling ferocious punches and flinging furious kicks, it finishes opponents off by spewing fire from around its navel.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When its fighting spirit is set alight, the flames around its waist become especially intense.
pokedex_full.Sword: It excels at violent, no-holds-barred battles. The temperature of the flames that issue from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Shield: Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its most notable trait, but the way it helps out small Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.

name: Popplio
pokedex: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.

pokedex_full.Sun: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon can control water bubbles. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Popplio gets on top of its bouncy water balloons to jump higher. It’s quite the acrobatic fighter!
pokedex_full.Sword: It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer force of their bursting is what deals damage.
pokedex_full.Shield: If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons, they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for these Pokémon to develop their skills.

name: Brionne
pokedex: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.

pokedex_full.Sun: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.
pokedex_full.Moon: It cares deeply for its companions. When its Trainer is feeling down, it performs a cheery dance to try and help.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It attacks by smacking its enemies with the exploding water balloons that it creates.
pokedex_full.Sword: As if dancing, it artfully dodges the attacks of its enemies. All the while, it’s busy forming a bunch of balloons to overwhelm its foes.
pokedex_full.Shield: On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance with one another to the singing of the Primarina that’s leading them.

name: Primarina
pokedex: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.

pokedex_full.Sun: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its singing voice is its chief weapon in battle. This Pokémon’s Trainer must prioritize the daily maintenance of its throat at all costs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Also known as a songstress, it has a fantastical look on moonlit nights when it leads its colony in song.
pokedex_full.Sword: With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to control its water balloons.
pokedex_full.Shield: For Primarina, every battle’s a stage. Its singing and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize the audience.

name: Pikipek
pokedex: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.

pokedex_full.Sun: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon feeds on berries, whose leftover seeds become the ammunition for the attacks it fires off from its mouth.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can get some idea of its mood or condition from the rhythm of its pecking.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times per second!

name: Trumbeak
pokedex: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.

pokedex_full.Sun: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.
pokedex_full.Moon: By bending its beak, it can produce a variety of calls and brand itself a noisy nuisance for its neighbors.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over a hundred different cries at will.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise to new plants.

name: Toucannon
pokedex: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.

pokedex_full.Sun: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.
pokedex_full.Moon: Within its beak, its internal gas ignites, explosively launching seeds with enough power to pulverize boulders.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Known for forming harmonious couples, this Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a good luck charm.

name: Yungoos
pokedex: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

pokedex_full.Sun: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.
pokedex_full.Moon: It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk, it collapses from exhaustion and falls asleep on the spot.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It’s a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its stomach fills most of its torso. It wanders the same path every day, searching for fresh food.
pokedex_full.Violet: It spends its waking hours searching endlessly for food. When Yungoos is hungry, its ferocity gains a certain edge.

name: Gumshoos
pokedex: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.

pokedex_full.Sun: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.
pokedex_full.Moon: It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner, but as it’s diurnal, it never encounters them. This Pokémon boasts incredible patience.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it wasn’t originally found in Alola, this Pokémon was brought over a long time ago when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favorite meal—Rattata!
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Once it finds signs of prey, it will patiently stake out the location, waiting until the sun goes down.
pokedex_full.Violet: Gumshoos specializes in relentlessly tracking down prey. The simple-minded Skwovet doesn’t seem to provide Gumshoos enough challenge.

name: Grubbin
pokedex: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.
pokedex_full.Moon: They often gather near places frequented by electric Pokémon in order to avoid being attacked by bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: If you find its nest, you shouldn’t stick your hand inside. You’ll get bitten by an irritated Grubbin.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It spits a sticky thread to stop opponents in their tracks, and then it grabs them in its sharp, sturdy mandibles to take them down.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
pokedex_full.Shield: It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.

name: Charjabug
pokedex: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.
pokedex_full.Moon: From the food it digests, it generates electricity, and it stores this energy in its electric sac.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely moves, munching away on humus. If you accidentally step on one, you’ll get a shock!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its stout shell provides excellent defense from attacks. It uses electricity on persistent opponents.
pokedex_full.Sword: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores the electricity for later use.

name: Vikavolt
pokedex: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.

pokedex_full.Sun: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.
pokedex_full.Moon: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking beams of electrical energy.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It has an organ that generates electricity in its abdomen. It concentrates energy in its strong jaws and fires off powerful jolts of electricity.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Vikavolt flusters opponents with acrobatic flying maneuvers. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electric beam attack.
pokedex_full.Sword: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
pokedex_full.Shield: If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery, a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered beams of electricity.

name: Crabrawler
pokedex: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

pokedex_full.Sun: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.
pokedex_full.Moon: It punches so much, its pincers often come off from overuse, but they grow back quickly. What little meat they contain is rich and delicious.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Its hard pincers are well suited to both offense and defense. Fights between two Crabrawler are like boxing matches.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Crabrawler has been known to mistake Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.
pokedex_full.Violet: If it loses its pincers, they’ll quickly regrow. The pincers are popular ingredients in paella since their shells produce a tasty soup stock.

name: Crabominable
pokedex: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.

pokedex_full.Sun: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.
pokedex_full.Moon: It just throws punches indiscriminately. In times of desperation, it can lop off its own pincers and fire them like rockets.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling. There are records of its turning back avalanches with a flurry of punches.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The detached pincers of these Pokémon are delicious. Some Trainers bring Lechonk into the mountains just to search for them.
pokedex_full.Violet: Though its punches are powerful, this Pokémon’s movements are sluggish. It blows icy bubbles from its mouth to immobilize its opponents.

name: Oricorio
pokedex: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

pokedex_full.Sun: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Oricorio has sipped red nectar. Its passionate dance moves cause its enemies to combust in both body and mind.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon becomes fiercely angry.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is incredibly popular, possibly because its passionate dancing is a great match with the temperament of Paldean people.
pokedex_full.Violet: This form of Oricorio has sipped red nectar. It whips up blazing flames as it moves to the steps of its passionate dance.

name: Cutiefly
pokedex: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

pokedex_full.Sun: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.
pokedex_full.Moon: Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the heads of people who have auras resembling those of flowers.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Cutiefly can pick up the auras of living things. It skillfully reads those auras to predict its foes’ movements and make fools of them.
pokedex_full.Sword: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying to get some of Gossifleur’s pollen.
pokedex_full.Shield: An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can glide around the attack and strike back.

name: Ribombee
pokedex: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.

pokedex_full.Sun: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.
pokedex_full.Moon: Some of Ribombee’s pollen puffs are highly nutritious. They are sometimes sold as supplements.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Rain makes pollen damp, so Ribombee hates rain. When it sees ominous clouds, it finds a hollow in a tree, where it waits stock-still.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It can predict the weather from moisture levels and wind direction. Ribombee only reveals itself when there are a few clear days in a row.
pokedex_full.Sword: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
pokedex_full.Shield: Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or rained on. In the cloudy Galar region, they are very seldom seen.

name: Rockruff
pokedex: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

pokedex_full.Sun: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon has lived with people since times long ago. It can sense when its Trainer is in the dumps and will stick close by its Trainer’s side.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: As they develop, their disposition grows more violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them too much to handle and abandon them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When it rubs the rocks on its neck against you, that’s proof of its love for you. However, the rocks are sharp, so the gesture is quite painful!
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon can bond very strongly with its Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon intimidates opponents by striking the ground with the rocks on its neck. The moment an opponent flinches, Rockruff attacks.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is very friendly when it’s young. Its disposition becomes vicious once it matures, but it never forgets the kindness of its master.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon travels in a pack with others until it grows up. When its mood turns sour, it starts striking the ground with the rocks on its neck.

name: Lycanroc
pokedex: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.
pokedex_full.Moon: When properly raised from a young age, it will become a trustworthy partner that will absolutely never betray its Trainer.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. Lycanroc wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The rocks in its mane are sharper than a knife. Fragments that break off are treasured as good luck charms.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks jutting from its mane are razor sharp.
pokedex_full.Shield: With swift movements, this Pokémon gradually backs its prey into a corner. Lycanroc’s fangs are always aimed toward opponents’ weak spots.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.
pokedex_full.Violet: It has a calm and collected demeanor. It swiftly closes in on its prey, then slices them with the rocks in its mane.

name: Wishiwashi
pokedex: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

pokedex_full.Sun: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s awfully weak and notably tasty, so everyone is always out to get it. As it happens, anyone trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They’re weak, so they move in schools. However, they can also often be seen all alone, having strayed from the school.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When it’s in a jam, its shining eyes attract others of its kind. The light from its eyes is visible almost 25 miles away.
pokedex_full.Sword: Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by gathering up into schools that they’re able to confront opponents.
pokedex_full.Shield: When it senses danger, its eyes tear up. The sparkle of its tears signals other Wishiwashi to gather.

name: Mareanie
pokedex: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.

pokedex_full.Sun: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.
pokedex_full.Moon: It’s found crawling on beaches and seafloors. The coral that grows on Corsola’s head is as good as a five-star banquet to this Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They eat Corsola branches, so Mareanie are hated by craftsmen who work with Corsola branches that have naturally fallen off.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Aside from its head, its body parts regenerate quickly if they’re cut off. After a good night’s sleep, Mareanie is back to normal.
pokedex_full.Sword: The first symptom of its sting is numbness. The next is an itching sensation so intense that it’s impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.
pokedex_full.Shield: Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie of the Galar region have not yet figured out that the branches of Corsola are delicious.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon wanders the seaside looking for food. It often gets electric shocks from broken Pincurchin spines that it tries to eat.
pokedex_full.Violet: It has excellent regenerative capabilities. Legs that a Mareanie has lost have a very bitter, astringent flavor—they’re not suitable as food.

name: Toxapex
pokedex: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.

pokedex_full.Sun: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.
pokedex_full.Moon: Those attacked by Toxapex’s poison will suffer intense pain for three days and three nights. Post-recovery, there will be some aftereffects.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: To attack, this Pokémon sends toxic spikes flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get mown down by the claws on its feet.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: With its 12 legs, it creates a dome to shelter within. The flow of the tides doesn’t affect Toxapex in there, so it’s very comfortable.
pokedex_full.Sword: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.
pokedex_full.Shield: Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still be suffering three days after it first takes effect.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon lives within a dome made by its own legs. Toxapex monitors its surroundings by sensing the flow of the tide through its spikes.
pokedex_full.Violet: Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Bruxish over areas where warm ocean currents flow, but the odds are always against it.

name: Mudbray
pokedex: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.

pokedex_full.Sun: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.
pokedex_full.Moon: It has a stubborn, individualistic disposition. Eating dirt, making mud, and playing in the mire all form part of its daily routine.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It loves playing in the mud. If it isn’t showered with mud on a daily basis, it gets stressed out and stops listening to its Trainer.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Possessing mighty power, Mudbray can be loaded with 50 times its own body weight and will be totally fine.
pokedex_full.Sword: Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon. It’s skilled at making use of mud.
pokedex_full.Shield: It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk on rough terrain without slipping.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon covers itself in mud that it has regurgitated. The mud won’t dry out even if it’s exposed to the sun for a long time.
pokedex_full.Violet: Though a slow walker, Mudbray is plenty strong. Its pace doesn’t change even when it’s loaded with 50 times its own body weight.

name: Mudsdale
pokedex: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.

pokedex_full.Sun: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its heavy, mud-covered kicks are its best means of attack, and it can reduce large trucks to scrap without breaking a sweat.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It remains calm and unmoving no matter the situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its mouth to make a special kind of mud.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It can trudge mountain roads without rest for three days and three nights, all the while dragging a 10-ton load.
pokedex_full.Sword: Mud that hardens around a Mudsdale’s legs sets harder than stone. It’s so hard that it allows this Pokémon to scrap a truck with a single kick.
pokedex_full.Shield: Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest or sleep.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon has been treasured not just for its physical labor but also because it produces high-quality mud used for making pottery.
pokedex_full.Violet: Its legs are fortified with mud and harder than stone, and they can reduce a large truck to scrap with one kick.

name: Dewpider
pokedex: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.

pokedex_full.Sun: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.
pokedex_full.Moon: When it comes across enemies or potential prey, this Pokémon smashes its water-bubble-covered head into them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When two Dewpider meet, they display their water bubbles to each other. Then the one with the smaller bubble gets out of the other’s way.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It can only breathe oxygen that has dissolved in water, so it wears a water bubble on its head when it walks around on land.
pokedex_full.Sword: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
pokedex_full.Shield: Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it comes onto land in search of food, it takes water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.

name: Araquanid
pokedex: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.

pokedex_full.Sun: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.
pokedex_full.Moon: Despite what its appearance suggests, it cares for others. If it finds vulnerable, weak Pokémon, it protectively brings them into its water bubble.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It has a habit of storing things it values in its water bubble. If its Trainer doesn’t watch out, Araquanid will try to put them in its bubble!
pokedex_full.Sword: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.
pokedex_full.Shield: It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them inside its bubble and letting them eat any leftover food.

name: Fomantis
pokedex: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.

pokedex_full.Sun: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.
pokedex_full.Moon: They give off a sweet and refreshing scent. Cutiefly often gather near the tall grass where Fomantis are hiding.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When the sun rises, Fomantis spreads its four leaves and bathes in the sunlight. The tip of its head has a pleasant aroma.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It loves the sunshine. When it basks in the sunlight regularly, it grows up with vivid coloration.
pokedex_full.Sword: When bathed in sunlight, this Pokémon emits a pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug Pokémon to gather around it.
pokedex_full.Shield: During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around at night.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Fomantis hates having its naps interrupted. It fires off beams using energy it gathers by bathing in the sun.
pokedex_full.Violet: Many Trainers give their Fomantis their own flowerpots so they can sunbathe in peace and quiet.

name: Lurantis
pokedex: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

pokedex_full.Sun: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.
pokedex_full.Moon: It fires beams from its sickle-shaped petals. These beams are powerful enough to cleave through thick metal plates.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: For self-protection, it pretends to be a bug Pokémon. Both of its arms bear keen-edged petals.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: As it slashes into its enemies, it looks like it’s dancing. Its elegant appearance has led some to call it the most glamorous Grass Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon resembles a beautiful flower. A properly raised Lurantis will have gorgeous, brilliant colors.
pokedex_full.Shield: The petals on this Pokémon’s arms are thin and super sharp, and they can fire laser beams if Lurantis gathers light first.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: By masquerading as a bug Pokémon, it lowers the guard of actual bug Pokémon lured in by a scent of sweet flowers. Its sickles bring them down.
pokedex_full.Violet: A lot of time and effort is required to maintain the vivid colors of its petals. This Pokémon puts its Trainer’s attentiveness to the test.

name: Morelull
pokedex: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

pokedex_full.Sun: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.
pokedex_full.Moon: As it drowses the day away, it nourishes itself by sucking from tree roots. It wakens at the fall of night, wandering off in search of a new tree.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It scatters its shining spores around itself. Even though they’re dangerous, nighttime tours of forests where Morelull live are popular.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It likes damp dark places. When night falls, the spores filling the caps of its mushrooms glow.
pokedex_full.Sword: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull’s head. The caps regrow overnight.
pokedex_full.Shield: Morelull live in forests that stay dark even during the day. They scatter flickering spores that put enemies to sleep.

name: Shiinotic
pokedex: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

pokedex_full.Sun: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.
pokedex_full.Moon: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When it starts fighting for territory with Parasect, the entire area gets completely coated in spores!
pokedex_full.Sword: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
pokedex_full.Shield: If you see a light deep in a forest at night, don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall fast asleep.

name: Salandit
pokedex: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

pokedex_full.Sun: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.
pokedex_full.Moon: Volcanoes or dry, craggy places are its home. It emanates a sweet-smelling poisonous gas that attracts bug Pokémon, then attacks them.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The males will do whatever the females tell them. They give the females most of their food. Due to malnutrition, the males can’t evolve.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It weakens opponents and sends them reeling with its poisonous gas. Salandit doesn’t deal well with Spinda, since it’s always reeling.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandit’s poisonous gas.
pokedex_full.Shield: This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the prey even realizes Salandit is there.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.
pokedex_full.Violet: Only female Salandit can produce gas laden with pheromones. Males entranced by this gas will do whatever the females tell them.

name: Salazzle
pokedex: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

pokedex_full.Sun: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
pokedex_full.Moon: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It punishes Salandit that couldn’t bring it food with a fierce slap of its flame-spewing palm.
pokedex_full.Sword: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
pokedex_full.Shield: The winner of competitions between Salazzle is decided by which one has the most male Salandit with it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.
pokedex_full.Violet: When two Salazzle meet, they will use their pheromone gas to fight over the males in each other’s group.

name: Stufful
pokedex: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.

pokedex_full.Sun: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.
pokedex_full.Moon: A touch from anyone except a known friend sends it into a surging frenzy. It’s an incredibly dangerous Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It boasts power enough to split large trees in half. The organ on its rear releases an odor that it uses to communicate with others of its kind.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Stufful hates to be hugged or touched in any way. It will squirm, thrash, and resist with amazing power.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
pokedex_full.Shield: The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.

name: Bewear
pokedex: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

pokedex_full.Sun: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon has the habit of hugging its companions. Many Trainers have left this world after their spines were squashed by its hug.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn’t run away as fast as possible.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It boasts tremendous physical strength. Many people call it the most dangerous Pokémon in the Alola region.
pokedex_full.Sword: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
pokedex_full.Shield: The moves it uses to take down its prey would make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.

name: Bounsweet
pokedex: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.

pokedex_full.Sun: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.
pokedex_full.Moon: Although it’s too sugary for human consumption, Bounsweet’s sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokémon are always after it, but it’s not intelligent enough to care.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It tries to resist being swallowed by a bird Pokémon by spinning the sepals on its head. It’s usually a fruitless attempt.
pokedex_full.Sword: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: When under attack, it secretes a sweet and delicious sweat. The scent only calls more enemies to it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from boiled-down fruit. Because of this, Bounsweet was highly valued in the past, when sweeteners were scarce.
pokedex_full.Violet: A Greedent drawn in by the sweet scent of these Pokémon will tuck the Bounsweet in among the berries in its tail and carry them all away.

name: Steenee
pokedex: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.

pokedex_full.Sun: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon is always bouncing around energetically. Other Pokémon are attracted by its lively appearance and pleasant aroma.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It’s protected by its hard sepals, so it plays with bird Pokémon without worry. They peck it relentlessly, but it doesn’t care.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It bounces around, swinging the sepals on its head with abandon. They’re quite painful when they smack you!
pokedex_full.Sword: As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will feel a surge of happiness.
pokedex_full.Shield: Any Corvisquire that pecks at this Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from its sepals followed by a sharp kick.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Steenee spreads a sweet scent that makes others feel invigorated. This same scent is popular for antiperspirants.
pokedex_full.Violet: Steenee bounces energetically through forests. If the rind that peels off its body is pulverized, it can be used to treat stomach pains.

name: Tsareena
pokedex: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.
pokedex_full.Moon: A Pokémon known for the beauty of its well-shaped legs, it sometimes appears as a mascot in advertisements for beauty salons.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A Pokémon with an aggressive personality and a mastery of kicking, it cackles every time it kicks an opponent.
