pokedex_full.Sword: This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
pokedex_full.Shield: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and soul that will never heal.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if someone touches the crown on its calyx.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon launches fierce yet elegant kicks with its long, slender legs. It views Quaquaval as its rival.

name: Comfey
pokedex: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.

pokedex_full.Sun: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.
pokedex_full.Moon: Baths prepared with the flowers from its vine have a relaxing effect, so this Pokémon is a hit with many people.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesn’t have any flowers, it feels uneasy.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It picks flowers and sticks them to its body with fluids it produces. The aroma that wafts from its petals has a healing effect.
pokedex_full.Sword: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers won’t wither once they’re attached to a Comfey.
pokedex_full.Shield: These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has its own individual scent.

name: Oranguru
pokedex: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.

pokedex_full.Sun: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.
pokedex_full.Moon: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It normally spends its time meditating in the treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other Pokémon orders as it pleases.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Oranguru don’t get along with each other, so they’re always engaging in battles of wits to decide which one is superior.
pokedex_full.Sword: With waves of its fan—made from leaves and its own fur—Oranguru skillfully gives instructions to other Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will gather medicinal herbs to treat it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: People used to mistake Oranguru for a human when they saw it issue command after command to the other Pokémon of the forest.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon lives quietly in the depths of the forest. The purple, cape-like fur gets longer and longer as Oranguru ages.

name: Passimian
pokedex: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

pokedex_full.Sun: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.
pokedex_full.Moon: They battle with hard berries for weapons. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group, generation upon generation.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: They use their saliva to stick leaves to their shoulders. You can tell what troop they belong to from the position of the leaves.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Berries are its weapons as well as the staple of its diet. The one that can throw a berry the farthest is the boss of the troop.
pokedex_full.Sword: Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the orders of their boss as they all help out in the search for their favorite berries.
pokedex_full.Shield: Passimian live in groups of about 20, with each member performing an assigned role. Through cooperation, the group survives.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon battles by throwing hard berries. It won’t obey a Trainer who throws Poké Balls without skill.
pokedex_full.Violet: The boss chooses 10 members of the group to go out hunting. The hunting party will evenly split the food they find with the rest of the group.

name: Wimpod
pokedex: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.

pokedex_full.Sun: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger, it will gleefully chow down on anything edible, no matter how rotten.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: An astonishingly cowardly Pokémon, Wimpod will whir its legs at high speeds to run away if anything comes near it.
pokedex_full.Sword: It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
pokedex_full.Shield: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy’s presence.

name: Golisopod
pokedex: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

pokedex_full.Sun: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.
pokedex_full.Moon: It battles skillfully with its six arms, but spends most of its time peacefully meditating in caves deep beneath the sea.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The shell covering its body is as hard as diamond. This Pokémon will do anything it takes to win.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its claws, which it can extend and retract at will, are its greatest weapons. Golisopod is sometimes accompanied by Wimpod.
pokedex_full.Sword: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
pokedex_full.Shield: They live in sunken ships or in holes in the seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.

name: Sandygast
pokedex: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

pokedex_full.Sun: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.
pokedex_full.Moon: It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth. And so it adds to the accumulation of its sand-mound body.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It likes the shovel on its head, so Sandygast will get serious and fight any children who come to take it back.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: If you build sand mounds when you’re playing, destroy them before you go home, or they may get possessed and become Sandygast.
pokedex_full.Sword: Grudges of the dead have possessed a mound of sand and become a Pokémon. Sandygast is fond of the shovel on its head.
pokedex_full.Shield: Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes control of anyone who puts their hand into its mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: If it loses its shovel, it will stick something else—like a branch—in its head to make do until it finds another shovel.
pokedex_full.Violet: It flings sand into the eyes of its prey and tries to close in on them while they’re blinded, but since Sandygast is so slow, the prey tends to escape.

name: Palossand
pokedex: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.

pokedex_full.Sun: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.
pokedex_full.Moon: Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Each of its grains of sand has its own will. Palossand eats small Pokémon and siphons away their vital essence while they’re still alive.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Once it has whipped up a sandstorm to halt its opponents in their tracks, this terrifying Pokémon snatches away their vitality.
pokedex_full.Sword: Palossand is known as the Beach Nightmare. It pulls its prey down into the sand by controlling the sand itself, and then it sucks out their souls.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon into its sandy body. Once its victims are trapped, it drains them of their vitality whenever it pleases.
pokedex_full.Violet: From the hollows in its arms, it fires the bones of its victims, which are all dried up after being drained of their vitality.

name: Pyukumuku
pokedex: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.

pokedex_full.Sun: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.
pokedex_full.Moon: These Pokémon line the beaches. The sticky mucous that covers their bodies can be used to soothe sunburned skin. How convenient!
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The tradition known as Pyukumuku chucking started from the custom of throwing Pyukumuku back into the sea after they wash onshore.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its entire body is covered in its own slime. If you accidentally step on one, you’ll slip, and it will get mad and smack you!
pokedex_full.Sword: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist, allowing it to stay on land for days without drying up.

name: Type: Null
pokedex: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.

pokedex_full.Sun: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.
pokedex_full.Moon: Due to the danger that this synthetic Pokémon may go on a rampage, it wears a control mask to restrain its power.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A Pokémon weapon developed for a specific mission, it went berserk during an experiment, so it was cryogenically frozen.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: There’s danger of its going on a rampage, so its true power is sealed away beneath its control mask.
pokedex_full.Sword: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon being created in the Galar region.
pokedex_full.Shield: It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth. The mask placed upon it limits its power in order to keep it under control.

name: Silvally
pokedex: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.
pokedex_full.Moon: Although its name was Type: Null at first, the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Through the bond it formed with its Trainer, its will was strengthened, and it was able to destroy its control mask.
pokedex_full.Sword: A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
pokedex_full.Shield: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.

name: Minior
pokedex: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.

pokedex_full.Sun: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.
pokedex_full.Moon: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokémon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokémon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.

name: Komala
pokedex: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

pokedex_full.Sun: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
pokedex_full.Moon: The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stays asleep from the moment it’s born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative properties of the leaves that form its diet.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Komala spends its entire life sleeping. It feeds on leaves that contain a potent poison only Komala can break down.
pokedex_full.Violet: A potent anesthetic can be made by diluting Komala’s drool. This anesthetic was used for surgeries in the past.

name: Turtonator
pokedex: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.

pokedex_full.Sun: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
pokedex_full.Moon: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other minerals. Materials from the food it eats form the basis of its explosive shell.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its exploding shell poses a real danger but is sensitive to moisture. On rainy days, Turtonator takes silent refuge in caves.
pokedex_full.Sword: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
pokedex_full.Shield: Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes explosive compounds to develop in its shell. Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.

name: Togedemaru
pokedex: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

pokedex_full.Sun: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
pokedex_full.Moon: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it’s surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its capacity to produce electricity is somewhat limited, so it gets charged up by letting lightning strike it!
pokedex_full.Sword: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
pokedex_full.Shield: When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges electricity indiscriminately.

name: Mimikyu
pokedex: After going to all the effort of disguising itself, its neck was broken. Whatever is inside is probably unharmed, but it’s still feeling sad.

pokedex_full.Sun: After going to all the effort of disguising itself, its neck was broken. Whatever is inside is probably unharmed, but it’s still feeling sad.
pokedex_full.Moon: If its neck is broken or its rag torn during an attack, it works through the night to patch it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stands in front of a mirror, trying to fix its broken neck as if its life depended on it. It has a hard time getting it right, so it’s crying inside.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Sad that its true identity may be exposed, Mimikyu will mercilessly seek revenge on any opponent that breaks its neck.
pokedex_full.Sword: There will be no forgiveness for any who reveal that it was pretending to be Pikachu. It will bring the culprit down, even at the cost of its own life.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its disguise made from an old rag allowed it to avoid an attack, but the impact broke the neck of the disguise. Now everyone knows it’s a Mimikyu.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Even as it struggles beneath the cloth to repair the broken neck of its disguise, Mimikyu keeps up its impersonation of Pikachu.
pokedex_full.Violet: It has taken damage and can no longer hold the head of its cloth disguise upright. For as long as it lives, Mimikyu will never forget its attacker.

name: Bruxish
pokedex: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

pokedex_full.Sun: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.
pokedex_full.Moon: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder’s shell is no match for it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches up the spikes and eats them.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It grinds its teeth with great force to stimulate its brain. It fires the psychic energy created by this process from the protuberance on its head.
pokedex_full.Violet: When sunlight reflects on the ripples created by a Bruxish grinding its teeth, the water all around sparkles brilliantly.

name: Drampa
pokedex: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

pokedex_full.Sun: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, Drampa will find the bully’s house and burn it to the ground.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It appears in towns and plays with the children. Drampa will protect kids when they’re in danger, so their moms don’t have to worry.
pokedex_full.Sword: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
pokedex_full.Shield: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.

name: Dhelmise
pokedex: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.

pokedex_full.Sun: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.
pokedex_full.Moon: The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokémon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Its chain-like green seaweed can stretch outward for hundreds of yards. For some reason, it gets along well with Skrelp.
pokedex_full.Sword: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Shield: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.

name: Jangmo-o
pokedex: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.

pokedex_full.Sun: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.
pokedex_full.Moon: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It will never show an enemy its back in battle. Ancient warriors liked Jangmo-o for its valiant disposition and made it one of their own.
pokedex_full.Sword: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
pokedex_full.Shield: Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.

name: Hakamo-o
pokedex: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

pokedex_full.Sun: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
pokedex_full.Moon: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they’re regrown.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The scales it sheds can be molded and processed to make pots and pans. They conduct heat well, so they’re a popular item.
pokedex_full.Sword: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
pokedex_full.Shield: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.

name: Kommo-o
pokedex: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

pokedex_full.Sun: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It battles valiantly with its fists, which are armored in steel scales. Kommo-o specializes in uppercuts.
pokedex_full.Sword: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
pokedex_full.Shield: Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.

name: Tapu Koko
pokedex: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

pokedex_full.Sun: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
pokedex_full.Moon: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: The lightning-wielding guardian deity of Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity and appears before people from time to time.

name: Tapu Lele
pokedex: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.

pokedex_full.Sun: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
pokedex_full.Moon: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.

name: Tapu Bulu
pokedex: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

pokedex_full.Sun: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
pokedex_full.Moon: The guardian deity of Ula’ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s called a guardian deity, it’s violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts. This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.

name: Tapu Fini
pokedex: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

pokedex_full.Sun: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
pokedex_full.Moon: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.

name: Cosmog
pokedex: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

pokedex_full.Sun: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
pokedex_full.Moon: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It’s said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t seem to care.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Whether or not it’s a Pokémon from this world is a mystery. When it’s in a jam, it warps away to a safe place to hide.
pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away.
pokedex_full.Shield: Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away.

name: Cosmoem
pokedex: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.

pokedex_full.Sun: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.
pokedex_full.Moon: There’s something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell. People think this Pokémon may come from another world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: As it absorbs light, Cosmoem continues to grow. Its golden shell is surprisingly solid.
pokedex_full.Sword: The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokémon’s growth. The shell that encases it is harder than any known material.
pokedex_full.Shield: It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate, frantically building up energy within its core as preparation for evolution.

name: Solgaleo
pokedex: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

pokedex_full.Sun: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
pokedex_full.Moon: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: In writings from the distant past, it’s called by the name “the beast that devours the sun.”
pokedex_full.Sword: When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world.
pokedex_full.Shield: Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light radiates boundlessly from it.

name: Lunala
pokedex: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.

pokedex_full.Sun: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.
pokedex_full.Moon: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name “the beast that calls the moon.”
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It sometimes summons unknown powers and life-forms here to this world from holes that lead to other worlds.
pokedex_full.Sword: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy.
pokedex_full.Shield: It steals the light from its surroundings and then becomes the full moon, showering its own light across the night sky.

name: Nihilego
pokedex: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.

pokedex_full.Sun: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.
pokedex_full.Moon: One of the Ultra Beasts. It’s unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It appeared in this world from an Ultra Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.

name: Buzzwole
pokedex: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

pokedex_full.Sun: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
pokedex_full.Moon: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: Pheromosa
pokedex: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.

pokedex_full.Sun: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.
pokedex_full.Moon: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

name: Xurkitree
pokedex: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.

pokedex_full.Sun: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.
pokedex_full.Moon: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of them stand unmoving, like trees, with their arms and legs stuck into the ground.

name: Celesteela
pokedex: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

pokedex_full.Sun: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
pokedex_full.Moon: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

name: Kartana
pokedex: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

pokedex_full.Sun: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
pokedex_full.Moon: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

name: Guzzlord
pokedex: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.

pokedex_full.Sun: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.
pokedex_full.Moon: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.

name: Necrozma
pokedex: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

pokedex_full.Sun: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
pokedex_full.Moon: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It’s apparently from another world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Light is the source of its energy. If it isn’t devouring light, impurities build up in it and on it, and Necrozma darkens and stops moving.
pokedex_full.Sword: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.
pokedex_full.Shield: It needs light to survive, and it goes on a rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will cut anything to pieces.

name: Magearna
pokedex: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.

pokedex_full.Sun: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.
pokedex_full.Moon: Its mechanized body is merely a vessel. Its true self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist, the part called the Soul-Heart is the actual life-form.

name: Marshadow
pokedex: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

pokedex_full.Sun: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.
pokedex_full.Moon: It lurks in the shadows of others, copying their movements and powers. This Pokémon is craven and cowering.
pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it’s imitating.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It sinks into the shadows of people and Pokémon, where it can understand their feelings and copy their capabilities.
pokedex_full.Sword: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow, so it went undiscovered for a long time.

name: Poipole
pokedex: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.

name: Naganadel
pokedex: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.

name: Stakataka
pokedex: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

name: Blacephalon
pokedex: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.

name: Zeraora
pokedex: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

pokedex_full.Ultra Sun: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
pokedex_full.Ultra Moon: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then tears them limb from limb with its sharp claws.
pokedex_full.Sword: It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its opponents with its high-voltage claws.
pokedex_full.Shield: Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs. Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and thunder echoes.

name: Meltan
pokedex: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
pokedex_full.Sword: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
pokedex_full.Shield: They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong Meltan will absorb all the others and evolve.

name: Melmetal
pokedex: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

pokedex_full.Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
pokedex_full.Sword: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
pokedex_full.Shield: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.

name: Grookey
pokedex: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

pokedex_full.Sword: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
pokedex_full.Shield: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

name: Thwackey
pokedex: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

pokedex_full.Sword: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
pokedex_full.Shield: When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.

name: Rillaboom
pokedex: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

pokedex_full.Sword: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
pokedex_full.Shield: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

name: Scorbunny
pokedex: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.

pokedex_full.Sword: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.
pokedex_full.Shield: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

name: Raboot
pokedex: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

pokedex_full.Sword: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
pokedex_full.Shield: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

name: Cinderace
pokedex: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

pokedex_full.Sword: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
pokedex_full.Shield: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

name: Sobble
pokedex: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.

pokedex_full.Sword: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.
pokedex_full.Shield: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

name: Drizzile
pokedex: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

pokedex_full.Sword: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
pokedex_full.Shield: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

name: Inteleon
pokedex: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

pokedex_full.Sword: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

name: Skwovet
pokedex: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

pokedex_full.Sword: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
pokedex_full.Shield: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It stores berries in its cheeks. When there are no berries to be found, Skwovet will stuff pebbles into its cheeks to stave off its cravings.
pokedex_full.Violet: No matter how much it stuffs its belly with food, it is always anxious about getting hungry again. So, it stashes berries in its cheeks and tail.

name: Greedent
pokedex: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

pokedex_full.Sword: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.
pokedex_full.Shield: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: If it spots a berry tree, it will immediately go to gather berries without a sideways glance—even if it’s in the middle of a battle.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.

name: Rookidee
pokedex: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

pokedex_full.Sword: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.
pokedex_full.Shield: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon is brave and reckless. The white markings around a Rookidee’s eyes intimidate fainthearted Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Violet: The females are fussier than the males. If another creature dirties a female Rookidee’s wings, it’ll peck the offender relentlessly in a burning rage.

name: Corvisquire
pokedex: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

pokedex_full.Sword: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
pokedex_full.Shield: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It’s said that the reason behind Corvisquire’s high level of intelligence is the large size of its brain relative to those of other bird Pokémon.
pokedex_full.Violet: This intelligent Pokémon will quickly learn how to use any tool it can hold in its beak or its talons.

name: Corviknight
pokedex: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
pokedex_full.Shield: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Corviknight can’t serve as a taxi service in Paldea because the Pokémon’s natural predators will attack it while it flies, endangering the customer.
pokedex_full.Violet: Although its wings have partly turned to steel and become heavy as a result, this Pokémon flies through the skies with ease.

name: Blipbug
pokedex: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.

pokedex_full.Sword: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.
pokedex_full.Shield: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

name: Dottler
pokedex: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

pokedex_full.Sword: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
pokedex_full.Shield: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

name: Orbeetle
pokedex: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

pokedex_full.Sword: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.
pokedex_full.Shield: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.

name: Nickit
pokedex: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

pokedex_full.Sword: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.
pokedex_full.Shield: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

name: Thievul
pokedex: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

pokedex_full.Sword: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
pokedex_full.Shield: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.

name: Gossifleur
pokedex: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

pokedex_full.Sword: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
pokedex_full.Shield: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

name: Eldegoss
pokedex: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

pokedex_full.Sword: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.
pokedex_full.Shield: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.

name: Wooloo
pokedex: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

pokedex_full.Sword: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
pokedex_full.Shield: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

name: Dubwool
pokedex: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

pokedex_full.Sword: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

name: Chewtle
pokedex: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

pokedex_full.Sword: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.
pokedex_full.Shield: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its large front tooth is still growing in. When the tooth itches, this Pokémon will bite another Chewtle’s horn, and the two Pokémon will tussle.
pokedex_full.Violet: A popular game among children is to lift up sticks that Chewtle have bitten onto to see whose Chewtle can hang on the longest.

name: Drednaw
pokedex: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

pokedex_full.Sword: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
pokedex_full.Shield: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a boulder in a single bite. This Pokémon has an extremely vicious disposition.
pokedex_full.Violet: Drednaw lurks along the shoreline. When prey come to drink water, Drednaw stretches its neck out and chomps down on them.

name: Yamper
pokedex: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.
pokedex_full.Shield: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.

name: Boltund
pokedex: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.
pokedex_full.Shield: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.

name: Rolycoly
pokedex: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.

pokedex_full.Sword: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
pokedex_full.Shield: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: On sunny days, Rolycoly will come out onto grassy plains and roll around. Then it will eat the grass that gets tangled in its wheel-like leg.
pokedex_full.Violet: Chunks of the surface of this Pokémon’s body that have grown old and flaked off have long been used for fuel as an alternative to coal.

name: Carkol
pokedex: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.

pokedex_full.Sword: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.
pokedex_full.Shield: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The temperature inside its body increases when it experiences strong emotions. It rolls around frantically while spewing flames.
pokedex_full.Violet: Due to the coal tar created inside it, the heap of coal on Carkol’s back never falls apart, even when the Pokémon rolls around at high speeds.

name: Coalossal
pokedex: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_full.Sword: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Shield: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: To intimidate its opponents, Coalossal will vigorously shake its body, scattering coal from its smoldering back.
pokedex_full.Violet: It’s gentle usually but fearsome when angered. With a body that burns at over 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit, it crushes foes and turns them to ash.

name: Applin
pokedex: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.

pokedex_full.Sword: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.
pokedex_full.Shield: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It grows by eating the flesh of an apple. Applin uses its own body fluid to strengthen the apple’s skin and prevent it from rotting.
pokedex_full.Violet: Applin lives inside an apple. When an Applin is separated from its apple, its body loses moisture and the Pokémon grows weak.

name: Flapple
pokedex: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

pokedex_full.Sword: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.
pokedex_full.Shield: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It flutters around while seeking an opening in the opponent’s guard, then attacks by spitting acidic liquid strong enough to melt metal.
pokedex_full.Violet: It uses its own body fluid to repair its apple. Strong Flapple that have won many battles have apples that are clay colored all over.

name: Appletun
pokedex: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

pokedex_full.Sword: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It feeds mainly on sweet apples. It will also eat small bug Pokémon that are attracted by its sweet nectar.
pokedex_full.Violet: When some Lechonk come along to lick the sweet nectar on Appletun’s back, Appletun will spew sticky nectar at them to drive them away.

name: Silicobra
pokedex: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

pokedex_full.Sword: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
pokedex_full.Shield: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Silicobra’s neck pouch, which can inflate and deflate like a balloon, gets more elastic each time Silicobra sheds its skin.
pokedex_full.Violet: Silicobra’s large nostrils are specialized for spraying sand, so this Pokémon is not very good at telling apart different smells.

name: Sandaconda
pokedex: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

pokedex_full.Sword: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It will expand its body as much as it can and then contract itself, blasting out sand with enough force to wash away a dump truck.
pokedex_full.Violet: The sand it spews contains sharp, pointy gravel, which is actually just sand that Sandaconda’s saliva has hardened into irregular shapes.

name: Cramorant
pokedex: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.

pokedex_full.Sword: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.
pokedex_full.Shield: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

name: Arrokuda
pokedex: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.

pokedex_full.Sword: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.
pokedex_full.Shield: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Arrokuda can swim quickly only in a straight line. The ones that become sluggish from overeating are the first to be targeted by flocks of Wattrel.
pokedex_full.Violet: It takes down prey by charging into them with its hard, pointed jaw. But Arrokuda’s eyesight is poor, so this tactic has a low success rate.

name: Barraskewda
pokedex: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
pokedex_full.Shield: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It spins its tail fins to leap from the water, then viciously bites down on Wingull flying close to the water’s surface.
pokedex_full.Violet: It swims at speeds of over 100 knots and battles fiercely with pods of Finizen over prey.

name: Toxel
pokedex: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

pokedex_full.Sword: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.
pokedex_full.Shield: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It has no problem drinking dirty water. An organ inside Toxel’s body filters such water into a poisonous liquid that is harmless to Toxel.
pokedex_full.Violet: This selfish, attention-seeking Pokémon stores poison and electricity in two different sacs inside its body.

name: Toxtricity
pokedex: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

pokedex_full.Sword: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.
pokedex_full.Shield: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: As it scatters toxic sweat and emits electricity, a melody that sounds like it came from a guitar reverberates through the surrounding area.
pokedex_full.Violet: The jolts of electricity it launches by violently strumming the protrusions on its chest easily exceed 15,000 volts.

name: Sizzlipede
pokedex: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

pokedex_full.Sword: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
pokedex_full.Shield: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

name: Centiskorch
pokedex: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

pokedex_full.Sword: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
pokedex_full.Shield: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

name: Clobbopus
pokedex: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

pokedex_full.Sword: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back. It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.

name: Grapploct
pokedex: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

pokedex_full.Sword: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
pokedex_full.Shield: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

name: Sinistea
pokedex: The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.

pokedex_full.Sword: The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.
pokedex_full.Shield: It absorbs the life-force of those who drink it. It waits patiently, but opportunities are fleeting— it tastes so bad that it gets spat out immediately.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Some fanatics will go to great pains to prepare the perfect tea and teacup, eagerly waiting for a Sinistea to come and possess their selections.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Sinistea lives in an antique teacup. As valuable as this Pokémon is, its awful taste remains unchanged.

name: Polteageist
pokedex: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.

pokedex_full.Sword: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
pokedex_full.Shield: When angered, it launches tea from its body at the offender’s mouth. The tea causes strong chills if swallowed.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Apparently a Polteageist’s disposition is affected by the type of tea the Pokémon came from. What teapot it inhabits makes no difference.
pokedex_full.Violet: Though risky to drink, this Pokémon’s tea tastes delicious. Gourmets who have no fear of danger drink Polteageist tea day after day.

name: Hatenna
pokedex: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

pokedex_full.Sword: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.
pokedex_full.Shield: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Because the emotions of others constantly flow into its head, this Pokémon prefers environments where no other creatures live.
pokedex_full.Violet: It senses the feelings of other living creatures. Be careful not to expose it to strong emotions for too long, or it will end up exhausted.

name: Hattrem
pokedex: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

pokedex_full.Sword: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.
pokedex_full.Shield: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: To this Pokémon, strong emotions apparently feel like incredibly loud noises—even if the emotions are happy ones.
pokedex_full.Violet: The moment this Pokémon finds someone who’s emitting strong emotions, it will pummel them senseless with its braids to silence them.

name: Hatterene
pokedex: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

pokedex_full.Sword: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.
pokedex_full.Shield: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Hatterene knocks out those that intrude in its home forest by blasting them with a beam, then slashing with claws enhanced by psychic power.
pokedex_full.Violet: Beware of forests that show no signs of living creatures within. You may have wandered into Hatterene’s territory.

name: Impidimp
pokedex: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

pokedex_full.Sword: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.
pokedex_full.Shield: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The reason this Pokémon causes trouble for those it feels close to is because Impidimp itself gets irritable if it can’t absorb negative emotions.
pokedex_full.Violet: They live in groups, pestering and playing pranks on each other to polish their troublemaking skills.

name: Morgrem
pokedex: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

pokedex_full.Sword: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.
pokedex_full.Shield: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Morgrem prefers dirty tactics, like ambushing, because it doesn’t have confidence in its brawn.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon absorbs negative emotions and turns them into energy. It’s popular with people who tend to think gloomy thoughts.

name: Grimmsnarl
pokedex: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

pokedex_full.Sword: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon has complete control over its hair. Grimmsnarl normally keeps its hair wrapped around its body to support its muscles.
pokedex_full.Violet: It lives deep within the forest. Even after evolving into this splendid form, it hasn’t given up on its petty misdeeds and pranks.

name: Obstagoon
pokedex: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

pokedex_full.Sword: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.
pokedex_full.Shield: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

name: Perrserker
pokedex: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

pokedex_full.Sword: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
pokedex_full.Shield: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.

name: Cursola
pokedex: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.

pokedex_full.Sword: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.
pokedex_full.Shield: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.

name: Sirfetch'd
pokedex: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.

pokedex_full.Sword: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.
pokedex_full.Shield: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

name: Mr. Rime
pokedex: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.

pokedex_full.Sword: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
pokedex_full.Shield: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.

name: Runerigus
pokedex: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.

pokedex_full.Sword: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
pokedex_full.Shield: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.

name: Milcery
pokedex: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

pokedex_full.Sword: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
pokedex_full.Shield: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

name: Alcremie
pokedex: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.

pokedex_full.Sword: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
pokedex_full.Shield: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a bitter flavor.

name: Falinks
pokedex: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.

pokedex_full.Sword: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.
pokedex_full.Shield: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The brass, which is the one that stands at the front and issues orders, is the strongest and smartest of the six.
pokedex_full.Violet: The leader, known as the brass, uses its extendible horn to issue orders to the others when it’s time to change formation.

name: Pincurchin
pokedex: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.

pokedex_full.Sword: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.
pokedex_full.Shield: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: This Pokémon generates electricity when it digests food. It uses its five hard teeth to scrape seaweed off surfaces and eat it.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon is so timid that even brushing against seaweed will make it discharge electricity in surprise. Its lips do not conduct electricity.

name: Snom
pokedex: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.

pokedex_full.Sword: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.
pokedex_full.Shield: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: It eats snow that has accumulated on the ground. It prefers soft, freshly fallen snow, so it will eat its way up a mountain, aiming for the peak.
pokedex_full.Violet: Within its internal organs, Snom amplifies the frigid air it gets from eating snow and then uses this amplified air to create icicle-like spikes.

name: Frosmoth
pokedex: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_full.Sword: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_full.Shield: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: Frosmoth senses air currents with its antennae. It sends its scales drifting on frigid air, making them fall like snow.
pokedex_full.Violet: It causes blizzards as it flies around with its huge, chill-emanating wings. Clean meltwater is its favorite thing to drink.

name: Stonjourner
pokedex: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.

pokedex_full.Sword: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.
pokedex_full.Shield: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.
pokedex_full.Scarlet: The elemental composition of the rocks that form its body were found to match the bedrock of a land far away from this Pokémon’s habitat.
pokedex_full.Violet: This Pokémon spends its life gazing at the setting sun. It strides leisurely across grassy plains on legs of rock that weigh over 400 pounds each.

name: Eiscue
pokedex: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.
